Review: These shorts are very sheer and lightweight, but the materials are super cheap. I think one little snag would trash these shorts. They are also bigger than expected.
Sent back. Poor quality.

I bought this dress because i saw it in stores when it first came to retailer. it was stunning. the colors were vivid and the beading was intricate. i regretted not purchasing it immediately. 


fast forward to today... the dress i received was not the one that was originally in stores. the fabric was different, there was hardly any beading, and the colors were washed out and dull. 

i read previous reviews saying that the dress was more like the studio pictures than the original promo. but t

I thought it would be heavier than it is. it's thin and more delicate than what i would expect for a winter sweater (it contains wool so not really suitable for spring/summer). it's also shorter than it appears on the model and a little wider/boxier too.

Looks great on the model, but in actuality there is way too much fabric; what should be flowy and billowy looks like a tent (or a maternity top on a petite woman). it didn't matter which size, they all fit me disastrously. i love the look and i thought of keeping it and having it taken in, but there's too much fabric under the chest to make it an easy cut/alteration on the side seams. sometimes i wonder who comes up with these patterns, and if they pin the shirts back on the models. if you put a
Unusual size shrinks fast not happy considering I bought over 26 Hanes shirts ,off this vender bad quality

I loved what this shirt looked like online.  Used the sizing chart to order the shirt that would fit my bust size.  It took a while for it to arrive and when I went to try it on, I couldn't even get it on.  I was very disappointed.

It seemed to stay in place and did not require constant readjustment. however, i found the band to be extremely small and tight. it is not the most comfortable bra because of the way the band just presses into your skin.
Very disappointed in these jeans as they are NOT true to size at all, way to small.

As I sit here in a very baggy 3xtall t shirt typing this, I can tell you the sizing is laughable. I ordered 3 of these by the way so it's not like it was a mislabeled item. I ordered 4xtall so I could have a very baggy outside shirt. I had to re read the tag after trying to put this on. I have 2xtall shirts that fit better. This was worse than spandex. I took this off and put on a 2x shirt I have which was snug and wearable but no where near this.  These aren't long (if you order tall) and the 4 xtall actually fit my 6 foot tall 185 lb son like a slightly loose shirt.Like I said, if it was just one I'd assume it was a bad one but thats not the case.
May not be authentic Levi’s. I have several from actual Levi’s outlet stores and those hold up pretty well! No shrinkage at all. Buyer beware!!
Ordered larger than size and still did not fit. Would not recommend.
You get what you pay for and I thought I paid enough. Material not like  picture or as advertised. Shrunk even after following washing instructions.
The material is so thin that after wearing the jeans one time, the material above the belt loops was curling.

The fit is so bad and the construction is very poor. i'm 5'1'', 100 lbs, ordered xxs petite. 

first of all, when i button this, there is extreme gaping going on. the vest runs narrow, yet tall?it shifts up my torso if i move at all, making the gaping even worse.

the "skirt" at the bottom is made of a very cheap, thin, slightly sheeny material that you would find at a flea market. it arrived unbelievably wrinkled and crumpled, and it was just so thin. it did not meet as closely in the middl
Within 30 minutes of wear around the house noticed multiple holes in the fabric. Very lightweight.

This is like paint on the chest. It’s so unbelievably tight you can’t lift your arms up. For reference I’m 5’5 120 so i ordered my regular size a small and it was so tight I have to return, I also really don’t like the elastic waist line it looks so cheap in person
So disappointed! beautiful dress in the photographs but the cut was incredibly strange. loose and baggy through the top and mid-section but tight around the buttock and thighs.
low quaity and cheap looking

This dress fit nicely, but armholes were a little too big,  I did not have time to return this item, we were going on vacation,  so I wore a cami underneath.  After washing it,and NOT drying it in dryer,  it shrunk quite a bit and the armholes were worse, out of shape and too gaping, where if worn with a cami underneath it looked very unattractive.  I would not purchase this type item again.

Bummer, i loved the lacy bell arms and everything about the look of this sweater but it is huge in the abdomen. seriously looks maternity to me. the neck is also too wide. the quality of the material is very nice and the weight is nice and heavy but the cut just didn't work on me. i returned this one.

I really loved the way this shirt looked on me. it's forgiving and flattering, and really lightweight. the fabric, however, couldn't even withstand half a day's wear without snagging 3 times and developing a hole right in the center. i have no idea how this happened, as i wasn't wearing or near anything that could have pulled at it. 

such a shame. this could have been a staple wardrobe piece for me.

This is literally the most unflattering thing i have ever tried on from retailer. the sleeves are so weird and ugly. they get really fat at the top, like a dolman sleeve, but it looks really strange because they don?t flow into the rest of the top, which is very structured. it made my shoulders look huge even though i have very narrow shoulders. this is not apparent in the model picture at all. the thick black seams at the shoulders are also placed in a really awkward spot which also contri
Jacket was missing velcro strip on one of the sleeves at the wrist.  Past warranty when we noticed.  I literally had to go purchase velcro to add a strip.
I ordered XL, couldn't get them past my thighs. Daughter who is a size 3 could wear them. Was very disappointed.
Size was too small
Well made, however when I received the product, it appeared to be 6/7 rather than a 10/12..

I own two poodles and love anything poodle print. i was estatic to see this and i snagged it on sale. but it is horrible. the fit is like wearing a pillowcase. it was about 5 inches too wide on each side while the arms fit. it looked like it was attempting to have a dolman shape but it was way too short, wide, and wrong. i was in love with the print however i had to return it.

product is flimsy and feels cheaply made, may last a year

I usually wear a size xs or s in retailer tops, ordered this top in an s and it was so wide on the sides and huge it fit like a tent.  not even remotely flattering.  i thought about ordering it in an xs, however, i could tell the xs was still going to have way too much fabric.  back it goes.
After washing in cold it’s a medium.

I had intended to wear it. I am oddly without said sweater. The carriers are not reliable. Don't think I will be ordering in the future. Had to give something I have never laid eyes on a review. Don't even know what it feels like.

This was a very different material than I expected. I was hoping for more of a business type material I could wear for work. Instead it was like a workout material/jacket. Did not work for what I needed. Had to return.

Look good in picture!  NOT denim material, spandex!

I've been buying from retailer for the last 15 years and this is the first time i've ever posted a bad review. first of all the fabric is scratchy, thin, and looks very cheap. second of all there is no v back, it's more of a slight scoop. and lastly i'm 5'3" so i ordered the petite small and it's still comes 4 inches below my knee. i am very disappointed in the quality and am definitely sending back. the only thing i think this could possible good for is a swim coverup.

Well I just put it on and it shrunk. It now fits like a small. So it is true to size until you wash it. I suggest buying a size bigger because of this. Not worth the price and cheap material,  never worn it since I bought it. I'm ashamed wearing a jacket this cheap n poor quality. Took forever to be delivered. Don't waste money on it.

My perspective is as a sewer so i'm more picky perhaps. this top is poorly made. the fabric pattern is crooked or not consistent in each piece. sewers do this to save $ - squeezing the pieces on the fabric. it looks sloppy. the cut is very full; the bottom edge measures 104" around. for my figure, curvey, at 5'6" and 150lbs, this top is not flattering it looks maternity. perhaps best on a slim figure and with leggings.

Lastly, this one pair did not that new feel to it, and very wrinkled in the bag!! OMG!  What gives here!  Definitely returning and want buyers to watch carefully what they receive. Note, the second pair seemed fine with tags in tact and none of the above deformities that the other had,  and it was double bagged, but it makes me think twice about who may have worn them anyhow!

I DO NOT RECOMMEND PURCHASING IT!!!

My husband wears these pants to work. We’ve purchased many pairs over the years so when he needed to add a few, I found them on Amazon. We ordered 6 pairs with the 7 day try before you buy. He wanted to keep 2 pairs so he washed and dried them, as he usually does. One pair was fine but the other pair shrunk in the legs, probably 3 inches. The writing on the inner band completely disappeared and even the tag inside the pants is different. They have to be knockoffs. He did keep one pair that seems to be genuine Lee brand but beware. Of all the Lee Extreme Comfort Fit pants we’ve purchased, this has never been an issue.

This coat is awful, just awful. i bought it based on the reviews, my husband said it looks like i am wearing a mattress. it looked awful. i really really liked the softness and that it wasn't like another puffer coat, it was also stretchy and the buttons super easy to wear, but the look, style, and design make it very unflattering. it looked so bad that i took it off right away. so disappointing!

I purchased this top for a job interview and loved it. Fit great, comfortable, stylish, could be dressed up or down. I wore it once, and unfortunately splashed about 2 drops of coffee on it. It's dry clean only, so I wasn't going to put it in the washer, but I did soak the spot in cold water. 5 minutes later I take out the top and it's got a HUGE black line across it! I checked to make sure I hadn't set it on something that would stain it--nope, just from sitting in some cold water. I dabbed the new spot with a tiny bit of stain remover and soaked the top in cold water again in the hopes that I could salvage it. As you can see from the picture the top was completely destroyed. I can't imagine what would have happened if I had gotten caught in the rain unexpectedly during my interview. I don't expect to be able to put a top like this into a washing machine, but I DO expect to be able to soak a spot in some cold water without completely wrecking it. Really disappointed.

Not the same as the Lee jeans that I've been buying for many, many years. I order a pair in January and the first time I wore them they fit great. Very relaxed as they should be. Then that afternoon I felt a draft on the back of my leg. I reached down only to find a tear in them. When I got home and put on an older pair. When I examined them, there was about a 1 inch by 1 inch right angle tear in them. After further tear examining them, there was another small tear next to the top of the rear pocket. I contacted Amazon and they replaced them right away.I started wearing the replacement pair. This was around mid February. Around 6 weeks ago, one of the bottom part of a belt loops tore off. Yesterday when I put these newest pair on I noticed the bottom part of another loops tore off. Examining them further, there are small tears next to the top of both rear pockets.Back in the day when I was working I used to buy anywhere from 4 and up to 12 pair of Lee jeans a year according to what kind of work I was doing. Now that I’m retired, I buy a new pair of jeans around once a year. I usually I have 1 new pair and around 4 to 5 old pairs to rotate. I’ve always mark the date that I bought them on the inside tags. So I know the older ones from the newer ones.  In the past 5 months, I only wore these jeans, maybe 25 to 30 days.Maybe I happened to get 2 defected pairs. I will buy one more pair and put them into rotation. If I have a problem again, I will have to try another brand.
I don’t think I’ll be purchasing the Amazon brand polos again anytime soon. I’m a small guy and even the small made me look like the state marshmallow man.

I  did not liked the fact that this was a denim print and not the denim of the past. The fit was typical of what I have tried in the past from Lee product. Fit for a man’s figure not a woman’s. But to top it off I was charged for one item approximately 27 hours after delivery. Not what I call very fitting. They arrived the day after I ordered them, I tried them immediately, and was about to take them to the UPS store when I decided to wait till the next morning. I found a return label in the bag and took it the next morning after 9AM. Then Saturday evening I see an Email I have a charge of $38.22 made at two something in the morning Eastern time. I thought I was hacked!!! I call Amazon’s number on my Chase Amazon card. On the third try I got a good connection. The first two were static and muffled. Not a good thing for conveying info. This poor soul could not help because of the hour of the day, most other dept were closed. He kindly offered to call me later when I would be able to talk with the dept. I needed. I said no because everyone in my house would be asleep. That was the end of my conversations with Amazon.  So my take on Try Before You Buy? FORGET ABOUT IT! You don’t need more headaches in your life!!

Not only weren't they tagless but both shirts actually had 2 tags sewn into them. After searching the Q&A and Reviews for the word tag, it appears many others are similarly disappointed in this new development. Being tagless was always one of the key features of these shirts going back to when they were first introduced. Hanes made a big deal out of it... and rightfully so. It's so much nicer not having physical tags scraping and scratching your neck. Therefore, I'm extremely disappointed in them for a) allowing this change to perpetuate despite all the customer complaints and b) making no effort to get the product description corrected so it doesn't keep misleading customers. Until that happens, if you also don't like receiving tagged shirts that were promised to be "Tagless neck label for comfort" then I suggest you return them using the reason of Not As Described and also post a review here. Hopefully, at some point, someone will finally do the right thing and take notice of this ongoing problem.

I’m going to try to make this review as short as possible. Before ordering all 5 jeans (pictures 1-3) from this same page, I ordered one pair first to make sure the jeans fit. The jeans I ordered first are the darker jeans on picture #1.PICTURE #1 - In the first photo you’ll see two denim jeans, one light denim and one dark denim. Notice how both jeans have different tags on them: the light denim has a purple tag whereas the dark denim has a white tag. The white tag says, “AMANDA THE ORIGINAL SLIMMING JEAN” while the purple tag says, “AMANDA THE ORIGINAL DESIGNER JEAN”. So we can clearly see that they are NOT the same style jeans. Again, the dark denim jean fit me perfectly!PICTURE #2 - I ordered these other jeans, along with the light denim jean in picture 1, after trying on the the first pair. None of the jeans fit and they are all the size. The only difference is that some are Regular instead of Long but that shouldn’t matter because that has to do with the length. If one size 14 fits, all size 14s should fit.PICTURE #3 - this is another dark denim jean that I ordered. This is a different jean from the dark denim jean in picture 1. This jean is size 14 long just like the dark jean on picture 1 and it also fits perfectly!PICTURE #4 - all of the jeans (light denim, dark denim, black) are the same style; the light denim is size 14 Regular (this one doesn’t fit); the black jeans and the dark denim jeans are both 14 long, the SAME SIZE but the black one doesn’t fit whereas the dark denim does fit.Just keep that in mind when ordering. Not all size 14s will fit the same and you will not receive the exact same jeans. I received two different kinds: the  “AMANDA THE ORIGINAL SLIMMING JEAN” and the “AMANDA THE ORIGINAL DESIGNER JEAN”.NOT THE SAME JEANS!So remember, you can order 5 pairs of jeans the same size but most likely all of them won’t fit the same!I hope this review makes sense!!!!

I owned an Ascender jacket for many years and used it as a fleece layer for warmth.  And I love the fabric, which is somewhat water repellent unlike fleece.  As far as I could tell, Columbia is the only outdoor company that makes a lightweight jacket out of this material.This purchase was a replacement for the original jacket, which finally just wore out. I wish I could give this a higher rating. I took it on a recent trip to Iceland and used it every single day, since the temp there always hovered around 50 and it was rainy. The darn thing failed me, unfortunately.  This jacket zipper failed me in my hour of need. Unlike my original jacket, which had a beefy zipper with big teeth, this one had really fine teeth. The first time I zipped it up, it separated down at the bottom. Unless I was really careful when putting the zipper together, the separation happened frequently.  Once it separated, I always had a helluva time getting it unzipped again.Unless Columbia corrects the zipper issue, I would not buy this jacket again. Unfortunately I'm now past the return/refund window, so I'm going to pay someone to replace the zipper with a heavy duty one like the original.  :-(

I bought these to carry a phone in the pocket at work, my company recently started frowning on cargo pants. I'm slim, and the Wrangler relaxed carpenter jeans or cargo pants size 32 X 34 fit me fine for an active work life.  They are a little longer in the leg than I like (backside of pant legs drag on the ground).  I decided on 32 inch inseam, and these Technician pants are fine for length- just on my shoelaces.  The relaxed fit on these pants seem to be in the crotch, but hips are tight.  The 32" waist was TIGHT and 34" waist just slightly loose, however hips have room for a wallet, though it's tightly held.  I'm 6'0" and weigh 155#- definitely NOT overweight anywhere- so I think it's Wrangler's relaxed fit has changed.  I have these pants in 2 colors, and will definitely get another pair of the beige. Just be sure to buy the next waist size up!

I had such high hopes, but they are just slightly off. they run a tad large, so i suggest sizing down. (i usually wear a 28 or 29, and the 28 fit nicely through the hips and thighs.)
unfortunately, the color is off- i thought they were going to be a dark midnight blue, but they are actually gray. and they have a button-fly closure which causes the pants to protrude a bit in the area where no woman wants protrusion. i will be returning them.

I bought the dark green version and love the professional smooth texture and thickness of material. Very disappointed by the odd women texture (zig zag/ chevron) in the deep purple. Had ordered for an interview—looks like crimped up tissue paper. Will be returning.
it shrunk after one wash
33 inches on waist and 45 inches on butt and the 33 didn’t fit like I wanted

I loved this shirt! flattering and pretty. it's hand wash only or dry clean. i hand washed it and the blue t-shirt part of the shirt shrank, and now the front of the shirt is too short for me. would not recommend due to shrinkage... too bad.

I waited a long time to get this top. unfortunately i will be returning. the sides are gathered and stick out a lot on the sides. not as pictured. the sides should have been pleated. it runs smaller in the bust and when closed it was a little snug. afraid this might shrink with dry cleaning or washing. the design is unique and wish this top would of worked.

I ordered this dress in a xs petite. i am 5'0" 105 lbs. the plaid looks more drab in person and the fit was very frumpy. the wrap style is typically flattering but on this dress, the dress tied above my natural waist and the fit made my hips appear larger. i was pretty disappointed in this little number and will be sending it back. it might work on taller people, like the model, but i would steer clear if you are a petite.
Too baggy
I can’t figure out how to style it because it’s oversized but thin enough that you can nearly see the freckled on my arms through the sleeves. I would definitely not purchase this again.
Super cute but the fabric was so thin & flimsy i was afraid it would fall apart once it was washed so returned it.

The jacket rides a couple inches too high and so do it's pockets. It is as if it was made for a person who is shorter than average height. If it wasn't for that, it would be of reasonable quality for the price. Very annoying.

For the price, the pants seem to be ok but they are super short in the crotch. Tried them on and immediately knew I would have to return them. This isn’t an issue I have had on any other pants before.

Thought i would splurge on a tracy reese coat. i got a size small, (120, 5'6) felt huge on me and i looked like a wooly mammoth. very unflattering. another reviewer also mentioned on how it flairs slightly at the bottom?.adding to the overall bad look. i had it on for about 20 seconds and put it back in the bag to return. din't have to ponder about it at all.
It look good at the beginning but unfortunately after 2-3 washing cycles the color starts deteriorating and looks like it would be a few years old. Not expected for a 50$ pajama.

This blouse has a very cute style. the ruffles are really nice but why does it have to be so sheer? there is no way i could wear this to work without a cami. it also felt slightly on the small size - almost too tight for my normal size.
I wore them often but not a ton and they are already ripped.

Way too much fabric; sticks out like jodhpurs but from the hip - eek! might be a great dress in rayon or a drapey fabric, but the extra fabric just piles up on itself... the outer layer also doesn't feel like it will breath. add the cotton lining, and i think it will feel miserable in the heat of the texas summer. returning.
The shirt is okay but I do not like the fabric.  It is not breathable at all and feels like it is made out of plastic.

The Shirt was much smaller than I thought it would be. My first order was a large but did not fit properly so I ordered the XL The body fit better but I ended up cutting the rib off of the sleeve To be able to slide it up.

Review title says almost all. add to that that it is age appropriate, unlike other kedia dresses, for the very young. just too cute for words. i have all of the other tk peasant dresses and although youthful they are appropriate for anyone young of heart. this however, on an older woman, looks ridiculous. i would have liked it for those 9 months but even then it would cover quadruplets!

These looked really interesting online and with the multicolor stripes i thought it would pair nicely with many tops. 

the fabric is nice and sturdy. the colors are more vibrant than online. 

the design however is terrible. when i put them on i double checked to make sure they weren't on backwards- the back is flat as a board but the front has these poofy pockets. the poor fit with the bright stripes gives a "1920s circus diaper" look which is not good. 

they're also really tight compar
It is not a casual shirt it’s more like a blouse to wear to church not to wear with jeans
I did not like the material and shoulder pads are lumpy.  Very cheap looking in person

It is a beautiful sweater, but it is cropped and boxy.

But, it just doesn't measure up. first, the slip/lining comes unattached if pulled slightly and it is very difficult to actually get it on - either stepping into it or pulling it over your head. and, once on, the top was a big snug and there was too much material at the bottom which made it look really bulky. unfortunately, i am finding this to be the case with so many of the items i buy from retailer lately. the material is really cute, but the dress isn't worth the price / effort.

This dress is just too baggy overall. i am 5'6" 140 lbs and a size small was so unflattering. i can't go down in size because the waist detail will get too high on me. it was already a little high on the small.

I was so excited to receive this dress. i got a petite 4 as i am 5'2". it was very hard to zip up the side zipper but not impossible. it didn't look good on me. the waist line was a bit too high...maybe a regular would have looked better. also i thought it was a cotton dress but it isn't. also i looked like i was going to a nordic folk festival to do a traditional dance. i had been so excited to receive this but sadly it just didn't work for me and i had to send it back.
The jacket was not a good fit

After reading every review, i was certain i knew exactly what i was getting with this dress. wrong. i sized up from a small to a medium and the dress was still uncomfortably tight on my rib cage. the top is very exposing of the bust, and i'm small busted. i can't stand wearing camis, so there no way i'd be able to wear this dress even if i sized up again to a large. for reference, i'm 5'6", a straight build 134 lbs, and wear a 6. pluses on this dress are, i loved the green color and length of sk

I will return this item.Update: ordered this dress in two sizes. I received two mediums. One is The Drop brand and the other is entirely different brand and dress.

I would have loved this sweater if it were true to the picture but the stripes are gray, not white. either i got a strange one or (as happens to me sometimes with retailer) the pictures are very misleading. disappointed because i wanted to love this.
I will never going to buy any more of clothes online because I have not tried it before I buy it

My son calls these ‘Ranger Panties’ because they are as light and sheer (though thankfully not as short) as the shorts that Army Rangers wear for PT. Both of my kids are quite hesitant to wear them except around the house.

I'm 5' 5", 150 lbs, 32dd, normally a 28p or 29p in pants. i ordered an 8 and probably should have gone with a 10. it was super unflattering?the print was overwhelming for my pale skin, it made my thin waist look larger than it really was, and rode up the inside of my thighs. i have a similar bathing suit from modcloth that's 1/3 of the price and 20x as flattering. if you have thick legs, this may not be the suit for you. i returned it--so fast.
This is a cute item at a good price point, though the lack of lining in cartonnier items drives me batty. unfortunately, the wool is so itchy i could not tolerate it more than a second.

I was so curious to see this skirt. it looks just like pic. really gorgeous bold pattern and a faux suede like fabric. my only problem was that i thought there was too much fabric. i love maxi skirts. i am 5'8" and 136 lbs. it was a bit long on me but just had too much fabric. i have slim hips but this made them look larger. skirt is almost ballroom gown like in its fullness. loved it and someone else might love it but for me, it was too much. wish it worked!

I was really excited to get this top in the mail; unlike other reviewers, i didn't find that the top fit small, but i thought that the tight fit across the shoulders and chest didn't look good with the billow-y torso of the top. i think this top would be flattering on really thin girls, but i'm very tall and broad shouldered, so it didn't look as good on me.

The sweater was nice but not as long as on the model. it was itchy also. this sweater was not what i had expected. their was nothing exceptional about it to spend that kind of hard earned cash, sorry retailer. i sent it back .
Pretty sure the shirt I received was used. Other than that the shirt seems fine. I am taking it to the dry cleaner tomorrow.

I was aware of the split sleeves when i purchased-- hoping to try something new. they're not attractive. the slit stays open with any movement. i don't think it would be appropriate for work . overall the fit is true to size. i otherwise liked the design, but the sleeves made this a quick return ....

so back both pairs went. 
it's a shame because the color was as pictured and just what i wanted. if only they had been made out of actual jeans material.

I am sooooooo massively disappointed in this purchase. i thought i had found the perfect pant in this style. both more comfortable and more flattering than similar styles in the store. i wanted to wear them every day; received lots of compliments; felt that you could dress up or down; etc. this is where i have to admit that i wore them several times straight from the store before washing. on the second wear, i noticed threads coming out on the seams, but just on one side of one leg. this was irr

For reference, I'm 6'5 200 lbs. I got large/tall shorts and they stopped just above the knee, which is perfect for me. However, the shorts are see through. This dress reminds me of a fabric used for curtains. it is sturdy beautiful and strong. i looked like a large picture window in it. if i was 5'10" and 120 pounds it may have worked ?

Wow! this sure is close fitting, as in suction cups to your body! yikes, definitely not forgiving for those of us with curves. to me, it seems like the material will wear well. i bought this for a great sales price so i may keep it, not sure. it would work fine as a layering piece but if i gain even 5 lbs, it won't work. i ordered the medium and am usually a small. the large might have worked best but probably still pretty clingy. i do recommend this if you are thin with no problem areas.

I have ordered several if these tshirts recently, always loose fit. More often than not Amazon will substitute regular fit or a different color. I ordered navy heather twice and got charcoal both times. Also you don't know what the material will be. My last order was a 2 pack. One was 100% cotton and one was 40% polyester.

I ordered the black and white pattern, which was ok. i got a small, but the shirt was very square - with a short and wide fit! i doubt an xs would have helped with such a boxy shirt. sent this one back.

Received this in the mail today and was disappointed. i typically wear a 6/8 but bought this in the 8 as i had purchased another similar top from the same company in an 8. this does not fit the same at all. the top pulled in my shoulder and chest area while had ample room in the body. needless to say i will be returning this item

I bought this in size xl. it ran much shorter & smaller than is typical for this brand. i found the arms tighter on me compared to the model's photos. the lace itself was pretty, intricate and washed well. i wish this shirt had worked but i ended up donating it after wearing it a couple times. the cropped length and close-fit just didn't work on me. i thought the sleeve shape was pretty. with just a little more material, this would have been a favorite. i hope it works well on whoever receives i

Unfortunately, this sweater let me down! i love retailer, especially their sweaters, but this one fell flat. it was tight on the arms, and didn't hang well on my body. it was odd in length and added about 20lb to my frame. i kept it because i wanted to force it to work, alas, i just donated it. hopefully it fits someone else better than me..
This sweater was boxy and just not what I was looking for.

I have blazers in size 8 from this designer and they fit with room to spare. i understand this is a more fitted style, but it is still way too small. size 10 and size 12 were not much bigger. great colors and cute design, but just too small even if you do not plan on buttoning it. i hope they bring back this jacket but make it true to size.

Keep buying pants online and always end up sending them back.  I'll try to remember to go to the department store to try pants/slacks on.  The sizes and styles are so different.

These run small (i am 110 and got a size 4), they were a tad tight on top. the waist fit but felt a little too snug, short from waist to crotch and then bloomed out in a nice but stiff ish material. they are a dark blue animal print. i felt like bozo the clown goes to the jungle. they looked so silly i had to laugh. even with the 20% off, these are going back. not even comfortable to lounge around the house in never mind being seen by anyone in person!

Lovey top in the photos. however, its fairly large and the chest area can make you look even larger. i'm 5'3, 118lbs, 36c. generally wear xs or 2s in retailer tops. ordered the xs but it was just too large and unflattering. the lace work is so pretty. it has potential but the design doesn't work well for some.

I was excited to receive this coat for my annual travel to switzerland but hesitated to order it online without seeing it first due to the price. it arrived last night with the buttons falling off and a large hole in the front pocket. the lining inside is has a very cheap plasticky feel and i can also see small rips possibly forming in the lining.

If you have anything larger than an a cup, this shirt will likely not fit right. it is very pretty but the seem on the front runs directly in the middle of the chest. it literally runs right through the center of the breasts. what were they thinking? if it had been three inches higher or lower, it would have been perfect. for reference, i'm approximately 105lb and have a dd cup.

Could not wait to get this blazer, which has the same style as a boyfriend jacket… But once I got the product, first it was too small, and then the length of the jacket was nowhere near as long as the picture portrays…

I ordered 2 of the same shirt. one in green and this one in navy. The green one came in the normal quality for this shirt. It was well packaged like the picture of the shirt. Wrinkle free. The Navy shirt came in a separate shipment. It came in a brown paper bag like envelope.  The shirt was just tossed into the envelope. Brown dust from the envelope  was all over the shirt .It was loose and extremely wrinkled , The collar had deep folds in it where they don't belong.  Unlike the green shirt it was not folded and packaged in clear plastic  inside a white plastic envelope. Not a single button on the navy shirt was buttoned. I have never before received a button down collar shirt where the collar, cuffs and  shirt buttons all came unbuttoned,  I had to iron the shirt and  collar to get all the deep folds and wrinkles out. The material is much thinner and it is not stitched as well as the green shirt. Since I ordered them from the same page at the same time I am not sure what Id get if I order another color so I'll have to order elsewhere.  Order at your own risk.

but definitely a showpiece that can be paired with a short jacket.

Was surprised that the material became more rough. Also, I wanted the pajamas to have extra room so they are comfy. I usually were large. I figured XL would better. If you don't like pj pants to be tight on your backside these are not for you. Better for women that don't have hips. If not then order your regular size.

Bought this as a back up blazer for my job which now requires my department to wear navy blue suit attire. I knew from the start that this would be unlined so was not surprised by this. HOWEVER the material feels and looks like dull, heavy, T-shirt style cotton. Every hair, lint particle and paper bit sticks to it like velcro so lint rolling is a three or four times per shift activity. The color is not crisp, it cam out of the package wrinkled and looking like it has already been washed no less than 20 times. While it was inexpensive, the product looks like it is worth half the price

The skiers, cats, and puffin patterns are adorable and i was very tempted to keep the shirts just for the patterns. unfortunately, the fit was awful. i am short and need to highlight my waist and this shirt did the opposite. the skier fabric is also see-through. the tenting issue could be fixed if you belt the shirt or tuck it in, but it is not very long. 100% rayon fabric is a bummer too. the shirt was snug at the bicep, but not as bad as i expected from the reviews. i sized up from an 8 to 10.

I ordered the Levi’s Women’s 721 High Rise Skinny Jean in Azure Mood, size 26 regular (= size 2, 30” long),  BECAUSE is it is advertised as 92% cotton and only 6% Poly and 2% Elastic.  I wanted the higher cotton content, and less stretch.  I knew as soon as I opened the package that these WERE NOT 92% cotton.  Waaay too much stretch to the fabric, and I wanted more “jean,” less “legging.”  These jeans, made in Sri Lanka consist of 71% Cotton (not 92%), 26% Viscose, 6% polyester, and 2% Elastine.  These jeans were oddly  tighter in the waist than the 720s I tried, and had far too much stretch otherwise…no control, no shaping.  Since Levi’s sold out, and stopped manufacturing all of their jeans in the USA, the manufacturer has lost its ability for reliable quality control or to uphold the traditional LEVI reputation.  Of course, there are Levi’s  jeans still made in the USA, but they aren’t affordable for most people looking for a well made, durable, but stylish pair of jeans.
Won’t be buying them again

Cheap material is being used in Lee Jeans now. I only bought them because I have worn Lee Jeans all my life and have not found another brand that I love the way they fit. I will say this you can depend on the fit of Lee Jeans! I am 65 and have worn Lee Jeans for over 40+ years. I used to be a electric utility lineman and always wore Lee Jeans to work and never had the problem that I have seen in the past 4 or 5 years. I put this brand to the test climbing poles, working in all kinds of weather and they never failed me. Now doing something as simple as putting your finger in a belt loop to pull up your pants causes them to tear away from the jean leaving a hole in the fabric. I have also had a rear pocket to tear the fabric on the seat of the jeans. Note the pictures attached are from the same pair of jeans.

These shirts are both way too large (circumference), and way too small (length) compared to size chart. They are very short and very boxy. If you're a short and round guy, these fit the opposite of a slim fit, and may be perfect for you. These XL fit me like a midriff showing trash bag (I am 6'1", 200 lbs, and not very slim in the middle, and I was still swimming in this shirt, while it still was too short to even come to my belt line).The polyester fabric feels nice, compared to sweaty hot cotton. Otherwise, stick to a tried and true Port Authority polo if you're looking for a work shirt with a familiar fit. AmazonBasics totally missed the mark with this shirt.

I agree with the other reviewer. the colors were fabulous, but it was boxy and fit me like a sack. the slits on the side really detracted from the cute fabric and the hood drooped way in the back due to being able to pull away from the slits. it was really a cute idea and i'm sad it didn't work. i started not to order it based on the first review but i wanted to give it a chance,--i should have listened !
The Elastic around the Shoulders Completely Stretched Out with only 2 Uses. I had to take it in on both sides Front and Back
The dress is very pretty, but the sequins are dark blue! i imagined they would be silver/gold, given the photo, but the dress is essentially light pink and blue.

I read the previous reviews and ordered down a size knowing that the shirt runs big.   i really wanted to love the shirt however it was a tent. with all of the extra material in the back, it billowed out in all the wrong places. the material is comfy and it's a very cute concept, just didn't work for me.

I ended up returning this dress. It looked way to big on me and looked very much like a nightgown. I ordered a medium since I normally wear medium in other dresses. This is perfect if you are looking for a nightgown. It's super soft and roomy.If you want to wear as a dress sizing down might be more flattering.

I loved the fact that this dress is cotton. it is a thin cotton, and you can see in the photos that she is wearing a black slip with a thicker strap. mine came with a nude slip. i'm thinking they all come with a nude slip. i'm not sure why they showed the dress with the black thick strap slip unless it was to show the dress as a thicker cotton than what it actually is. the dress is adorable though which makes it hard for me to decide whether to keep it and hope mine won't tear easily or to retur
Almost at rib cage.  Uncomfortable.
After my first wash I noticed a spot on front. Could be a stain. But it didn't wash. From driver it is wrinlkled.

First of all, mine arrived in a regular denim shade, not the dark wash shown. also, the style is more like a blazer, and it was huge. i am 5'2" and ordered the petite xs but even xxs would have looked like a baggy blazer. as well, the sleeves came barely past my wrists, they are designed to cuff as the model has done? perhaps on someone taller and younger it would look edgy and chic! the quality is excellent with some nice details. this might be one to try in person, if you can.

As others have stated, this shirt runs a bit large, but knowing that before you buy should alleviate that issue.My main beef is that this shirt has 6 buttons. Depending on where your trousers sit, this may or (more likely) may not be enough. It should have at least seven, if not eight as other comparable brands have. My shirt looks sloppy near my belt line. This is such a simple fix, but they seem to have cut corners here. Very disappointed.

I ordered this since it looked so cute on the model . when i it arrived, i was excited to try it on, but when i did...blah. the color is murky and the top runs large, not to mention that the material is too heavy for a short sleeved top (plus it's lined). i really wanted to like it and debated wetting it and then putting it in the dryer to shrink it a bit. in the end, i decided that it wasn't worth it. too bad, as the concept was a good one. it just failed in the execution.
Very cute dress. Not flattering on tummy area, the waist is to high.
My only problem is that, after the first wash, you can see the color already faded.
Color is not as pictured. Photo appears a pretty pale green, but it’s a darker olive green . I guess the name “camo “ should have been a clue.

Really like this dress but.....
the dress is lined in a heavy fabric and weighs a lot for a summer dress
worst of all there is no chance at all of getting the buttons through the button holes.
impossible!
has to go back

Got the jacket and vest, which I really liked. But no pants were included. No option other than return and I didn't want to return I just wanted the pants as my dads funeral was this past week. No pants but seller said they'd give me $30 back....which i dont see credited yet.2 stars for the product delivered. I will say the jacket and vest were really nice,luckily I had a pair of pants that worked.

This is a gorgeous top. very well made with a classy design. it fits true to size from the lower chest up. however, at about the mid-belly range, the shirt widens out and basically allows a 5 month twin pregnancy to comfortably fit in. size xs. i was so sad. for the price, i can't justify taking it for alterations. it would have been the perfect top.
The fabric is a nice weight knit and the top generally well made. unfortunately, the fit was enormous. i've an athletic build w/ big boobs & normally wear l in retailer tops.

I was disappointed to learn that this product was made in China if I had known that I would not have bought it. I’m more inclined to support my own country. And actually the product had a very very strange smell

Frankly I didn’t even try it on, because I could tell that 1) the pants would be too long and too baggy (if the rest had been ok the plan was to get some skinnier pants); and 2) the top jacket thing was far longer than I wanted; and 3) I would have looked like my grandmother. And I ain’t no spring chicken!

I loke the idea of this jacket but it was executed poorly. it makes me look like a football player! i am 5'8 135/athletic build and i was swimming in the m. i tried a small on in store and it still looked like i was wearing shoulder pads. it hangs and gaps awkwardly. the sleeves are freakishly long and the overall length was too short.
I am little bit disappointed. I did not like the top. The only one thing I like is it is cotton.
While this top looked and fit ok I don’t think I got a brand new product. It’s smelled like vinegar, it has a nasty smell to it.
The material is very heavy and you feel like your wearing a weight. Sleeves were long and not tight around wrist. Disappointed

I normally wear a medium in retailer dresses, but ordered a small due to the reviews that stated how large this dress is. they weren't exaggerating!!!! the small was way too big for me, and the xxs and xs are already sold out. beware that you will have to size down at least 2 sizes to make the dress fit similar to the model pictured. it is going back for me!
I feel like these jeans didn’t flatter me.

I so wanted to love this dress, especially after seeing how pretty the ladies look who shared photos, but the fit and proportions were terrible on my bod. I am curvy/busy with "normal" proportions; I'm neither long- nor short-waisted. The waist on this dress was waaaay too short,  it landed in the middle of my bust. The side button, therefore, was totally ineffective. The fabric was nice, stretchy and flowy, and work-appropriate. I'm sorry I had to return it.

I ordered two sizes. when the package came i was skeptical as it was very light and thin. both shirts were in the bag. the style is just okay. the shirt is extremely light weight. i was not impressed with the fabric. i am returning both. definitely did not think it was worth the price.

I was so excited for this dress to arrive, but when it did, it was a major disappointment. there is no lining on the skirt portion of the dress leaving it sheer. also, the top part along the chest puckered in a weird unflattering way. the colors were beautiful, but not enough to to make up for the other design flaws. i am 5'6" 140lb and the small fit tts. will be sending it back
Heavy material, too long and just not good for me.
Bummer, i fell in absolute love with these gems until i realized how weak the stretch is by the end of the day. i purchased them on the 13th of feb and can't bare to wear them anymore.
Will give away
The jacket is cute and fits amazing. Until I tried to zip it up and saw no zipper attachment. Disappointed.

I want to start off by saying these are cute and well fitted shorts.BUT the button is so loose it could fall off any day- which makes the longevity of newly bought shorts minimal. Proceed with caution

Read the reviews and thought i would just remove the label asap to prevent snags since i loved the item! 
however, the item came with unrepairable holes, not just snags and they are either on the neck or front sleeve which forces me to return the item asap. didn't even try it on. so sad, but i still love retailer!!!

The dress is extremely high quality! i purchased the dress in black. the white collared shirt that the model is wearing under the dress is not part of the dress. the dress overall is like a balloon. unless you're extremely tall and skinny this dress makes you look bigger! i ordered the small petite and am 125 lbs and 5'4. i really wanted to like this dress but unfortunately it's going back:( the petite hits 3 inches above the knee for reference.
The jeans were several sizes too large and too long
Sweater came late not what I expected. Is soft but not flattering

I was so excited to get these. i paid for two day shipping and ordered medium and large . sadly they did not fit. i usually wear medium but ordered both just in case. i'm very disappointed that they run so small and are not true to size. they are super cute from someone skinny.
Not flattering and looks crushed after wearing for couple of hours.

As someone with a large chest and a smaller waist, i found this top incredibly unflattering (and i like swingy tops). it was too short, too wide in the hips, and too tight in the bust. the pattern and fabric are very pretty though.
Size is NOT true, order larger size!!!!
Grade: D

So i have had to return this once so far because the stitching ripped out when i sat down. the little slip thing that goes underneath if cheaply made. i really wish this were just lined dress. i wear it with a blank tank top and leggings underneath. not worth the money, but i needed something to wear that was transitional.

I actually had no problem with the neck hole of this shirt, even with the xs size. however, i had a huge issue with the bottom eyelet section. it's so tight! it stretches across my thighs and looks so funny, as the top part is still loose. i tried moving up to a size small and still had this problem. maybe just not for girls with thighs ... very strange fit.

This top is so cute brand new and when you first put it on, but after wearing for a day stretches out terrible and the fabric starts to bead up and roll and looks cheap and bad! I wanted to love it, but for these reasons, I'm returning the second top I bought like this as damaged. I wish i could send red back, but return window has closed.
I was going to buy another color until I washed it…the lace matted and the top is now ruined even though I washed it in a delicates bag.

I have been dying to try a mara hoffman bathing suit, so i went for this one. unfortunately, the design of the bathing suit is not like what they sent me. the middle where the tops meets the bottom, is squared off, not like that v that it looks like in this photo. it also makes for major side boob/sagging on each side. i was very disappointed.
This is a perfect example of name brand not meeting quality expectations at price points. This is a cheap shirt. It’s not great fitting. Materials aren’t great.

I loved this top online and even more when i opened it up. however, the quality of the stitching is poor. where the seam comes together at the hip on both sides, the stitching is very loose and appears to be coming undone. i was bummed and am sending it back today.
The cut of the bodice is very strange and unflattering. it is great quality, but designed poorly. returned it.

Like some other reviewers, i, too, have to comment on the dress's fit. the dress doesn't fit right around the bust or the waist. as a seamstress myself, i know that the problem is that it doesn't have any darts in the bust, and thus the bust and the waist are just about the same size. this dress really just needed a few of these extra hidden details to fit right. while a belt helps, i don't think it helps enough to justify the price. it's too bad--i think the concept of it is cool, and i was rea

I have  burgundy 3/4 sleeve version of this exact same brand and love it. I ordered the long sleeve in gray In the exact same size and it arrived looking like an muted olive green and did not fit at all like the other one I bought. I ended up returning it.  The front did not fall as shown in the picture at all.

My boyfriend is a true 2XL. All of the shirts he owns are all 2XL. I bought this as a gift, but we had to return right away because it was so tight and did not fit at all. I would say this fit more like a large than a 2xl.

I ordered this in size xl. the ivory was as pictured. the lace details were well-done. but, the length was much shorter than on the model. i'm 5 ft. 5 1/2 in. for reference. even the sleeves were on the short side, above my wrists. the main problem is how much it shed. just in trying it on, there was fuzz everywhere so i returned it. i love when retailer mixes lace into the knit of sweaters. this one just didn't work out.

I really wanted to like this jump suit.  i rarely have problem with retailer clothing.  i'm 5.6, hourglass shape, usually wear size 2.  this jumpsuit runs small, but that's not the only problem.  top part (shirt piece of the jumpsuit) is too short, so it's digging into my lady part.  the color does not look anything like the picture, so overall this piece is failure.  i hope that i find something similar but fits better.

I fell in love with this shirt the moment i saw it!
unfortunately, when i went to put it on, there was a hole running down the seam in the back. i went to store to exchange, wore the shirt, and someone tells me i have two holes in the back of my shirt. horrified, i went home, took a look, both holes along the seam! i will be returning this, i really liked this shirt!
Not high waisted

This item is pretty, the print on the fabric is nice and reminiscent of embroidery, but only the top portion has a few embroidered accents. my issue with it is it's very impractical. the fabric is extremely thin, and you wouldn't want to wear it in any weather below 75 degrees. it's ridiculous to advertise this product for a fall/winter season. the tube top underneath doesn't work very hard to stay up, and isn't a very practical way to hold up the jumpsuit (why wouldnt they just stitch a lining
This picture does not represent these jeans .. the color is way off. they are more yellow toned and look much more worn than in the picture. they also run very small.

The shorts on the backside were completely see through even when wear tan underwear or nothing honestly. I mean so see through that every crease and line on my body showed. The shirt isn’t that long and doesn’t cover the butt, nor should you have to cover your butt with a shirt to hide your see through shorts. Returned immediately!
This top is really beautiful, but looks absolutely horrible on my 5'9" apple shaped body. in the words of my husband, i looked like a star trek villain.
I loved the style so i ordered on line. it runs small and the arm inserts are so low its awkward to wear. i wish the cut was better cause i love the look but not the fit. i am returning this item..

Wanted to love this- i did love the color and thought the style would work for anyone. but i tried it on and immediately took it off with a definite "not keeping this." the side zipper- a complaint by many, really made it uncomfortable. also, the detail under the bust would not lay flat and just looked odd. loved the material and definitely the green print. but i knew i would never wear it. just looked blah.

when i tried this on, the band of stitching that was supposed to go beneath my chest was sitting on top of my cleavage! also, the overall length is listed as 27" long, but i think that is the back of the shirt. the front of the shirt is very short on me (i'm 5'10"), hitting well above my hip bones.

if only this was much, m

I was really excited after finding this top online and reading the reviews; the combination of peplum, cap sleeves, and color seemed too good to be true. i ordered a size medium but unfortunately, this top is on the short side so wearing it with pants or jeans did not work out. in addition, the fabric was more sheer than it looks in the picture and the v-neck in front dipped a little lower, too. a camisole might have solved both of those problems but i didn't bother. i returned it to the store.
Runs large in sizes.Go down 1 size that you wear.

Sadly, going back. ordered m, light color option, very difficult to pull over my head, not a good sign. got it on and neckline looked attractive (height w/o being a mock turtle), but whole thing a bit small around middle. could order the l, but i'm not liking the feeling of the fabric, it feels tight with restrictive and nonuniform stretch: 33 cotton/27 poly/27 acrylic and 95 rayon/5 spandex "contrast", which must mean the stripes. combine w/fact that the two wide stripes are right at my middle
Very thin more like a windbreaker and the sleeves were about 6" too long

The shirt is absolutely cute looking. but that's just that....looks. i'm 5'2" size 6 & wears m to l top. i tried on the medium in the store, it was rather flowing. i liked it. but i didn't like how it fit on the underarm area. it hung very low. so i ordered a petite m. still the same. plus the store the lighting was dark so i didn't realize how see through the shirt was too. had to return it.
Wasn't crazy about this top. it looked great online but in person it's just a boring and lifeless top.

I ordered this dress online. the previous reviews were accurate that it runs small, particularly in the waist. i normally wear a 0 or 2, but i ordered the 4. it fit my waist and hips but was slightly loose at the top even though i am a 34c. i liked the look, but it had a hole where the seams had come apart between the black stripe across the chest and the main fabric. additionally, the black squares were pulled in several places with threads sticking out. i returned it immediately.
The top red is more like orange. was disappointed and returned it
Smells weird, too small, no stretch.

I did a significant amount of research/reading reviews on Amazon, as well as the on the Levi site to make sure I chose the correct size. I'm 5'11", 185lbs with an athletic build and it seemed like the large would be the correct size for me. The overall length and arm length are both what they should be, but the body of the jacket is ridiculously baggy. I mean hilariously baggy. I could almost fit two of my torso in the jacket and still button it comfortably. If this is built for heavy-set people, they should note that in the description. It's insanely baggy with no form of any kind. It's a parachute with sleeves. If I jumped out of an airplane in this thing, I could probably glide to safety like one of those flying squirrels. I tried washing it to shrink it a bit, but all that did was significantly fade the color, and one of the sleeve buttons fell off. Maybe a size small would have fit my torso better, but then the overall length and arm length would be way too short. Super lame.

These pants are designed for slim men, they do not fit fat guys very well. (size 38x32).The pockets are very small. The zipper thigh pocket will hold a passport. The other pockets are too small to use. If you conceal carry, these are not the pants to get !!!
Too small and too short,
It does it's job but the fabric feels a bit cheap.

I’m a medium but ordered a Large so I could wear sweatshirts underneath. The large fit like a 2XL! For someone who is typically a medium.. legit drowning in a L is just silly. Looked like I was a kid wearing my parents coat. Bummer, cause it is really soft & cozy. Returning, but kinda scared to try a medium!
The shirt was very boxy and did not hang well.  The fabric was nice though. I wish it had worked out
The jacket fit weird and tight around the arms. The vest was waaay too small.  It fit more like a medium instead of an xxl. The pants fit ok. I returned for refund

Inferior construction!  The seams are only surged so the seams open in the crotch area. But these are the softest and most comfortable pajama pants I've ever had. Seller and Amazon customer service were unwilling to discount the product so I could fix them myself and keep them. It's best not to buy these unless you're willing to reinforce the crotch seams and pay full price.
You get what you pay for, these blazers are very thin, like paper. Don’t waste your time or money, look elsewhere trust me
I didn't realize that there were sequins on the design. they kept poking my shoulders and made the top very uncomfortable. the white material was also not very flattering on me. it went back.
Cute and really wanted to love these! But they are way too small I originally wear a medium and ordered a large and they are too tight. .

When i saw this jacket in store, i fell in love with it. the colors with the quilting and gold studs are gorgeous. i am 5'3" 130# 36dd with petite frame. i tried a m on in store and the sleeves were super long and wide. the s was too small across chest and hung open oddly. the jacket is a nice heavy weight and great quality. i ordered a petite m and it was no better. i literally looked like a big marshmallow...a linebacker! the sleeves were so unflattering where it looked like i was wearing pvc

I bought these because I guess I assumed they have a liner.  My daughter needed black running shorts for cross country meets so I searched black running shorts and these came up. She'll need to wear bike shorts underneath so that will possibly be annoying trying to run in. Why make shorts in kids sizes that are going to be terribly revealing on the playground or laying on the ground for team stretches. They are also see through and super short.

Have old jeans in this brand/style, 30 inch waist which fit.  New jeans are labeled 30 inch waist and do not fit.  Compared and measured against my old jeans and new jeans are definitely 29 inch waist.  Again, new jeans are labeled 30 inch waist.

The top ran too large and it made me look more bustier than i am and rounder in my midsection by how it fell on me. maybe would've been better for someone with a smaller bust. the quality of the fabric was just okay.
These pants fit perfectly around my waist but when they say loose leg they really mean it! I look like I'm wearing balloon pants.

I have bought 3 pairs of these pants and have the back pockets tear and the stitching come loose and fray. I don't do anything with the back pockets except keep my cellphone in them when walking. The pants are comfortable but 2 began to have these problems by day 45, and 1 within 30 days.

Description of this coat says 100% cotton, I thought I would be able to unzip and remove the polyester lining leaving a 100% cotton jacket. Can't do it. The polyester lining is permanent and thick. All you can remove is the hood.Feels very stuffy like it doesn't breathe when you wear it.So if it's not breathable, what's the point of 100% cotton on the outside?It's practically impossible to find anything that's not polyester crap nowadays, and this is no exception. Way too expensive for what you get.
I saw this on a mannequin in the store and so wanted it to work but was just too oversized and bulky. very good quality and material.

I ordered this because the reviews were outstanding. i am returning it. although the embroidery looks fine on screen, in person it looks cheap and tacky. moreover, the high ruffled neck goes a step too far -- into over-the-top victorian cutesy.
overpriced, to boot.

I waited for this dress to go on sale and when it did i bought it right away. i am disappointed!!! the lace fabric is very stiff. i should have listened to the previous reviewer. i feel like it is poking out on my arms and neck. although i appreciate the careful placements of flowers on the dress, had the fabric been different, i think it would be a great dress.
I like the color blocking of this top, but it was too large and billowy on the bottom. it felt like a pregnancy top so i had to return it as it gave me no shape.

This sweater is so cute and seems high quality. i would love to keep it but it is way too cropped for my taste, going down just below my mid section. i wish it had been cut longer- i would have kept it.

I wish i had read more of the reviews....but thought i would give it a try. the shirt doesn't seem as long as on the model but the armpits are sewn to hit mid shirt. this would be ok if it was the length pictured, but since it isn't it makes you look very boxy. i don't know if i ordered a size too big or if it is just the way the shirt was made. wanted to love for fall.....unfortunately, i am taking back.

here's my issue - wore it once and the colors ran! i was so excited to wear this i didn't even wash the top (i rinsed and dried the bottom, though). and i'm not a swimmer. just let

I'm 5'4", 32c and 125 lbs. i ordered the size 4p and while the color and fabric is pretty, the back and front bodice were much to low to wear a bra even if i were to shorten the straps. it was also very tight across my ribs. despite ordering a petite, the hem was much too long. i ended up returning it.

I really loved this vest online and decided to try it on in store. took it on a vacation. first time wearing it and the color transferred all over my white shirt even though it says it is pre-washed. i am very disappointed considering how expensive this was. overall, it is very cute but it may ruin your clothes so beware!
Even on sale, this was just too pricey for what it is, which is a glorified tank. i liked the straps, but it hangs very wide off your chest.

I really loved this dress in the store when i tried it on the color and fabric were perfect for summer but once i got this home i noticed the placket wouldn't lay flat across the bust like shown in pictures. when i went up a size it was too large under the arms so this one will sadly have to go back to the store.
Length fine.  Ordered 32 inch waist and was marked 32 but was actually closer to 30 inch waist.  Too Small !
Loved loved loved the shirt but...the material was so thin

My 3 daughters and i all wear a size small and are heights range between 5'2 and 5'10 . this dress was sloppy on every one of us. i don't think a size x small would have made a difference. the length is all over the place .i"m not sure how or where you would fit a bra into the picture. on the positive side was very soft. it may work as a beach cover -up.

If you are going for a ridiculously high priced ugly sweater contest, this is the one for you. i normally like clothing with some character and juxtaposition, but this one did not do it for me. i cannot imagine the collar fitting right or flattering anyone, and the mixed layers end up making it look cheap rather than trendy.

I ordered the pretty light pink jacket, along with the black and the navy and the cream....the pink was most most disappointing, it was a dark pink/tan! And the navy was lighter than show, and cream was OK.  I don't think it is a good idea to iron a jacket especially with delicate fabric such as this, so now I pay a taylor/cleaners to do it.  I am only keeping one jacket, the black one and the cream one. Sad, but the others were not acceptable. Cute jacket but not top quality.  The 4 jackets arrived VERY wrinkled!!!  Shipped in tiny plastic mailer bag!
It seems like an ok quality T-shirt, but the neck hole huge.  I guess if you have a really think neck it would be ok, but for a mere mortal body type it was ridiculous looking.

I really wanted to like this because the color is beautiful and the knit is obviously good quality. but the shape is impossible to work with. it doesn't just run big, it just hangs there. really disappointing. it'll have to go back.

I saw this on sale, and it looked lovely online. i really wanted to love it when i received it. it looked great, but once i tried it on, it bunches up in the back. it looks awkward. the lace and small details are pretty, but the fit is just off. returned it in the store.
The shorts had no pocket
I thought the sweater itself was beautiful, but found the fabric to be stiff and itchy.

It just isn't that flattering on me. it looks kind of old and dingy, even though it's brand new. it fits fine, but doesn't do much to highlight my curves. it just kind of hangs there. the length is somewhat awkward (i bought the petite version). maybe it would look good on someone tall and skinny, like the model. it's gathered around the stomach area and longer in the front, which reminded me of maternity wear. it does appear to be pretty well made; top part is lined. overall it's not terrible,

I bought this in size xl. it is so much bigger than i expected. there are panels of material. it really is huge. not flattering at all. still, i kept it. the material is so soft & flowy. i've gotten good use wearing it around the house, doing chores, resting, etc. i wouldn't wear it out doing errands. but, around home, it's perfect for feeling cozy. such a strange cut. i don't know who would look good in it since it can look sloppy. i think many would enjoy wearing it at home.

When you look at the online pictures of the navy colored dress, the stripes are diagonal. however, that is not the case with the dress in person. the stripes are all horizontal and not that flattering. such a bummer because i love maeve dresses and thought this would be a great addition to my summer dress rotation. alas, not very flattering, so back it goes.
I was a little shocked to see a Columbia jacket so flimsy. No lining and it's made out of a lightweight nylon. The child will definitely need a sweater under it. So disappointed.

You get what you pay for. These are fine if you aren’t leaving the house but are very thin and see through. The draw string is very thin as well. The only thing they are good for is lounging around the house and nothing more.
I wanted to like this coat so bad! i loved the bright red color and design, but when i received it, it seemed very cheap and just too large. i returned it.

The fabric’s texture gives away that it’s a cheap blazer. I have my fair share of cheap-but-good Amazon finds, but this one…not so much. The button looks big, too bulbous, and tacky. It’s hard to tell in my pic, but in person it’s pretty bad. If the jacket wasn’t too big and I decided to keep it, I’d literally replace the button.The fabric weave isn’t smooth enough to fool anyone — it’s obviously medium-low quality. Not thin, but its medium-weight feel doesn’t do enough to hide that it’s poor quality. No way could I wear this to a job interview in person. It might work if it was via Zoom.Size L — I often wear sizes medium and large. I got a Large. I’m 145 lbs, 5’4” 38D with broad shoulders, narrow waist, broad hips. The large was BIIIIIG on me. Too big to wear it as a fashionably oversized blazer. It didn’t taper at the waist enough either, so even if it fit me overall, I suspect it would’ve been boxy, and again, not fashionably so on me. Doesn’t have that 90s blazer look. If you’re an apple shape, it might work for you.Too long overall. The arms are eeextra long, and I have somewhat long arms. I suspect the medium would’ve been too long there as well. That said, if you want to wear it with the sleeves cuffed, you can show off the inner lining—that material is quite nice, actually.All-in-all, you’re better off finding a budget blazer at H&M, Ross, etc. I’m returning this and not bothering with trying the medium. It looks better in the pictures than real life.
Color was more grey then white. Too heavy for spring and summer

Some of the sleeves are a little longer. Some little shorter biggest issue is the sleeve section between the armpit and under bicep is about a 15th of an inch long. So you end up with a shoulder cap and then if you're a bigger size the shirt will go down to your knees. So length is as expected but sleeves are jacked up and there is no consistency. I was very excited to finally get me a pair of Chubbies swim trunks. I see the ads everywhere and the designs are pretty cool. However, after receiving a pair I was appalled to see how cheap the material looks and feels. After one day of use the pockets already started having the sewing thread start falling apart.I understand the material needs to be thin to dry out quicker, but this is not what I expected Maybe I got a bad egg? No clue...However, the package was sealed tight brand new.I think UA does a much better job with this kind of technology. Honestly, pure highway robbery for $70.  There are plenty of other vendors with cool design options for under $50 out there. Get one of those instead.

I bought these instead of cheaper ones thinking the quality would make them last longer; I was wrong.  Save the money and just buy the cheap ones.

I intentionally searched for Bamboo, linen, or cotton PJs. It is almost impossible to get the correct items even if the search criteria is specific! I absolutely hate this abt Amazon! So I just got these, tried them on first thing and before washing them, checked the labels...95% polyester AND of course made in China. Cursory look, material/pattern is nice. Very soft. But dang, mislead.

These jeans didn’t last three months before they fell apart. What sort of hard scrabble, rough, grueling work have I put them through to cause this, you ask? Why, I drove my children to school 8 minutes away and drove them home. Well, certainly if I am wearing this $60 pair of jeans day in and day out and and washing them nightly on the old timey washboard out back by the creek… I can’t even finish this fantasy scenario. I live in a modern home in Houston, I’ve worn these occasionally and washed them as such. They’ve been through nothing extreme, and yet I have T-shirts that have lasted over a decade while these things disintegrated less than 90 days after I received them. I am beyond frustrated, particularly since the return period was a month after purchase and these didn’t make it two months beyond that. Shameful.

Product is made for 50-60 degree weather not ski or northern conditions of 0 or minus 10 degree temperatures. A real ski coat would have a very heavy lining and would feel heavy when you pick the coat up. You would sweat if you wore it inside your house.  This is a light coat with minimal lining.  I have a ski coat I have stood outside waiting for a bus at minus ten temperatures for a half an hour  and didn’t feel cold that’s how well a real ski coat feels. That’s why people buy ski coats. This is not a ski coat.

The problem with one size, is that it fits a very small percentage of body types. I should have known better, but the cuteness of the pattern convinced me to purchase it against my better judgment. I am 5’7”, 185 pounds, hourglass figure with a short torso (with mostly boobs that are DDD). My arms aren’t overly long but this sweater was even too short in that respect. This sweater is tight and stretchy, which is the most uncomfortable combination. Plus my torso being so short did nothing to help this very small/boxy fit. So many strikes against it. I usually wear a large or xl, and if your body type is anything like mine than just trust me- this WILL NOT fit you. Yes it’s cute, but now it’s in my closet under the “I’ll wear this when I’m 140 lbs again” clothing graveyard. And nothing will fix the wonky sleeve length unless I cut my arms off. Save your money. If this fits you well, enjoy it; you’re in the 5%.
