It is definitely pinned back on the model in the photograph. it made my 5 foot frame look short and wide.

Had to return. ordered an xs which usually fits perfect. 34b chest and it was falling off. shoulders and chest!! it was like a sleeping bag. huge fan of retailer but there is a design flaw in this sweater.
I did not like the way the pants fit. Don't like the "flex" type  material period.
This one pulled across my shoulders and neck in a creepy way. did not like the way that it fit. returned

I was so excited to get this dress. i need it for a wedding, and i thought i had hit the jackpot. the dress arrived with a small tear. the seams are puckered and badly seen.  for an almost $300.00 dress, the quality is terrible. i expect better from retailer. i'm so disappointed.

I got this for a 10 year old. Not a big kid, if you know what I mean. It is way too small. If I were ordering again, I'd go with a size up at least. Maybe I got a mistake, because this brand is usually on target.
Cup size is really small for a medium. no way to adjust the back strap. ended up giving it to my daughter. cute but so poorly executed.

So this isn’t my first time ordering this dress I have the baby blue one which fit great not gonna lie was a bit big but I was ok with it because it was very comfortable and I loved it. Now this is my second time ordering this dress in pink and it doesn’t fit the same… it’s the same size and everything I put it on excited because it had come in on time for a wedding I had to go to and it’s smaller than the first one. I checked the tags said xx-l but I feels way tighter around my chest and I can’t move my arms up without the sleeves going my to my foreman , idk if the first dress was mislabeled or if it was second one but am very much disappointed that this has happened.As you can see the labels are the same but the difference between material is very obvious
Cheap material. Does not wash well.
Got new pant from Lee, very happy at first but... One week of use and pant look like defective... Friction between legs make the textil soon deformed. Was expecting better from this brand.

These were nice and soft. The only downfall was that One pant leg was shorter than the other.  The shorter leg side of the pj pants was  still long but then again the person wearing them is short. After you wash and dry, they will shrink some.

Like others, i finally received my size 6p black pants after months of waiting.  for starters, these pants run small, so i ordered a size up but still in petite, because i adored the red ones i got this past summer.  when the black pants arrived, they were a full three inches shorter than the red ones (which were also 6p), and the fabric did not feel anywhere close to the same quality.  i'm debating ordering the regular length, but i'm not sure i'll bother, based on some of the other reviews.
I wish hoping to wear this for my bachelorette trip but it is very sheer. Can’t wear it around friends
One line stitching, very weak

Dislikes:1. Material feels rough and unpleasant to the touch compared to smoother material in previous generations of Tiro pants.2. Calf/lower-legs too narrow. I have only medium-sized calves, still too snug.
Shirt is way too small and tight. Not very comfortable.
These are so thin, returned them.
This top is really cute and i love the design. however, the first time i wore it, the waste band started unraveling.

I absolutely love the look and fit of these jeans. i did have to size down. i ran into problems after washing. the fraying on one leg was twice that of the other, looking very unbalanced. after looking closely i found that one leg had a top stitching very close to the fray to prevent further fraying. the other leg did not have this stitching, thus the fraying double in size. i have sent a request to customer service for a replacement pair. these are adorable jeans just be sure to check for stitc

I'd hoped these would be cozy and warm. the fabric is thin and slinky. it grabs and emphasizes every bump and roll. couldn't wait to get them off. just horrible. and that price is very steep. can't recommend.
These are a little tight on me, but will probably fit with some weight loss.

The pants and vest fit as expected and the color was slight lighter than the picture. Material is super light weight and soft (linen blend).  It arrived on time as stated. The only problem was the zipper cover would not lay flat even after it was professionally pressed. The exposed zipper took away from the quality for me.  Otherwise, I would buy it again.

This dress is very cute on. very flouncy. i know it looks like a gingham dress, but it's a more like a silk dress with a gingham pattern. the one issue i had was that it ballooned out at the back where you tied it on any size (bug or small), and i am larger on top, so i don't know what would happen with someone with a small chest. i wouldn't have minded if it did the same thing on the front, but it was just the back.
They are very poor stitching. Will not last very long

Not a huge fan of this dress, will be returning it.
fits too big and not flattering.
fabric is thin and shows any lumps and bumps you may have.
color is not as pretty in person as in the photo - the photo looks like a nice rust color but the dress is actually a boring brownish olive.
Not sure why it has gotten good ratings and or why sold out online periodically. awkward fit and flares quit a bit at waist. also has extra material at waist line so does not look flattering.

I couldn't believe there weren't more reviews complaining about the arm size... then i found them!  yes, this is a cute shirt, if you have toothpicks for arms!  so true!  the shirt is adorable... a bit guazy (so not going to be super warm for fall/winter... but i live in cali so that's not an issue).  but, my arms aren't even big, and this shirt is so snug around my arms!  unfortunately it's going back :(

This dress is super cute - and fits tts for retailer. i ordered my usual size small and it fit me great everywhere, however the arms are much shorter and hit me either wrong, or the model in the picture is just very,very small. i'm 5'10, 136#, 36aa, slim built and the dress fits, but the arms bunch up -- if i ordered a medium the entire dress would be too baggy (and it is a loose fitting shift). bummer, bc it is super cute! also, the material is loose crochet - my dress arrived with a pull. sad fa

5’3 … 200lbs and ordered an XL and it was little big. The neck line and straps needed to be taken UP. If that mAkes any sense. The blue color is absolutely beautiful in person! Good quality fabric!!! If you’re a PLUS SIZE gal you may need to wear spank underneath because it did show my dimples and cellulite without spank on. I ended up ordering a LARGE and it fit much better than XL.I wanted to give this dress 5 stars but it snags pretty easily so be careful for bracelets getting caught and leaving some distressed areas

The fit, once you get it on is as flattering as can be. its beautiful quality is undeniable. the problem and it's a big one...you can't get it on without destroying your nails. the beautiful little buttons running up the bodice are impossible to get done and undone. 'dear designer, you forgot the zipper. sincerely, women everywhere'. i loved it so much but just couldn't buy an outfit that was going to take me 20 minutes to put on and since it is a jumper it would be a process throughout wearing
I'm 5'10" and 190 I found my shirts ran small 1 size for me. These shirts are very fashionable but for me I prefer a Dickies T ,which is a little heavier material. Still have to reorder 1 size up.
Zipper does not easily close and zipper tab is too short.
Relaxed fit, soft and comfortable. interesting design but material is extremely thin. if i had purchased this at full price, i probably would have returned it. it seems more like a pajama top...
The fit was way off — much too long and loose

Very pretty dress and nicely made (the embroidery is quite lovely and double lining, as mentioned by the other reviewers, is awesome), but not a good shape for me and my hourglass figure. like a lot of swing dresses, it has no structure, and it's not a good look on someone a little busty, as i am. in all honesty, i thought the sack-like shape of the dress made me look 20 lbs heavier than i am. i am a medium, size 6-8, and took the 8 based on the other reviews. i probably could have sized down to

I love this dress, the only issue is i ordered on-line and it came from a store location not the warehouse so it came dirty on the bottom and wrinkled! 
once i washed it (yes its washable) it looked fantastic!!!

Dang, i got a small and was still swimming in it. it's made of the fabric that increasingly seems to be the fabric of choice for all things t-shirty- soft and thin-ish, a bit translucent. i'd rather wait for something more formfitting and flattering- back it went.
Sweat pants would be good except way too long and I am 5’6”.
This shirt is really thin and clings to the chest and gut too much.

I agree the light colored portion of dress is not vanilla; it is more beige color. i liked the dress a lot, it had a flattering fit on me, extremely comfortable and then i noticed the black mesh portion at top of dress. it did not lay flat at the outer sides between the mesh and floral fabrics like the picture. it poked out on both sides at least 1" which suddenly made the dress look cheap and ill fitting. i can guess either the mesh pattern piece was not cut correctly or it was not sewn correct

I was really looking forward to getting this dress in the orange print, but when i finally received, i was a little disappointed. the print placement is not the same as shown on the model, so it doesn't look as a vibrant and colorful. my version of the dress has more of that muddy dark print and hardly any orange or turquoise. also the backside of the print is white and the dress is not lined. i do like the way it drapes on my body.
The color of this top is lovely. however, i felt the quality was lacking for the price. the fabric is thin and the top i tried on in the store had some loose threads already. fit was tts for me.
There was a pink mark near the neck line. With one wash and dry the mark disappeared.
While the styling is cute, the fit was poor under the arms and there was quite a gap. i returned this.
Little small
Comfortable, stretchy fabric. i ordered the xs and will probably take the sides in at least a couple of inches for a snugger fit...the fit is looser than it looks on the model.
It's really cute but seems expensive for the type of fabric. i thought it would be more substantial. got lots of compliments .
Totally pretty but not crazy flattering. a bit wide in the hip area if you are not tall. good on sale but i wouldn't pay full price.

I have worn 37x34 jeans for  over 30 years. This particularly pair was erroneously cut to a 37” length. I had to take them to a tailor to get them to the right size, for $16
Too tight at waist, too loose in leg.
Good value.  Fabric is lighter than I expected, but also cooler and comfortable.  Stitching around the pants button was frayed and button hole was a bit too tight for the button.

If it matters, I bought the Lake Merritt ones - they are MUCH cheaper than the others, and perhaps this is why - these aren't jeans.  I mean, I own some 541 stretch jeans.  I really like the fit.  I used to get loose fit and I've decided I'm tired of looking sloppy so moved to this fit.  My other ones are jeans, you know, slightly thick denim fabric.I have a wife, daughter, and granddaughter - I've seen enough leggings to know what leggings are, and that's what these are.  They're SUPER stretchy...almost jean yoga pants!  Oddly, like jeans they do loosen and hang after a while, but they so thin that I'm wondering how many uses I'm going to get out of them.  Considering the cost, I guess I should expect that, but just want to be sure people understand that some of these jeans just aren't jeans.

This product is cute and is pretty comfy for sleeping.  However, the pants are made for a WNBA center: minimum height of 6'6".  I'm 5'6" and the bottom of the pants hit well past the end of my toes.  I guess I'll have to hem them, but there's a cute trim at the bottom of the legs that I'll lose once I do that.  I haven't washed them yet, so maybe they'll shrink a bit, but I doubt it will take a foot off the length.

The picture is a burnt orange. What I got was a bright orange. I have not worn it yet but kept it just the same as my partner thinks I need to add color to my wardrobe. This will definitely take some warming up to.
I ordered size large and find this to be way too oversized, wide, long and unattractive on my frame. the print is just okay but since it doesn't wow me, i'm returning.
I liked the quality of the top and the design. but when i got a top that fit well across the chest, it was shorter than i usually like my tops, so i will be returning it.

This top is adorable in style and fit. which is why it breaks my heart that i can't recommend it. the embroidery snags so easily, when i wore it, i ended up with several tears in the threads, leaving the pattern a bit of a mess. it snagged on my rings, my watch and my purse. i returned it because of this. it's really too bad, and i wish the design were printed on instead of sewn, simply because it would last a lot longer.
I’ve purchased a number of this style jean in dark blue, short and long, this color ran at least a full size smaller.
This sweater has a flaw in the stitching on the left sleeve. I would like a replacement sweater.
Feels rough

I wanted to love this top but couldn't. i am curvy (36/27/39; 32dd) and this accentuated my hips (which is not needed) and made my chest/whole shape seem boxy. i could only recommend this top to someone who is smaller chested with a straight build- the bottom would help give some shape; pleating on front would help chest seem larger. i did love the color and construction, lace details, 3/4 sleeves.
I loved the color of these but they bagged out with just one wear. they are going back to store.

I loved the romantic look of this robe and gown set, but the material was very thin and wrinkled and needs to be ironed. the m/l was uncomfortable and i normally wear only a m. sadly, i returned the set.

Ordered size 12, it fits but pulls a tiny bit in the midsection. also way too long, hits below my knees. the dress is beautiful: crisp black color, nice fabric, great neck. it's also the kind of dress that must fit well to look good. i had to return mine.

This picture does not do this skirt justice. it is gorgeous. however, the waist was so small that the sequins dug into my waist making me think of a medieval torture device. unfortunately, it was the largest size so i can't size up. i'm 4'11" so the length was perfect - it came to right above my knees. i love the skirt so much that i'm considering liposuction.

First of all, the colors are really pretty, fabrics feel really nice. but.... the fit was no bueno. i think if you are tall and small chested, this dress would look great. but i'm short and large chested and it was very unflattering. when the fabric transitions from the stripes to solid, it doesn't hang nicely due to my chest. sadly this is a return for me.

Was told by the coach to buy these pants for my 8 year old son.  He fits in a size right between 8 and 10 for most pants but since most pants run either size 8 or 10-12 this has been a problem because the length is usually right but the waist is way too large.  I bought both the size 8 and the size 10.  We kept the size 8 and returned the 10 because the length and the waistband on the 10 were huge in comparison to most of the other pants he owns.  The 8 was exactly the correct length.  Not flood pants and not dragging on the ground and the waist was comfortable but not too snug.  The sheerness is a problem.  I was told to buy all white socks with no stripes and white boxer briefs because you can see through these pants.  I would have expected better from a brand like Under Armour.  Perhaps a thin lining or more opaque fabric in the white pants.
I was hoping for a bright, vibrant green as shown on the photo, but the blazer is forest green. I still like it, but I'm disappointed.

I wanted to love this dress. Length is great for office but if you have any flaws or leg/thigh imperfections they show through the material & personally that's not professional for my job. Material isn't too thin it's just very soft & just isn't flattering on every figure. Love that the material is airy, great for summer, just not great for my body. If I were a less curvy one, this would've fit great. I'm a "hippy" woman (large hips) I ordered a LG. Upper body of the dress is loose but fit well for work.

The material and construction of the pants are great, but the length is just plain awkward. i'm 5'4" and the regular came to just above my ankles, and looked as though they had shrunk in the wash in a really bad way. a couple of inches longer and they would've been fine, or i could've gotten them in petite and worn them as true ankle-length pants, but the regular just didn't do it for me. also i'm usually a size 6 (5'4", 125lbs) and these were a little baggy around the waist and hips.

The fabric is absolutely lovely on these, but very thin. the top part was tighter than usual (and i sized up from my regular pilcro jean size) and they flare a lot. so the thin, tight top was not a flattering look. the rise also felt short. 

i'm 5' 4" with a 30" inseam and the regular length just hovered above my ankles. my husband burst out laughing when i tried them on, which is never a good reaction!  even if i hemmed them, i think these are a miss for me. will be returning.

better for
These pajama pants are beautiful but very sheer and very delicate.  not ideal for a mom with kids
Love the colors and design, however the sweather is much boxier than what the photo shows, and it is itchy. i am still deciding as it might be fine with a shirt worn underneath it.

I ordered this in black and white, thinking you can never have enough silk camisoles. 

i returned the black because it looked like polyester. the white is actually a cream/ivory, not bright white as pictured. it is also not the best feeling quality, however the fit is good, and true to size.

While I love the fit of this jacket, I wore once golfing and realized all the stitching on the arms had either pulled out or pilled. It looked terrible. I realized the rubbing on the zipper must have caused  it. So if you plan on moving your arms across your body maybe choose a different jacket. Interestingly this only happened with the black jacket not the charcoal grey.
Cute but too thick and rough

Have had similar UA shorts that I bought at a store that held up for at least a few years.  These are feel worn on the front on both sides. Only been a few washes. Feel like its not the real UA quality.

I read all reviews and i decided to try as the price was great. first of all i am 5'6" 145 lbs, athletic build (not skinny but have muscles). the sweater fits great, just like glove, it does not make me look fat. the quality is great,sweater is warm, cozy and well-made. i am not sure about color as it's brighter as it shown. it is not quite coral, it's a little bit darker which will make it difficult to match it with. the sleeves run small so if you are taller then me just keep it in mind. th sw

I love these pants -- bought them in the mustard color. my only complaint is that they are not colorfast -- i washed them in cold water with other colored items -- most of which belonged to my husband. not good -- and pretty much ruined an entire load of laundry except for these pants. retailer -- please color test your garments. there is really no excuse for fabrics like this to run in this day and age!
Wanted a dress that would hide my stomach. This dress sort of highlights it. Not a good look for me. Pass

Sadly enough, this jacket didn't even approach fitting or looking like a "boyfriend jacket". The sleeves were down to my fingertips, the waist and bust were tight and all, in all, it was far from an XL fit, no less a "roomy" XL fit.Reviews said to order in your size. Others said to size up. I don't even know whether sizing up would have worked. The jacket was disappointingly just too skimpy.
Loved the idea of this but content felt too thin and sheer.
There lightweight however the knit material will not survive to many wash loads
The material looks fancy. The downside is that it is too low cut and moves down even if you try to adjust it in place. A bit sheer in the stomach area.
I really like these pants. However, the pocket lining is absolutely garbage and rips immediately after putting anything remotely pointy inside. The pocket lining is made from wet toilet paper.
Wasn't happy with the color, the white was greyish.Also quite sheer.Material quality is good.
These run very large.  i wear a 25 or 26 in paige jeans, and the 25 in these shorts were way too big.  i fear if i got the 24 they would be a little short.

I nearly always wear a size small, and sometimes even a small is too large. not in this case; this top is extremely snug. i would not be able to wear this, and i would've returned for a larger size but the ivory color was a little too yellow for me. in the online photo. the color is more of an off-white than ivory yellow. i'm guessing also that this fabric may not stand the test of time and easily snag. but that's just conjecture.

The pattern is cute. it's a little more subtle than in the photos. the problems were the skirt are 1: pretty sure it will wrinkle in two seconds and 2: it has buttons down the front of it with no lining behind it. which means, if you sit down wearing this skirt and it doesn't lay quite right, it gaps and you can see whatever is or is not underneath! the buttons are like two inches apart, so it's not a tiny little gap. no thanks. also, this skirt fir true to size, it wasn't tight, just gappy.
They’re very comfy and soft. Just not secure and stretch through the day. Feel more like boxers than biker shorts and wouldn’t wear these out in public because they’re more like pjs.

This jumpsuit is gorgeous...on the right body. if you have a tiny rib cage and a flat stomach and an average to short torso, this may fit you beautifully. on me, the defined gathered area you see in the photo was very tight and hit me in an odd place. the fabric is a great weight and it is a beautiful and rich looking. i really wanted this to work out for me. as for size, i found it just a little tight in the hips, waist and rib cage.
High quality BUT very long sleeves the XL was too big the L is too tight.

Usually wear an XL in jackets if I want to be comfortable.  Ordered XL and it was way too big.  Reordered and got the large - it just fits - actually wish it was just a little bigger.  Such a difference between the XL and L, but I do like the jacket a lot so I kept the large and am wearing it.

I wanted to love this, as it seemed like a fun and carefree take on a little black dress.

but how did i not see that this has tassels? but they're there, a whole row of them - look hear the bottom of the skirt part, between the colorful stripes and the lacy area. that's a deal breaker for me - i really can't stand the way these look, and they're not the sort of thing you can easily remove.

the fabric, though nice quality, has no stretch at all. i wasn't expecting stretch, but i'd just say

Ok so this top is as cute in person as it is online. runs very small as theres no stretch or give in fabric. i normally wear 12 and i couldnt even halfway get this on lol. i may consider a 14-16 but the stores didnt have this yet to try on. the ladies at the counter were crushing on this top though!
if you can find your fit this top is great for layering!

I bought this sweater online and was surprised by how thick and fluffy it is. this is a warm and cozy sweater, more bulky than oversized. pattern has a comic book-style art look. it has raglan sleeves and a boxy cut and narrows a bit at the waist. cute, warm sweater for winter--wore with an undershirt.

The problem with off the shoulder tops is that the neckline is totally elastisized , therefore upon any movement of your arms the top pops above your shoulders making it go from stylish to matronly . the only elastic should be right at the shoulders , the rest of the neckline should be a simple finished hem. .

I was on the fence about this dress because even on the model, it's a little bit frumpy, but it was so pretty that i tried it. however, on my short frame, it's even frumpier. the quality is very good, the fabric is soft and it's lined. the pattern is really pretty and delicate and i wish it was more flattering. i think the only way this dress will look good is if you are quite tall and thin. i am 5'4", 110 lbs with large-ish hips and i ordered a 2p, but even the petite was too saggy. i needed a

This dress has a beautiful purple paisley print and reminds me of classic retailer from years ago. i wanted to love the dress but it runs extremely large. i usually wear a 00p or xxsp and got this in an xxsp but was still way too big. while the intent is to be flowy, i was overwhelmed by the bagginess and it changes the style from flowy to bag-like. while the belt helps cinch the waist, i had too much bunching in the waist area making it unattractive. very disappointed as its such a pretty

I so wanted this blouse to work. the lacework is beautiful, and it is a substantial and well made top. the neck fits well, which is not a given for this style top, and i really like the 3/4 length sleeves. but the top billows out like a tent on me in all directions, and it was an awkward length on me (not quite hip length, not quite tunic). wish this were cut a little straighter and longer. i'm 5'4", 120 lbs and tried a size s.
This dress is very pretty and we'll made. it runs pretty big though and i would suggest going a size down.
Great fabric but unfortunately it did not look good on me. maybe on a tall person, i'm only 5'4". really wanted to like this...

This is a nice sweater. I ordered it a size bigger to get the extra oversized look. Well it was loose fitted but Definitely nothing like the picture. It is a cute sweater but to get this look you might have to size up 5 sizes.
This sweater is big and box. it looks very similar on as it does on the model. as other reviewers have mentioned, the embroidery on the shoulders is a bit itchy.

These were supposed to be 33” waist. The label says 33” waist, but these pants are at least 36”. I’m assuming this was a mislabeled factory mistake or defect, as all the other Lee jeans I have purchased in this size fit perfectly. Otherwise, quality fabric and stitching. Great jeans for the price.

This is a lovely dress, but much more casual than i thought from the picture. the material is very thin and casual. i needed a dressier dress, and i didn't need another casual dress, so i sent it back, but it would be fine if you want something casual.
Too boxy and big. Not flattering.

I followed the reviews and bought a larger size in the blue stripe. i am usually a size 8 but ordered a 12 (ok, maybe overkill). i usually have problems with sleeves being too tight, but this was way too big and tent like. i will be hopefully exchanging it in store for a smaller size. stay tuned for an update!
I went by the size chart,but I ended up with way too big

This sweater caught my eye and the positive reviews and pre-holiday sale had me try it. loved the color and cut but surprisingly not the embroidery. i felt like i'd wear it a couple of times and then tire of it. my husband and daughter both said, "meh," so back it went.

I really wanted to like this dress and was encouraged by the positive reviews. the dress itself was very comfortable but was very unflattering. the top fabric hit my ribs funny and made me look really wide.

This silk skirt was not the best look for me, but may work for others. i purchased the med, which fit fine. i just wasn't in love with the print/colors. the skirt has quality material and is well made. it's very light and airy. i did return it.
Everything's great minus the long legs
Fit tight and high up on neck, was also tight on arms

The pink version of this top finally arrived -- nearly 2 months after ordering.  the expected delivery date kept slipping.  the color is not as shown online.  online it looks like a light pink.  the actual top was more of taupe color.  it's a basic tee with pretty ruffling at the bottom.  not enough to keep.

This cute dress was very nice on. however my only reservations were the thickness in the arm sleeves. the dress has this thick curtain like material on the sleeves that seemed to big and cut way to wide for my skinny arms. i thought about bringing this to the tailor but i feel it would be a lot of work and the bulkiness of the arms would just be the same.
other than that the colors and dress are beautiful.

Construction excellent. the dress was pretty big around the hip...does not have a shape like seen in the picture. the fabric was beautiful but was stiff...like furniture. the color was not as vibrant as the picture. returned.

This dress felt small in torso and waist and suffocating in sleeves ( i do have average athletic arms). but the shoulders were cut so wide that one side was falling off, as i fix, one shoulder, another will slide down.
the material is nice but since it is not lined, it feels inexpensive, disposable.

This runs huge, not large, huge; and hung in quite a baggy way. bought a medium ( 5'10, 150 lbs) and i could have gotten an x-tra small. maybe if there were free shipping i would have reordered, but now its just too much of a hassle
Top is very wide and flowy. i am petite with large chest so it hung from widest point and was not flattering. would be very cute with the right body shape.
I’m mid size curvy, normal 12/14 or 31 jean size, so I got a 31 and they were way too small ):
I've never had this kind of shorts before, they are very comfortable.

I ordered the xxs p, but the actual cardigan is a xs p.  i was bummed as the xxs p are sold out. well, it fits ok anyway. (115 lbs, 30dd, 26.5 in waist)
beautiful sweater but oh so itchy. i think wool should be listed first (like ingredients) it is really itchy. why i so torn. i want to keep it because it is nice, but it is itchy. i will have to try it with a long sleeve shirt underneath, i don't think i can hang with ah short sleeve or sleeveless. colors and pattern are warm neutral, not red.

This is an okay blazer. There isn't a button to fasten it at the waist, and it fits a little baggy. The color orange, however, is way too bright. I feel like a traffic cone in it. Not my cup of tea, but if you like super bright colors, then this color is for you!
This shirt is absolutely beautiful. however, it runs very small. proportion-wise it's okay in the shoulders, bust, and back but it's too short! definitely order up!
Ok- I want to love this blazer,but it's missing pockets. Like, why?! I also wish it had more stretch, but overall the fit is good. I'd still recommend this blazer.
Hangs terribly off the chest. tent-like. looks maternity. no thanks.

I tugged at the waistband, then pulled these on without even unbuttoning or zipping! That's how stretchy these pants are at the top. Too weird. I even ordered a sized down. They probably shouldn't have even fit at all. They weren't huge, but I wanted them to fit better in places for my aging body - lol. I wanted the fabric to consist of mostly cotton. I mean, they're Levi's, right? I didn't want leggings type fabric. The style is very good, not skinny, not wide, or boot-cut. Very straight like 90s jeans. The fabric is far more substantial than, say, ON jeans.  Also, the description states the size Short pants should be 27/30, but they are actually labeled 27/28 size 4 in reality. Disappointing. Will be sizing down *again* and ordering 26 Regular, hoping the length will be 30" as I've seen in another review. Will probably update later.Update: Received replacement and they were imperfect, some kind of stain or something on the leg. Pants are so incredibly stretchy, not really what I expected in Levi's at all. Not the quality I was expecting. Also, even the smallest size available 26 (2) reg could probably fit size 6. They seem ok for around the house I guess. Not wide legged, similar to slim straight 90s jeans. Short is 28", Regular length is 30". Rise is a little bit higher on me than mid rise.Final decision:  I think these are too stretchy and have such a low cotton content, they don't really feel like Levi's, more like Levi's Signature jeans. They're really just too stretchy and loose in the lower stomach that they're not flattering there. I expected better from Levi's.

I have a love-hate relationship with this dress. the fabric and print are beautiful but like most swing styles, this dress doesn't work if you're curvy. tried on an xs in the store which was huge, ordered an xxsp, the length was perfect but the dress does nothing for a pear-shape. looks marginally better cinched in with the belt but i was lost in all the fabric and the skimming nature of the dress did nothing for me. as my boyfriend said, "that looks like something you'd wear if you were pregnan

I loved the pattern, color and mock turtleneck style of this top, but it was just too short on me. i purchased the xs in the ivory color (i am 5'5", 32d, 110 lbs for reference). i had planned to layer this under jackets for work, but every time i raised my arms, you could see my stomach. i would not have felt comfortable wearing it to work because of this. the fit was slightly boxy also, and it was not flattering when i tucked it into a skirt because the boxy shape caused the shirt to bunch up s
Fits well through the shoulders and arms, but there is zero waist, and it just looks like a bunch of extra fabric hanging from the top. super cute, but have to return because of that.

This shirt is really pretty but the sleeves are so small. i normally wear between a 4 to a 6 or a size medium and i could not get this shirt on. i wish it fit but a size large would have been way to long and loose.

I ordered this item when it was first advertised, fell in love with the unique pattern in the top and could hardly wait for it to get here. however when i received the top i was very disappointed, the fabric is cheap, the sleeves are tight and the overall product is of poor quality and poorly constructed. needless to say i returned it.

It looked pretty on the model and I thought it  was a softer fabric but it’s cottony and not too comfortable for a dinner out. The button hoop (hard elastic) at the top of the back of the shirt is too small to button the neck so I had to pin it. I should have returned it but I had worn it and wasn’t sure of their policy. I’m living and learning the hard way on the ‘Zon

This is a cute dress but the fabric is very heavy and i didn't find it to drape well on me. it is a very heavy felted poly type of fabric. i ordered it for a specific event coming up this summer and the fabric will not work for warm temps. the style and design of the dress is great though. for reference it did fit fairly true to size. i wear a 0 or 2. the xs fit well. if the fabric works for your situation then i would try this dress.

Not good for for an hourglass shape. lots and lots of pretty fabric, but the waist hits just where the hips widen--very bohemian (just no good for a figure 8). the sizing is generous. with both elastic and a zipper, there's room to go small if between sizes, be aware: the plunge at the front is wide and dramatic. i dropped the hangar in the dressing room and had to clutch fabric close to my reasonably-modest c-cup so as not to spill out. would perhaps work on a very narrow person who's completel
Love the quality and puff sleeves but had to return because the neck was very tight.
I should’ve kept “tent” dress in mind, because I am normally a medium and was swimming in this (and I wear a 32H bra). I’d recommend this if you’re pregnant or want to hide most of your body.

I love the look of this dress & had high hopes, but it didn't live up to them. have no doubt that it is well made & beautiful, fully lined with lovely detailing around the neck. i am 5'6", 155lbs with a postpartum belly that i'd like to hide, so i chose this dress as the reviews say it's a bit loose & forgiving. i found it to be so loose that it looks big & entirely hides my figure! i considered ordering a small, but knew that it was simply the cut of the dress & going down a size wouldn't chang

I like this shirt, want to love it. i am keeping this shirt hoping to have better arms by summer when i can where this top with black shorts. this shirt does cling, it's a draping sort of fabric; i love how it drapes in the front. only because i am not happy with my arms do i where a cardi with it. also, the underarm area is rather open so i'll wear a bandeau when i wear this without a cardi.

This knit shirt is too thin, as most knit shirts i find are. i got this in the white, and was excited to try it on due to the fitted cut and cap sleeves. the upper part was great but the waist was too large for me, and was actually too long. had to return, especially for the cost. i purchased the xxs , which normally fits me.

These are beautiful pants, especially when you walk, they are simply beautiful and flow nicely. however, they are soooo very long (i am 5 5 1/2) and even with a big wedge's i would have to get these altered. the waist seemed very small, i am a sz 12 (10 in some stores) and i got the large and it was way too tight in the waist and have no stretch or give at all. . probably a sz 10 at most. so unfortunetly they have to go back.

Lightweight, airy silk. it's not shown in the photos but it has a half slip which is too noticeable through the thin silk. it looks somewhat cheap. the silk doesn't feel smooth to the touch. it has a slight roughness to it. it would have been nicer if they had used thicker, higher quality silk. the waist has a tight, wide, elastic band which after wearing for awhile feels uncomfortable. the color of the skirt is true to the photos. i wanted to love this skirt but i will be returning it.

This dress looked like something i would wear and covet for years. unfortunately it was loose in the places where it should show shape and was tight in others. the bodice is incredibly small and not meant for bigger chested women. while the fabric is beautiful, overall the dress did not look like much. disappointed.

While this dress is adorable and the material is breathable and comfortable on, this dress unfortunately was WAY too short for this 5'9" girl. The hem did not fall anywhere near what you see in the picture.
I really liked the fabric and look of this top, but i was swimming in fabric.  there was so much that the top felt heavy.  i returned it.

I ordered my usual size and i think the length and the top (chest/arms) for great. however the bottom is more of a swing style than a straight or slight a-line as depicted in the stock photo. there is too much fabric in the stomach area and just not flattering.

This blazer is a nice weight for summer. it is more terracotta than rose, but is still a nice color. the fit is tts and flattering. however, the buttons were almost falling off the one i received. i didn't take this as a sign of great quality and plan to return it.
This is a cute top but unfortunately when i washed it (delicate, cold water, line dry) it shrunk excessively in length. i'm very disappointed.
Nice lines, just a bit tight if you have larger / more muscley shoulders.

I was really looking forward to getting this top but what a disappointment. it is absolutely huge! i normally wear a large and i think a small would have fit me and a small never fits me. too bad cause it's such a pretty top. p.s. this has an attached camis (which i hate).
These shorts look nice and are comfortable, but one of the pairs is already coming apart at the seam in the back and has only been worn and washed twice. Definitely a bummer.
ordered my size an the pants were too big an baggy

I loved this dress and ordered it online. i found the colors to be a bit more muted than i expected, and unfortunately the fabric quality seemed low considering the price point. ultimately i decided to return it as i couldn't justify spending $178 on a dress that didn't seem as well made as i would expect from retailer.

I bought the orange color. i had a hard time styling it as it is so long. since it is a turtleneck and short sleeve, you'll need a jacket or sweater on top. nothing looked right. it has a relatively high and tight neck, so sweaters looked weird. short jackets didn't work either. i'm 5'4" and bought the small. returned it for the charente cowl neck which worked much better

I really had high hopes for this dress. i had several issues with it, though based on the high ratings other customers did not experience the same problems. 
1- it was to short. i am 5'8" and it was really really short on me. i could not sit down in it. 
2- i found that it ran large. i've lost some weight recently, so perhaps i've gone down a size, but the medium was like a sack on me. 
3-the waist was really roomy. it ballooned out to the point that it was comical. 
4- as others have noted,

The jacket was made of a thick polyester fabric, and although I used the size chart for measurements, and sized up, it was much too small/tight in the waist. I tried seeing if it would work, but it simply didn't hang right, so it was sent back.

These either have extremely poor quality control or the fit varies between color. FYI the gray was loose on me and the kacki are tight. Same size. I'm working on losing weight so it won't be a long term issue.
They fit ok but are baggies than expected. Back pocket sewn shut. I had to cut it away.

I've been looking at this jacket on line and finally went to the store to try it on. i really liked the styling but the denim was quite stiff. i'd prefer a softer kind of fabric. i wonder if it would soften if it was washed. also, it ran surprisingly small. i usually take an xsmall or small but the small didn't leave me enough room to comfortably bend my arms. the medium worked better. i wonder how others feel about the fabric and and the sizing. i think i'll wait and see if this one goes on sal

This top runs very large. i am a size 12/14 & purchased the size l. i could have easily fit in the size m. it's a pretty top in a comfortable knit fabric , but the size was overwhelming so i returned it.

This is a fantastic sweater--really soft, great details. but it's huge. i'm generally between an xs and a s at retailer, and most always an xs with pure + good. but this time even the xs is huge! i wish they offered this one in an xxs. i love it so much that i may keep it anyway? it's really comfortable and i love the style. looks decent with my arms down (like the model's pose), but when my arms are lifted out to either side, it really looks huge. i'll have to think on this one.

This hoodie is beautiful, soft and flattering. but the soft fabric pilled badly after one wearing and it's probably going to look ratty after a few washings. i might accept pilling in a $30 sweatshirt but not at this price. i don't really want to take it back but i will. (i've complained to retailer employees in the past about other clothes pilling and poor quality, and they've always said i could bring it back)
Nice jacket.  Returned it, I was not a fan of the color.

The shirt is well made, the thickness is a good fall piece. The length of this shirt is short over the belly button short. I did try it with a high wasted skirt and it went well, but I didn’t want to be limited to one outfit so it went back. 14/16 XL was fine.
The color and design/style are cute but i found this to be too oversized. if you want to layer it, then it might be for you, but i was hoping for more of a tailored look.

I actually love these jeans. Great value, nice fit, love the stretch. I don't know if I just got a flawed one, or if this is the way they are all made, but the fly is short, doesn't zip down far enough. Since I have to drop my pants to pee, I can't wear them in public.

The details on this dress are lovely. the embroidery is wonderful. but the fit on this dress is just not for me. it is very baggy and shapeless. it doesn't have any curves at all so it just drapes down me and looks formless. really unflattering. sad but it's going back.

I love the fabric and pattern of this dress so much that i decided to keep it (got it on mega sale), but i would have never paid full price or anything close. the armholes are enormous, showing bra and all. i am not particularly large chested (34c), and the buttons are stretched to gaping on me, even with the huge armholes. i have a cute red sweater coat that i will wear over it all fall, but i could not recommend it because of the poor cut design.
pros: great pattern, fabric, pockets, true to
I'm so disappointed with the fit of this top. it is extremely short, even for my 5'2 frame. sizing up will not fix the length. too bad, because the shirt is cute.

I didn't really like the gray pair but each person is different. I did order the black pair and loved them! I thought the gray was a little see through for me, but it may not be that way for everyone. I would defiantly order the black though!
Fit and quality are excellent for the price. Photos showed a somewhat faded orange/ peach but the shirt is very bright (loud).

This dress is very pretty and feminine but was unfortunatly much too large for me. i ordered my regular xs and it was swimming on me. i also found the embroidery to be imperfect in several places (unraveling) and the placement of the embroidered designs were uneven at the bottom of the dress, which threw off the flow. the largest medallion was off center in the front of the dress and gave it a crooked effect. the material is nice and the pockets are a plus but i returned it.
One pair had a hole in the side where the seam wasn't finished.

This top has a lot of potential (comfortable, easy to wear) but it's cut too small in the area above the bust. i tried the top in small, medium and large (i usually wear s or m in retailer tops) and couldn't get that area to not look tight or like it was pulling. you can see it on the model, too -- that space right above the bra near the armhole. i think you'd need to order a size up to get that space to work but then the top will start to look too big on the bottom. 
i tried the green in the sto
I love the design of the shirt, but I don’t really care for the material.

I have been searching for grey jeans and haven?t found anything that i truly love. i tried on both a 25p and 26p. the 25p was too tight and i don?t think they would have stretched out enough for me to be comfortable in. the 26p was close but i was afraid they would stretch out too much. they looked good from the front but did nothing for my cushion. the color, length and feel of the jeans was perfect. in the end they went back and the hunt continues for grey jeans. i would recommend trying these
I didn’t give 5 stars because I bought a size large and washed it once and now it’s medium. If I had known this I would have ordered X-large, as large is my normal shirt size.
I like this sweater but the neck fits kind of strange
I definitely like unique things, but the sleeves are way too much on this sweater.  it's a shame because it is so soft and comfortable, but overall i felt it looked somewhat silly on me.
I am all for a cute flowy tee but this one felt like i was swimming a bit. if you're a true xs, i'd skip this one. however, if you are able to size down i think it would look really great!

As another reviewer mentioned, maeve really needs to get their sizing under control and more consistent. i ordered a 4, and while it fits, i think a 6 would be more comfortable in the arms and shoulders (and i'm a thin build). the length on this was also a little weird to me...a little swingy/flared, but also short, making me feel like i'd always be playing with it while wearing. the orange print is absolutely adorable, i just wish the cut were more similar to past buttondowns that maeve has don

So, this is a super soft comfy sweater. the color is great and i really wanted to love it. but the dolman sleeves sort of annoyed me. that being said, all of the good things about this sweater almost made me keep it. the neckline is also really neat. it drapes nicely, and stays that way. if you are on the fence give it a try!

Wow was this top huge on me! i am usually a large, but lean towards xl when things don't have stretch. i sized up out of fear that my bust couldn't squeeze into a large (36dd) and i didn't want the buttons in the back to gape. when i took this out of the package (i purchased the blue) i knew right away it was way too big. looked like it could fit my husband. the sides poofed out so far, i looked ridiculous (if you look at the photos, the model is trying very hard to control the poofiness with he
This sweater was unflattering me, very boxy and did not fall on me like the model. soft fabric and looks nice off, however this one went back.

I'm conflicted. The shirts are comfortable. The arms and waist fit pretty well. Every shirt the neck area is very loose and looks stretched out though. Which is unflattering if you're wearing these out of the house. I only wear them in the house so it's no bother, but I wouldn't wear them out.

So much odd stuff going on here with the cut/fit. the top is sort of tight in the bust, even with a small chest. the sleeves are dolman-style and are billowy at the top, but then tight on even my skinny arms. the slip plus the dress itself took me a good 5 minutes to figure out how to put on...just too much effort. it is otherwise a beautiful pattern, color, and length. just a miss for me personally in the fit department. bummer!
Now I have to lose weight to fit in them - oh well
Love feel of material.  Wish it was longer sleeves.  Big one:. the sewing is unravelling!!!  These weren't inexpensive;. I had expected good quality workmanship...
It is a beautiful coat, runs small. arms feel tight, i am typically xs, i can't even button it up. bottom is skirted, and falls beautifully. it is light weight coat, not really fit for cold weather.
This sweater was okay! The material was kind of rough, not super soft. It wasn’t that stretchy of material either! It is a cute fit, though!
Picture shows a longer shorts liner but came with old school mesh. Not comfortable.
Gap at waist in back - other wise I really like these jeans!! Because of abdominal panel - I don’t think they can be altered.I tried 10 and 12 regular length and both pairs the waist was too big.
They fit okay but the bottom of the pants are to wide.

I purchased this for my son and he absolutely loved it.  It’s super soft and very well made.  Unfortunately,  in the front stitching that makes a “V” the pattern marks are visible and made with ink.  I have tried getting ink out with no luck.  I ordered another one and the ink outline was worse than the first one.  Very disappointed.  If this can be resolved the shirt is great!
Short shorts. Not my style
Fabric was a little more shear than i thought it would be - while not a big deal - it was missing a few of the silver beads along the front line of the top. returned

I bought this a few weeks back. when i saw it (the blue one) in the store i touched it and it was extremely soft and even plush like. i tried it on and found it odd that this cloth and stone garment, like other viewers stated fit my bust and hips, typically they don't. i love the side buttons. i wear mine opened half way. my only complaint is i've washed it like the instructions state and my blouse is no longer as soft as it was before, and it needs to be ironed as it wrinkles easily. i still li

The sleeves were very tight in the upper arm area but the body was blousy, too blousy so to go up a size for the arms would mean it would be very oversized in the body. i like the fabric (nice and thick) but it did not work for me.
This shirt is such a pretty color i was so excited to get it... however i felt like the fit was not flattering. it sort of just hung on me. didn't do much for me. i actually ended up returning it.
Do not like the zipper.

I loved this dress in the photos and couldn't wait to try it on in person. the print varies from dress to dress and mine had noticeably much more cream color in it. i didn't mind too much but it didn't look like the dress the model is wearing. i bought the xxs petite which fit true to size. the v neck is a bit low for petite sizing but the length was perfect on my 5'2" frame which was a plus. i agree with the other reviewers the fabric is cheap and feels cheap. not something i would expect from

I agree with a previous reviewer who said that it was very nicely cut, but unfortunately, the materials are so cheap. the "fleece" material that it is made out of feels like the cheap polyester fleece blankets that you get at the discount stores. it will pill easily, and is noticeable even in the dark color. i must have gotten one shipped straight from the store, and it was already starting to do some gnarly pilling. i do love the cut of it, but i can't justify keeping it because this won't last
Giving 3.5 stars due to how big this dress runs. i am 5' 118lbs and i was swimming in the xs. it is a beautiful dress, just beware it runs very large.
Christmas gift.  Not tried on yet.  Looks good in package.

I bought this dress for a fall wedding and upon receiving it was very impressed with the quality of lace and the color. however upon trying it on the seam up the back was slit so high that my undies were visible. i would like to assume that the dress that i received was defective... it didn't really make sense given that the length of the dress was appropriate, i did not have time for a return so i had the seam completed. after that alteration (on my own dime) i was very happy with the dress and

I tried this on in the store as soon as i saw it because of it's ease, modern look, and my obsession with stripes and wrap skirts. i am between an 8 and 10 in retailer most of the time (although sizing has been quite erratic in the last couple of years), but picked up a 10 to ensure an easy fit. was so surprised to find you have to not only buckle (cute detail) but button and zip this "easy" skirt, and with all that there were also straps that buttoned that i believe are there to keep it from flyi

Like the previous reviewer, the biggest problem with this shirt is how short it is. i'm 5'4 and ordered a 12, which is usually what i wear at retailer. even only being 5'4, this shirt is much shorter than i anticipated. it fits everywhere else, though. i'm obsessed with the back so i'm going to keep it and wear it. i'd say it's worth it at the sale price.

I suppose if all you wanted was a rain jacket, this would be fine. It looks nice but boy there better be no amount of wind or breeze outside because this is super thin. Too much ($29) for just a shell I think, but I didnt bother to return it.
I’m sorry but the material is cheap feeling. I love the style and idea in the picture but it does not look good enough to wear in a professional environment.
Way too short!
Nice blue color, but sags in the arms and length after a few wears

These make your booty look really nice. I don't have a big one and it made it very shapely. However, I have a big belly and skinny legs and these shorts were not flattering. The top of the band rolls down and the thick band emphasizes my chunky fupa. The band is tight so it pushes your belly fat down to your kitty cat making it look even bigger. They not like compression shorts after the band. I love that they are seamless in the front to prevent my notorious camel from showing but I'm not sure this look is better.  The legs part was a little longer than expected and when you pull them up they are even less unflattering. If you don't carry a lot of weight in your belly or kitty cat these shorts seem like they'd be really nice. They are squat proof and the color/print is beautiful!
Needed nest larger size

I bought this top in black n moss. they are of a great quality n love that u don't need a cami under. i do like them very much except that they're a lil too billowy in front for me. when i gathered excess material on the sides it looked much better. the black didn't look as large...black is slimming. i love the neck and the material. haven't decided yet if i'm keeping or returning.

I tried on the vest right out of packaging  (fits nice) and found a dime and two pennies in the right pocket.  There was no attached product tags attached at the collar like in the pictures above.  It’s a decent light weight vest, but I am washing several times before I wear it.
I missed my time to return so I’m stuck with a pair of pants that will not work for me.

I wanted to love this dress. the colors are heavenly and it looks light and airy. it isn't, it is very heavy, much too heavy for florida heat. the top layer is a beautiful sand color and while the fabric is nice, the heaviness of the top really weighs the whole dress down. i felt like it added ten pounds to my appearance, easily. back it went, boo hoo. if you are between sizes, i would size down, runs a bit big.

This dress could have been great but for me there was too much design on the top part/ front. i wish the neckline was different or just less beadwork/ design near my face.
all in all its a maxi dress and was returned because approx. $250 was too much to spend on this.
Very pretty and dressy but small overall.

Cute in concept, so large in reality. i am 5'3", size 24 in jeans. i was swimming in these. i mean the seat is huge and the length of the rise is super long. don't even try if you are a little person. long and lean, yes, would probably look great on you.
Not made well

I put it on over a plain black shirt, but it almost looked like a lab coat. The sleeves are loose and not fitted, which is maybe why it looked that way. I did like how light weight it was. And I might try the black one later with some army green pants.

Based on other reviews that this top ran large, i ordered this online in two sizes. both seemed to fit alright in my chest (although the chest fit tighter in the smaller size), and both were much too big on the bottom. the front bottom of this shirt has a series of pleats, so the bottom of this top really, really, really flared out away from my hips. the length seemed fine on me (5'10"). the material is very thin, and i could see my nude bra through the white pattern.

The dress quality is good and not see through, however I received the wrong color and didn’t have time to return before my event. I ordered the light blue and received a purple dress, after my boyfriend bought matching blue items to match me. It also runs bigger and longer than I thought (i got a size large and i don’t know my exact measurements) but that wasn’t the biggest issue I had with the dress, obviously lol. Was really upset I didn’t get the one I ordered but if you don’t mind risking the color it’s good quality

Loved this dress and ordered it based on glowing reviews. ordered size large because i weigh 155 pounds and have a large 34g bust. the dress skimmed nicely over my body but the baby doll style fit loosely and made me look really wide from the side. i probably could have sized down for a better fit, but it might have just emphasized my bust. the fabric has a substantial weight and it's lined. best as a fall, winter dress. the embroidery is beautiful. i disliked the intense black color around my f

I'm a cis guy who sees themselves as quite feminine, and is not above wearing women's clothes, a "femboy" if you will. Don't buy this for crossdressing, at least not if you aren't willing to wear breast forms; I was trying to replicate an outfit Mio Kisaragi from Tokimeki Memorial wears, but had no luck finding a sweater anything like it in men's, so I took a chance on a women's sweater because it was the closest I could find and looked high quality in general and...I imagine it fits fine on someone with breasts, but I don't have those.Three stars because it wasn't made to fit me. Can't penalize them too much for that. I probably should've looked at the bust (the small size here is 43.7 which, from what I've seen is pretty big for a small.) The life of a femboy.

The fabric is beautiful, even the lining is lovely. i ordered the green color in a large, as i'm curvy and have long arms. but it just doesn't lay correctly at all - the collar has no structure, even though it's a lapel, and the side vents just pop out - the jacket added about 10lbs, and just looked frumpy. it looks much more tailored on the model. too bad, as i have been looking for a velvet blazer in the color for a long time.
Size fits at the hips and waist. No muffin top. But the legs are so tight it’s actually uncomfortable. . Worse after washing.
I like that it’s light weight
The print is unique and fun. however, the longer length and heavier weight of the fabric was not the piece i needed in my closet.

I really want to like this dress - it's beautiful, but it just fits like a sack. the yoke exaggerates my bust and the dress makes me look 20 lbs heavier. perhaps if you are tall and thin like the mode, or small chested, it would be great! the quality and color is beautiful.
Ok, shrink wrapped, not an issue. No tags. No asymmetrical hem. Design not as shown. Pull, right from package. I will return to update this review once I've worn it.

If you look closely at the pictures this dress is shown 2 different ways. one with a lace covered v-neck and one with a rounded neck. which is it retailer? don't know about the size but i had to answer the question. i won't order the dress until i know exactly which style i'm ordering.

The fabric is lovely, color was great, but unfortunately it ran a bit large. this might be a case of girls with boobs vs. girls without. i have a small chest so for me, this just didn't stay in place. i was worried about the arms squeezing me so i got a small rather than my usual xs. bad choice. the diamond in the middle pooches out rather than hugging your body (which was what i was hoping for). when i raise my arms the whole shirt ends up riding up. pretty awkward. there's also a lot of fabric

The blouse is lovely - i loved the lace, color (though just as other reviewers mentioned its a darker blue closer to a teal color) and edging. i am very petite, for reference, 5'2", 24 waist and 30e and normally wear a 00 or 00p. the 00 was still too wide for me around the waist/bottom and had too much of a swingy effect - it made me look like i was pregnant so i sadly returned. i wish this had more of a fitted look to it.
Thin fabric. Sheer. I wear under a skirt that’s about thigh high. Definitely can’t hide anything in these.They are stretchy though. And serves its purpose for wearing under something.
Beautiful and versatile dress but shoddy quality. i hand washed (per the instructions) it after wearing it once  and the sleeves are already falling apart.
The regular length i tried on in store definitely didn't work for me. for reference in the photos i have a medium on and my measurements are 38-30-40.

I really wanted this to work. alas, it had a strange fit for me. the straps would not stay up, and it had a weird fit under the breast. it worked standing up, but the minute i sat down it fell off my shoulders. the fabric was beautiful! and i loved that it had pockets.

I am 5'8" and 130 lbs and bought a size s. it fits, but is not as roomy as it appears in the model and the sleeves are not as long. the collar fits strangely on me. the deal breaker was that the sweater is not soft, but is itchy and kind of coarse. i am returning this one.

I LOVED this shirt when I bought it! In fact I bought 5 of them!! They fit super well, felt good and just overall 10/10! I was super duper careful when washing them and wash d them on cold and low dried them for 10 minutes and then hung them up to dry the rest of the way! Overall the shirt didn’t shrink that much but the sleeves defs shrunk to the point that the shirts look slightly weird on me now! 😭😭😭 I was so fetching sad! I loved the shirt for the first wear! Im gonna try real hard to stretch them back as much as I can but I don’t think I’m gonna get many more wears out of these baby’s! 😢 so be ware that the sleeves will shrink on the short sleeve and will reveal your farmers tan no matter what you do!
Too big and very bad craftsmanship.

I love the simplicity and modernity of this tunic; however, the pockets ruin it, if that's possible. they make the dress bulky around the hips. i usually wear an 8 or medium and i ordered this dress in a medium. i think this brand runs a little small. the bulky pocket issue may be solved with a larger size. the weight of the fabric is a little heavy which prevents year-round wear. i love the subtle texture. one odd thing, the tag is attached to the stand-up collar. i had my hair up when i tried
Stylish but no stretch. It was a bit tight or smaller then size listed

True to size until it met the laundry! let my disappointment be a lesson -- $80 for a blouse that i no longer recognize. i washed this item as indicated by the care instructions and it shrunk by at least 30%. dry clean this garment, or spot clean at best.

This top fit nicely and was tts, but the pattern was different than i expected. i thought it would be more of a desert scene and it turns out there are cowboys on it and it just didn't fit my style. if there were cowgirls on it i would have kept it.

Almost throw aways, great for one use but they do not hold up very good in the wash etc., bacon neck, and end of sleeves and bottom of shirt always fold over just tad. Sad part is they are still better then most but thats more a knock on everyone more then a compliment.

I wanted to love this dress but there were too many factors that ultimately had me sending it back.

it is a very unique piece and high quality; however, i have sensitive skin c/o irish genes, and something about the silk/linen/sequin combo had be itching like crazy and really irritated my skin. i also did not love the way the top part of the dress layed on me- it was like there was a bit too much fabric up top meanwhile fitting perfectly around my hips (so i wouldn't want to size down...)
Looked so cute online but just didn't it well in real life. Very big and boxy. Nice thick material, though. I'm 5'1" 125lbs and purchased size XS

Pretty color, great details, awesome stitching.. aaaaannnnnnd it actually not only goes out a line but ballooned out above the hem and then came back in - just too much fabric down below. nice at neck, arms and chest but disastrous anywhere below that.
Nothing wrong with it but I just don’t like how it feels n I didn’t want to return it. Too much work I’m a busy woman

I tried this on in the store - i tried regular medium which was way too big except in the chest where it was really tight. the material was a little itchy on me (but maybe its because the chest was tight). the color is lovely (pink). im sure someone will love it but if you are petite, i would order the petite and maybe size up if you are busty.
I'm 5'6'' , athletic build-thought it was cute but in the end didn't like the color of the inner sweatshirt--wish it was black or white. send it back.

I loved the design of these pants, and got them to go with the matching jacket. the problem with them is there isn't enough stretch to keep them up. i found that thru out the day i was pulling them up, as they would slide down. the pant fabric should have had more stretch or they should have put stronger elastic at the waist.
It very nice dress, but ripped! Low quality.

Wellll, this didn’t fit like I had hoped it would. I hoped it would be something that would be appropriate to wear to school with some cute sandals or adidas but nope. The top portion fit me fine however as you can see from the photos the midsection looks terrible! I have a pretty flat belly but it doesn’t look that way. I have an athletic build so I needed the room in the shoulders and arms but not in the belly and back. I think this probably would look great on someone who’s pregnant. I’m not nor ever plan to be again so this is going back. I don’t think the small would fit me on top so I’m not going to even bother trying. Plus I don’t need THAT much extra fabric.

I loved how this jacket looked online and decided to order it. however, sizing can sometimes be tricky for me so i ordered both a petite xs and petite xxs (i'm 5'1", 113 lb, and a bra size 32 c). i tired on the xxs first and was swimming in it! so naturally i thought the xs would be even bigger; but to my surprise the xs fit way more snug! in the end, i still didn't like how loose the xs fit so i returned them both. the material is great quality and it's a cute design. i would recommend trying t

This dress is most definitely not a maxi! barely goes below the knees. also you do not get the cute detail shown on bodice. there are no folds which were an added plus on picture. waist is higher, not at natural waist. very pretty silk though and still cute. just not as pictured.

I bought several pairs of uniform pants from a handful of brands for my 4 year old at the beginning of the school year (this was 7 months ago).  These were comfortable and looked nice, but they were are the only two pairs that completely fell apart at the knees as a result of normal wear and tear.
This dress had so much promise from the picture. i loved the color and fascinating waist detail. i ordered online. the quality of fabric is nice, and the color is lovely.

This dress was so beautiful and I wanted to keep it, but the white is absolutely see through. The top of the dress unless you have a white bra to go under it and don’t care about that being noticeable- is not even manageable. I couldn’t even wear pasties underneath because you could see them. I wanted to love this dress so much, it fits flattering and the print was beautiful, just couldn’t reasonably wear it.
Thought it would be a bit heavier.

It's a decent jacket at a good price but the detachable hood is not very practical. The hood attaches to two 'tails' that extend all the way down to the bottom of the jacket. Also there are snaps instead of buttons which I don't like. I own a previous type of Levi's jacket with detachable hood. The previous jacket is better. It has buttons and more importantly the hood just zips on and off at the neck. It's simpler and less cumbersome to add or remove it when you need to. I sent the jacket back.

It was just too big in the regular size and too short in petite.  the proportion was off.  i bought a similar sweater last year in a blue color that i wore constantly and was hoping this would be like it. i think if you are very tall you might pull this off. i'm 5,4" and even the extra small regular hung below my booty.

Bought this top at my local store and tried it on as soon as i got home. yikes! it was way too billowy, i looked like i was pregnant. will be trying the next size down on in the store to see if it is billowy.

This cardigan is very cute in the picture and i really wanted to love it but it just didn't seem worth the price. the material is kind of itchy to me and i wasn't a huge fan of the wide edges in the front. the colour is very nice and feminine.

This Amazon Essentials Women's Pajama Set fit as expected, although the crotch was a bit low. Also, the shorts are more like panties. But the deal-breaker on these for my kiddo is that each seam has a plastic lining in it that makes it stiff and scratchy. Sadly, these are going in the donation bin as unwearable by anyone who finds scratchy clothing irritating.As the parent of kiddos with autism, there are causes near and dear to my heart. Let Amazon donate to your favorite charity! Use Amazon Smile (smile.amazon.com) when you order and Amazon will donate to the charity of your choice when you make a qualifying purchase. My shopping is donating to my favorite charity, Canine Companions for Independence (CCI) at no cost to me. Awesome!
Bought this for my teenage son. Very cute but material is super thin. It definitely wont last long.
I don't have an issue with the product, only the manner in which it was delivered. It was left behind some bushes far from the door or porch.

I loved these on the hanger when i saw them in the store. i liked the fabric, but found the full cut of the pant added a ton of bulk to my hips (and i don't have big hips). i also thought the waist was a bit snug while the rest of the pant ran tts. they went back.
like the jacket but wish it wasn't see-through.
I like the suit in general but they didn't send me the bowtie

I love this sweater's rich color and good quality, but the fabric is very thick and heavy, the neck opening is too wide, and the length is too short to be flattering not on my tall (not model skinny) frame.
First thing, I tried them on, and the rivet button was already broken and just fell out. I bought these for work and luckily I had time to sew on a regular button.
Nice value for the style.Colors are not as light as they should be.

I just loved this when i saw it in store. beautiful fabric, lovely color. i ordered a small petite because petite xs was sold out. i imagine it might be a little better if it were a size smaller, but there is sooo much fabric in the pleated bottom, unless you are blessed with exceptionally long legs, it might end up looking like a witches coat. at least that is what i was told by my daughter.

This brand has odd fitting of late. i normally wear a m in retailer tops but i had to size up to 12 on this shirt as it was tight across my chest. i am a b cup and had a sports bra on when i tried it. brought it home and tried on with a regular, non pushup bra and it pulls slightly. i might return it because my guess is that it will shrink when washed. otherwise, its a cute tunic style top.

This is really a lovely jumper and looks quite nice and dressy on. my problem is a short torso, but then again this may be made for short torso loving people! i felt like i was all legs in it. i never asked anyone else's opinion, though, so not sure if its just me and my complex.
if you don't have a short torso,then you might experience the pulling the others were speaking about because the waist might hit you higher than your usual waist.
overall, i am not sure who this was designed for.. but
I think they is the cutest style, but this tore after the first wear, but just noticed today after it’s past time to return. :(

The dress design is good for wearing at the office or other places you don't want to show any cleavage.  The fabric is not soft, a little scratchy and thin.  I'd spend more to buy higher quality on the future.  It does at least wash and dry easily, no fuss there.

This shirt is beautiful, however i thought that it was made of a softer, lighter material. it is, instead, made of a thick, heavy material that was unflattering for my shape. ( short torso ann's large bust) it made me look boxy and chunky in the middle. sadly, i'll be returning

product description said cotton linen blend however tag says linen rayon which is not the same
