i am very flat chested so it hung well, but there is lots of shirt. both went back in exchange for two wearable items.
Wish there were pockets.
Great jeans by pilcro, too short and snug around my knees for keeping though.
Disappointed with the very lightweight material, have real concerns about durability.

There’s nothing inherently “wrong“ with these pajamas. They would be fine for a family vacation where you needed something a little more modest. But the quality isn’t great, which you might guess from the price. They run a little small. They’re likely to pull across the chest. And they don’t really hold up in the washer. The pants are actually fine for pajama pants, But unless you get the top quite big it’s gonna pull in weird places.
Very cute but more fitted than expected

This dress is very cute! i loved it. the quality is excellent. however, the fit is off. i'm 5"1, 107lbs, 32c. this dress was roomy in the bust and was a little too broad shouldered. it was tight around the waist. this caused creasing and buldging in the back. the color is much more vibrant in person. i would have kept it, if it fit properly.
Less quality than I expected from Hanes brand.
I lost my belongings(car keys and credit card)as the pocket ripped on the very first use. If this wasnt an issue i would happily buy more of those.. but just for that reason its a BIG NO for me.

I thought i'd like this dress in the neutral color. i had to return it it as it was quite unflattering. the skirt made my hips look big and the uneven shape didn't help. the top fit well, in my usual 4 petite, i think it would look nice on some people, as it's something different but i am not one of those it worked on.

I fell in love with this skirt when i saw it on display so i had the store order me an xspetite. it seemed like the perfect lightweight summer skirt that would go with everything. it arrived today and i was a bit underwhelmed with the way it actually fit on me. it is kind of a thick linen/cottony material and just didn't lay down well, bunching out on the sides in a way i didn't find to be very flattering. so 5 stars for print and whimsy and charm, but 3 stars for actual fit on. alas it is going

I purchased these pants in blue, they fit great - only problem is that one leg is about 1/2 inch longer than the other. i got them on sale with a discount so i will keep them and take them to a tailor to fix. bummer.

I couldn't believe how fast this dress sold out when they were having the fall promotion; they had just put it on the website and it sold out in my size in a matter of hours!  i just received the dress today and really like the practicality of it.  you can easily dress it up or down and it still looks sheek either way.  what i didn't like about the dress was that the material is a little flimsy compared to how it looks in the picture.  i am on the fence regarding if i will keep it.

Really wanted to love this, especially with the lacing and long length for this off-the-shoulder top. when the top arrived, the lacing was stiff and length of the straps were long so that the bottom of the lace didn't completely cover my black strapless bra (and i felt it sat a bit too low down my chest). thought about taking in the straps but then the area around the armpits would be uncomfortable. i did love the length of the top though. wish this top was a keeper, but going to have to return.
The top fit looser than expected making it look and feel sloppy.

These sleep pants are very pretty, soft and comfortable. unfortunately, after washing them once i noticed some small holes in the fabric which is very disappointing considering the price. i don't mind paying a little more for clothing if i feel like the quality is there but in this case i'm not so sure. i guess if you don't really sleep in them or wash them then they would probably be ok but then what's the point of buying them?

The pockets and sleeve are just sewn on without matching up the edges of the material. There are the edges of the material hanging out. It's a really pretty color but I'm disappointed in the stitch work.

This dress is adorable and well made. this brand runs on the large side. i ordered an xs and the tag says 'p" on it. it's not petite. it ran large through the hips and will need alteration. i'm keeping it because it is really cute and is well made. the material is knit and soft - very comfortable. i'm surprised nobody has reviewed this item. i probably will not buy this brand again only because it runs large.

Nice fit and weightDraw string better on insideLength of insider liner longer than shorts makes for strange fitComfyRear zippered pocket hood for keys size onlySide pockets shallow and barely fit iPhone seLoose strange length of linerMake pockets larger with zippersForget rear pocketDraw string on insideAnd THEN you have a five star ratingI would not rebuy

This jacket was too wide and the length in the arms too short. i wear a medium in almost any article of clothing and felt like i was swimming in a short little jacket. the ratio of how wide it is to the length is not for me but might work well with other body types. the arms were definitely too short.

I loved this dress and tried on the xs in the store and then ordered the petite. i thought if i ordered the petite it would not be as baggy. it is just way to boxy/baggy for someone my height and weight. however i would recommend to someone taller because the velvet is great quality and it would have been an amazing dress to have for fall and also for winter. for reference i am 5'0" and weight 113 pounds.

This dress has great potential. i happen to have a longer torso so the fit was off. as a previous review stated, it's short waisted and a lot a skirt which i agree, the hem is also funky. i am still deciding if i want to keep it, but if i do, i plan on altering the skirt to be narrower and hemming it a bit shorter too. for reference, i'm 5'3" and weigh 110 and i purchased a size 0.
I found this dress to run very large. the fabric was substantial but rather coarse. also, the lighter color in the pattern is lavender and not white or cream.

I wanted to like this top, as i usually adore a cute peplum feature. when i tried it on yesterday in the store, i was disappointed by how wide and bulky is it. i am petite (5'2", 110 lbs), and i tried my usual xs. the fabric was substantial and of a high quality, but unfortunately in this design, that became a bad thing as the bottom of the shirt balooned out around me. it was very unflattering and i felt lost in the shirt! definitely try it on for yourself before purchasing.
Cheap thin material.

I think some other reviews mention a chemical smell when these arrive. In my experience they understated the case by an extent that is difficult to describe.  These reeked when they arrived, to the point that the room I left them in overnight still stank to an uncomfortable degree a whole day after I removed them.  And it's not just a chemical smell; it is that, but somehow it also conjures a strong undertone of aged sewage and rotting rat.  They are fine otherwise (except the size/shape of the pockets is a little weird), and running them through the washer two or three times in a row cleared up the smell.  If you order these, plan to not open the plastic bag they arrive in until you have the time to immediately do laundry on repeat, because you don't want to spend any amount of time with these unsealed in their natural state.  Oddly, the walnut color version of these that I bought at the same time didn't smell at all, but both pair of black ones were an olfactory abomination (judging solely by the smell, likely also a fire hazard and known to cause cancer in the state of California).
Not even close to size described

......not for the long waisted. i immediately ordered this top when i saw it online. the embroidery is beuatiful (although it will require extra care). the soft lavendar color was a breathe of fresh air. however, i felt like i was wearing a maternity top as it hung oddly on my slim, 5'9" frame. i am long waisted so perhaps petites will find this top works for them. i agree with the other reviewer that indicated the arm openings are a bit large and deep. sadly, this one went back....

I went on a wild goose chase for these jeans, as they were sold out all around the country. i finally got the last pair from some store in the midwest! they are my favorite pair of jeans, they fit very well. however, for the price, they should not get loose and baggy after 1-2 wears. i hate that they need to be washed and dried so often so that they will fit properly. expensive jeans should not sag. i have abercrombie jeggings for a fraction of the price that never get loose, even after 20 wears
Really wanted this to worked for me. ordered the s in ivory (the color i really wanted). i've been looking for a non-wool sweater like this.
Like the color and romper style. this runs extremely large. i am normally a petite small and it was too large. with the wide- leg style and overall length you may need to alter this piece.
They fit tighter than I expected but they are ok

Retailer, please make these fantastically versatile chinos in tall sizes again! i am 5'11" and i usually order a size 8. the regular fit hits in the wrong place at the knee and results in the back of the knee fitting and feeling uncomfortable.

The design is cute, but there is way too much fabric in the lower part of the shirt. also, the fabric for the lower part crumples easily. unless you carry around an iron, you may not want to wear it outside the house. i kept the shirt to wear around the house.

I loved this when i got it. it has such a flattering fit! slightly loose in the body, but not flowy. nice weight of fabric. comfortable fabric. perfect scoop neck that doesn't show too much cleavage. but i washed it once on delicate and line dried (which i do with most of my shirts) and it came out riddled in holes.

They seem well made but are to thick and hot to wear anytime other than winterI got sweaty just looking at themIt’s like they are made from feltIt’s to hot to even try them in right nowProbably good for someone whose always cold

It’s really not a bad shirt but as someone on the slim side, it’s not flattering. It’s not tight enough and a bit too big that it doesn’t complement me well. You’ll need a big/muscular body to wear this IMO.

This shirt has beautiful coloring but the material wasn't as soft as i thought it would be. i was hoping they would be the super soft material, maybe washing them would help, but i didn't want to chance it so i returned them.
Did not notice small hole and stain on the bottoms until i had the tags removed the return label shredded.

These are very well-made jeans, the fabric is substantial and gives a lot of stretch with movement. i adore the extra inch or so in the rise of the waist, and they make my butt look great. however, these jeans fit like a glove when i put them on first thing, but within an hour or so of wear they are so baggy it's like wearing a size bigger. i'd say perhaps buy a size smaller if you want them to fit snugly through the day. if you like roomy, then buy your regular size.
Faded too fast

I have been buying these shirts for a couple years and they have always been high quality.  The ones I received recently weren't as soft and nice as the ones I bought earlier.  These are kind of rough and scratchy. They also don't fit as well.  I think Amazon may have changed the supplier of these shirts.

While this is gorgeous in person, if you have a larger bust the v-neck will look really weird. because its so deep, it gets skewed(i'm a d cup). if only the v were 1 or 2 inches higher! unfortunately it's going back.
This shirt fit really really big! i ordered an xl but think i could get away with a l, if not a medium. sadly, it's going back :( otherwise, it's high quality and a beautiful design.
Had to return it as the pant color was too odd compared to the coat.

Loved the bright pattern online and had hoped it had a similar fit to the tyla ts which i love. in actuality this was a lot boxier. the cut was shorter in length, too short for my 5'10 frame. the width was rather boxy and unflattering, particularly with the wide arm holes and flat cuffed sleeves. also the pattern looked a little cheap in person, way less spectacular than retailers typical gorgeous vibrant patterns. this is going back i'm afraid.
Medium was closer to large.  Quality was OK.

I got the pink version. it is a pretty color, but the metallic border is painted, not a metallic yarn. the weave is wide and it looks like it would snag easy. it looks cheap to me--not what i expect from retailer. am returning.

I wanted to give this a try but unfortunately disappointed with the fit and styling. i'm 5'6", petite build and it consumed my slim figure. i loved the soft and coziness and the color is sweet too. i just felt like an awkward butterfly with the sleeves. pinning them back would have been alright but the execution didn't fit my frame. i would have liked it to be a tad longer too. i really hope they use this same material throughout the fall season because it's so cozy.

Well these aren't proper trousers. Modern trousers would be more slim fitting. These are baggy. People want normal trousers in linen when it's hot but for some reason most available on amazon seem to think linen trousers are for barefoot walks on the beach.

I can't figure out if this skirt is supposed to be high-waisted (if so, it's too big but the length works), or if it's supposed to sit on my hips (fits well but too long). but the material is really comfortable, and the design is different in a good way.

Beautiful top but the angles emphasized my widest fluffy bits in an unattractive way. i ordered size large. the material, fabric and lace are pretty and well done. my arms looked huge too. and the piece under the arm hit below my bra and it was clearly visible by a couple inches. i carry my weight in my mid section and am short waisted. think this would look best on taller, thinner bods.

I loved these. But I’ve had them about a month now and I’ve worn them maybeee 10 times, I don’t put them in the dryer and I wash them on cold/ gentle…. And the crotch where the seam is ripped. Super unfortunate.

I agree with the other reviewer who stated this sweater is very "80's"!! online it looks minorly fluffy with muted colors, but in person it's a bad overly-fuzzy christmas sweater with super bright 80's colors!! if you're going for kitschy / tacky / retro this may work for you, but if you are looking for the sweater in the photo you'll be disappointed... :( it looked to be true to size, but to be honest i hated it so much i didn't even try it on.
I have long arms and long torso, it was short on both and made my upper half look very squatty. I ended up giving to a neighbor.

Originally bought the plaid version and retuned it to order this one in the store to get free shipping. the fit is completely different. i am a consistent small, particularly in dresses of this style. will be exchanging this for a medium, which i hope will fit. love the color and pattern.

So pretty!My main hang up with this blouse is that it wrinkles very easily. It is also runs large. I’m 5’3, 125 pounds and the small is both long and wide on me.
Very cute, fit well. The quality is my biggest complaint; the inside of the pockets feel almost like paper material, and the buttons felt loose before I even tried them on.
The blue has three colors of stripes: blue, white and black 9between white and blue). the black stripe made it too busy for me. the material is soft and clingy.

For some reason, the cream colored cords are sheer. the material is quite thin. you can see the pockets through them, as well as the seams. i have other ag cords and it seems the material they are using this go around is substandard. too bad.

I've worn Wrangler jeans for years and this pair I just received didn't disappoint for fit or style. However, what's up with the lines? Apparently, some colors have lines dyed into them. When I looked at the picture online I just thought they were creases in the jeans from wear; didn't pay much attention. But they are made and dyed to look as though they're old and creased or something, I'm not exactly sure. I've never owned jeans that naturally faded with lines across the front of them like that so I'm not sure what the look is that they're trying to achieve.But what the heck, these are supposed to be authentic and some of the colorways have lines and some don't. I just want regular old comfortable Wrangler jeans. I'll wear them out in my own way, thank you very much. It's too much trouble to return them so I'll live with the lines, but I'll be more careful next time I order jeans to make sure the manufacturers haven't dyed lines across them. This is as bad as the jeans that have holes in the knees. I used to patch them or cut them off when they developed holes in the knees but now people buy them that way and want them "pre-holed." What a world, what a world.

Good looking shirt, but the size was nowhere near accurate. I had to return it. I have a 54” chest, and they advertised that the shirt had a 56.9” chest. It was at LEAST two sizes too small. Nowhere close.

Was drawn to this dress in the store. my location had it displayed well (one mannequin with the dress & a jean jacket...another with the faux fur cardigan). the dress is a very vibrant red. but the fit is not for me. i am busty (34c) with a short torso, and the dress made me look like dolly pardon on top. but there was a lot of room on the bottom. i tried on a size 6 and felt like i needed a size larger on the top and a size smaller on the bottom. having said that, the material is a very good qu

The fit is a bit loose in the body (more than you can tell on the model) - more like a true swing style top. i feel the arms are a good fit, but i ordered one size up from my normal since i'm planning to wear this as a maternity top. arms are definitely a size smaller than the body. the ruffles at the bottom are a bit odd, but overall i still like it. the cutout notch at the collar is super cute! plus, the green color of this top is lovely and i love that it's made in the usa so i'll be keeping
Nice pajamas , I really like them and bought a second pair.I am kind of picky when it comes to my pj' s too!

This would have been a better dress if the fabric was not so heavy.  It is a heavy knit so it would be rather warm to wear.  Length of a tall gal is good.  I am 5'8" and it came to my ankles.  If the sizes would have been my reliable it would be easier to see if the style was flattering.  I did not find it to be so.  Others may feel differently...just did not work for me.

SMALLER THAN THE CHARTS: Just an estimation, but seemed 20% smaller than the description chart and 10% smaller than the pictured chart (2”-4” overall). VARIED QUALITY: With this suit, lower quality features are mixed with nicer ones (e.g.; pocket “square” is a cheaper, sewn in paper like material, but the pants have a nice, hidden expansion feature). Pictures: Included a few photos to show how nicely the suit was packaged, that it’s fully lined and has longer than usual pants for taller men, but the hidden elastic feature in the waist for guys that fluctuate in size.  If it wasn’t so much smaller than the 3XL size indicated, I would’ve kept it for the great price.
Cute and okay quality but runs small
The colors of this dress are beautiful and i really wanted to love it but it wasn't cut for my body shape.

The detail on this top is beautiful, love the embroidery ! i wanted it to work so bad, but it is much too wide, bells out and makes my size 8/10 body look wider than it is, another reviewer mentioned the model must have it pinned on the sides, because the top does not lay like that. it runs large, especially under the arms. too bad......
This baseball pant looks good. But the size is inaccurate. Running small.
This jacket is cozy, warm, and very cute, but after the 1st washing (according to the manufacturer's instructions) it began to pill and has worsened each time.

This thing sheds so much it's almost unuseable but i used an entire roll of sticky roller and got it to the point where i could wear it with only a glob of fuzz on my underwear not other people's couches. it's cute and fits well other than that. buy a sticky roller!

I was disappointed when the dress came in the mail. it was much shorter on my than on the model in the picture. (i am 5'5") the detail of the dress and fabric shown in the picture is not as prominent in person which was also disappointing. the dress is just average. i didn't not return the dress...it looks much better on my younger sister (who is the same height) so i gave it to her. i guess it's just not the right dress for me.
Legs are too roomy. Everything else would be fine except the legs are too "relaxed", like you are wearing several sizes too large.

The sweater fits a bit awkward in the front. it draped more than i would have liked. also, the transition from the stripes to the solid gray felt non cohesive because of the stitching. returned the item.
Sizing runs large on the plus size ones. I’m normally a 2x-3x and the 1x fit me, still pretty long and overall not flattering on my plus size hourglass shape.
These can be used for running shorts but that’s it. They are very short and a very thin material.

Honestly, this is a very nice dress, it just fit me weirdly. I don't think the dress is to blame, though; I'm extremely short waisted, with broad shoulders and hips. I"m 5'7, 117 lbs, 34B and the dress was baggy at the waist, but tighter across the hips and bust, so there was not point in sizing down. Very good quality and feel, just an odd fit on me.

My inseam is 33", so unless I visit a tailor, my pants seldom fit right. With its Essentials brand, at least for some waist sizes, Amazon has quietly thrown a bone to untold millions of men with legs like mine, as well as men in the 29" and 31" inseam demographics, who walk around every day in pants that are too long or too short. I bought these jeans to have something that fits well and is comfortable enough to wear while picking orders and operating forklifts as I attempt to buy the dip in the economically uncertain months or years ahead. These jeans have stood up well in the short term, and I may end up returning for a pair in 32x33, the next size down, in the future.

I have been eyeing this piece for months now! i broke down and bought it when they finally had my size in stock. i am 5 '4 and 110 lbs and have a very small chest so i ordered an xs. i think the top is too baggy for me. yes, the top and bottoms fit overall, but it doesn't look as nice and form fitting like it does on the model. it is very sheer--which is the thing that discourages me the most. i love the concept of this piece but the execution could use some work, which i am willing to work on s
Tried on the xxs petite and still felt that it looked too boxy and baggy on me. cute concept but poor execution
I liked this top but found it to be a little dowdy. fit was slightly boxy and not a good look for me. may look better on a different body type.
Zipper sticks, very rough.  Had to beeswax to loosen it.  Otherwise, pants Ok.

I must be one of the rare people that this dress did not work for.  i adored it online and even on the hanger.  putting it on, it just looked frumpy on me (i tried my usual small first).  decided i must need a smaller size, so i sized down to an xs.  this one looked much better on, but was nearly impossible to get in and out of, the built in slip got twisted and i had to start over twice).  i decided i wasn't willing to work up a sweat getting dressed and undressed when i wore it.  i passed.

Tried this on in the store - i love the colors but the cut was just not flattering. the liner was fine, but the dress flared out excessively and looked like a tent. tried it with a belt for some definition but the fabric was too thick.
This shirt runs very small and I could tell as soon as I unpackaged it that the quality was quite poor. I would expect this kind of quality out of a $15 shirt, I thought that little of it.
Flemsy fabric
I really liked this sweater aside from the size of the turtle/cowel  neck part. It is super tall and hard to fold down, but the rest of the sweater is great!
Pants were a little too big. The shirt we received was wrong, but still cute with the set.

Gorgeous fun dress, but the cut in the armholes (6 petite) is really low. so low even a strapless bra peeks above it. there are also lining issues (could have been with just my one choice) where the lining is not stitched well around the armholes so it shows too much. back is stunning. i would say that if you can go bra less this could be so awesome. it didn't work for my body because i have to wear a bra, but i think its a winner for someone.
Seriously.

Lovely fabric, color and embellishment but this shirt was so long i can't even imagine wearing it over leggings.  i felt like i was wearing a dress.  there are too many cute tops on the market to bother having this one tailored (i don't buy sewing or ironing).  
disappointed.

These recently are being made in Vietnam, Cambodia, and Bangladesh.  The 36X32 from Vietnam is perfect size.  The 36X32 from Bangladesh is a bit tight.  The 36X32 from Cambodia is very tight.  But of course when you order them you cannot be sure where they are coming from until they arrive and you can read country of origin on the label.
It’s okay

Ordered this vest in both the xs and pxs. i liked the length and overall fit of the xs, however, i ended up returning both due to how the vest draped. the outer fabric is a bit more stiff which made the vest balloon out more then what i liked. overall, it?s not a terrible vest but just not for me.
I love the feel and quality of these pants, however, they ran super big! they would not stay up around my waist, unfortunately.

This is super cute, fits as expected and the color is the same as I ordered but it came with pen markings all over the collar. I’m more than likely going to wear my hair down when I wear this but still, it’s a little disappointing considering the price I paid for this blazer
I thought it was a lightweight blazer, but it's more of sweater material! Did not hang properly in back. Raised up in back. Did not like it. Bought 2 sent them back unfortunately.

Shirt looks well made, but I haven't laundered it yet (so who knows based on the other reviews). It is large enough, but it's also pretty short. In my photo I'm pointing to were my waist is (as you can see the shirt is a lot shorter). So if I want to wear this shirt and have it look even remotely ok, I will have to wear it tucked into high cut pants.
A pretty blouse but the polyester fabric makes it incredibly warm and uncomfortable on after a while. had to return it.
These fit well and are comfortable but the material makes them noisy.  They swish!  Back pockets are an odd size and the leg pocket should've been deeper.
I like the Jean jacket but it is larger than I was expecting.

Soft cotton front, slightly more coarse back. shoulders run slimmer than bottom which flares out. bought on sale as a cute pajama top which will definitely work well. could also imagine with skinny jeans. normally wear a s, ordered an xs.
I wanted to own this so badly! it ran really short, even with the adjustable slip and was incredibly tight in the shoulders. i could barely get the dress off!
Cute, but didnt realize it was sweatshirt material. due to that, returning.

I had ordered another retailer suit awhile back in an xl because my usual lg was not available, and lets say i was swimming in the xl, much to big. so when this suit came up for sale i snatched it up in lg. when i compare the two, the lg is over 4inches smaller than the xl, seems like quite a big jump in the sizing. the suit fits in the body quite well, however it's a bit snug in the side bust area. strangely, the suit has boning on the side of the bust, and also the silicone grip on the top edge,

The top for this suit is great - i'm pretty small up top so it's rare that i find a suit that doesn't gap. however, the bottoms run so small. for reference, i'm a size 0 in dresses and 2/4 in pants. i ordered the xs and s to start, both were too small. with high hopes that i could keep this adorable suit (and well made otherwise!), i ordered a size m bottom. they were still small. sadly, i'm giving up and returning. 
only order this suit if you're super, super tiny on the bottom.
It changes fabric completely  after wash also way too expensive for 3 shirts $40 not worth it

I read the reviews before i bought this dress and had trouble believing that the dress literally fell apart at the seams so i bought it. first the good: i love the color, the fabric, and the design. it's very lightweight and loose-fitting and is perfect for hot days. the neck and sleeves are pretty on. i can wear it as a cover up or put on a necklace and sandals for everyday errands and things.
now the bad: it literally falls apart at the seams as you take it out of the package! i"m surprised a

I felt the material only and said Nope!  I didn’t bother trying it on. Ended up giving to thrift store. Lived in TN and too humid for unbreathable material.  Looks nice if it was cotton or other. Probably more China stuff and soo not interested in that!

I have returned this item because it seems to run small. Unless you like a very snug fit, I would consider ordering a size up. Also, the operative word is "lightweight". I had no expectations that it would be like an actual bomber jacket, but the reviews said that it was heavier than a windbreaker. I guess it is, but just barely. Think windbreaker, but with a thin lining. That's kind of what I wanted anyway, and I probably would've kept it except for the size issue.Update: I forgot to mention that it's made in China, for anyone who's paying attention to country of origin on their orders.

I so wanted to have this dress fit. I liked the fabric which was a bit heavier than I expected. I loved the cut too. I am 5 foot three and this dress is definitely made for a taller woman. It was too long and too big in the bust and arms. This would have been great in a petite size. I would have had the same problem ordering a size down too with the length and where the dress wraps around the torso.For taller women, this is a great dress that would be very flattering.
This dress would have been perfect in a medium petite. beautiful dress, wish i had sized down
Feels cool and comfortable although some shirts unraveled during first wear.
I'm pretty sure this is listed as waterproof, but after a few washings it has begun to soak up water. Seems like it just had a waterproof coating sprayed on it.
I love the details and design of this top- my only issue is the top is a bit too "flowy".

I've been adoring this online and while in store i happened upon this blouse and tried it on. the material was sturdy and the beading oh-so lovely, but on my frame it looked terrible. (i normally wear size m/10 in retailer clothes). as another reviewer mentioned, this blouse has rather puffy sleeves which aren't evident in the photo of the model. as well, i also didn't love the collar, which doesn't quite lay flat. if i were to buy this i would have to wait for it to go on sale and then get the po

Based on previous reviews, i sized up to size 4 - i typically wear xs or s. while the length was okay, the body was way too wide! the neck was almost like a mock neck & higher than i expected which made it very uncomfortable for me! overall, i didn't find it flattering or anything special.
I love and live in these but the recent scoop tanks i purchased were thin, not as great. so i want to recommend them because they are really versatile but the quality has deminished.

I ordered the romantic floral in s and xs to try on at home and just love the print! the fabric is so pretty and unique! others have mentioned how "thin" the fabric was but i thought it was pretty standard for a bikini/swimwear and had no complaints myself. there are removable cup liners so nothing can really show through the top. the sizing was tts and the xs fit me best. unfortunately this bikini will be returned because the fit is a little off. i love the thicker strap at the bottom of the ha
These worked well for my son, but are very easily snagged.

I love the colors of the teal dress, but i wish that the top only had one color. the design is cute but the construction is a little off. the transition from the top to the skirt seems to lay wrong or have a bit of extra fabric. sizing up or down didn't help. the top is lined but the bottom is very thin. the bottom should be lined too. not the best.

This blouse is super cute but oddly sized. i bought a size up and still i squeezed into the top around the bust. the front slit is too low and shows a bit too much cleavage, so this had to go back. i really tried because the fabric is wonderful and the shirt is light and breezy for summer, i just couldn't make it work
.

I sized up based on other reviews which was good advice. i am typically a size 6 but sized up to a 10. the pants are very unique and i think on the right body type would look amazing. it seems like someone with curves and a small waist might fit these splendidly...but that's not me. i had some extra material puffing about in the zipper region. i also expected the material to be thicker but found it to be more silky.
I like this shirt but wish it fit better

I used my birthday month discount to treat myself to this gorgeous chemise and matching robe in the mauve. the color is prettier in person than on my computer. i bought it in size m, and size m clothes are normally a little big on me. this chemise fits, but there is no extra room or looseness. i am disappointed in the quality of the pieces. i have several beautiful 100% silk undergarments that i bought for myself in the 80s and 90s, and i am comparing this chemise (& robe) to those. this silk us

I didn't hate it, but i don't love it. i purchased it in 2 colors b/c i thought i'd fall in love. it is just ok. maybe it's b/c i have a larger chest, but i felt like it was too small in the chest area and too loose elsewhere. not the maxi fit i normally go for. however, the material is great and it's a simple sunday dress to lounge around in and run errands comfortably.
I have the blue and gray and love the look and feel. however, the gray within days ripped at the seam and other areas.

I am on the fence with this one.  I ordered in navy.  The fit is ok but overall the dress looks a little cheap - which it was - so I don’t know if I will keep it.  The ruffles on the bottom make it look slightly country grandma which is not the look I was going for.
Didn’t hate it but didn’t like it either

This skirt and top is nothing like the picture. the skirt is black not maroon. top is also black. although the skirt is nice, the image was fabulous. the side panels of the skirt are also a knit. quality is good but skirt is overpriced for what it is. would have expected suede or leather panels for the money. not sure if going to keep or not. was really looking for the maroon color instead of the black.
Pretty hot and small. Order a size bigger. I’m XL should have gotten a XXL
Very cute and comfy but color wasn’t as shown.
Super cute blazer, but I should have ordered the extra small. I'm 5'3, 105 lbs, petite. Also, the seam work at the sleeves is off, and is very noticable on a striped jacket.
Unfortunately i had to size down twice with there pants. great feel, they're soft and the grey is a soft color.

I saw this dress in the store and absolutely fell in love with the fabric and just had to have it. i ordered it on line in my size and when it arrived, i tried it on (or tried to try it on) and it didn't fit some parts of my bday (mainly in the bust). i ordered the largest size, so there was no where to go from there except to send it back. others here have complained about a strange fit in the tummy area (i.e., too much material). i never got to find out because i really couldn't get the dress

If your hips are bigger than a size 6 us you can't fully close this robe. the model must be wearing the larger of the two sizes to have such a nice oversized fit. the fabric is soft and lux and amazing, but the weird dart in the back and the closure is right over my sadly size 8 hips and butt. if i was taller and thinner i would have kept this and worn it every day.

This is a beautiful skirt; the colors are fresh and summery, yet subtle, and it's a nice sturdy cotton, not flimsy and cheap looking. however, i agree with the reviewer who said that this runs small. i take a 4 in most skirts, but i had to try on a 6 and still felt that it didn't fit quite right. if you're extremely thin, this might be great for you.

One wash wonder...i'm a s to m and went with a m but could have gone with a s with ease. after washing it was way shorter. it shrunk more than a whole size in cold water! i assumed everything came preshrunk but sadly disappointed. great for one wear.
Colors are rather grayish and not vivid as in the add. Looks like washed out . Returning.

I fell in love with the shirt when i saw it online; but, i was incredibly disappointed with it when it was delivered.  on the positive side, the macrame is stunning.  once again, there was way too much fabric which makes me look pregnant.  most importantly, the color is not peach!  it's almost a burnt indian red or brick red/orange.  it was a disgusting color.

Just a warning, the yoke on this dress has sequins underneath. i'm not a sparkle kinda gal, so as soon as i saw that, the dress went right back in the package and will be going back to the store. i wish that had been described or more evident in the pictures, to me, it cheapens the whole dress, which would otherwise be adorable.
The dress is pretty and I wish it would have fit. I am upset with Amazon for suggesting I buy a medium when I usually buy a large. This runs tight and I probably need to buy an extra large.
I wanted to wear this for my journey to cuncun and i wanted the blight pink as photo however it was a dark pink which didn't fit to me unfortunately... but the design was pretty!

I ordered my usually size, xs, and it's just so wide and unflattering. looks like i'm wearing a tent. i don't understand why tops anymore are either huge or skin tight. why not something in between?!  the pink color is really pretty and the details are nice but it's just blah in terms of the fit.

I really like the style of this top, and it's delicate but well made, but i wish it were longer and less boxy. it's nice that it comes with a separate cami to layer, but the cami is very cropped. when i raise my arms you can see a lot of midriff (and the top is see through so a layer underneath is necessary). a longer cami probably wouldn't work because the top is also very short. i'm 5'0'' with an average torso length, and ordered the xxs petite. also, you would have to cut the tag off if you d

This immediately caught my eye in the neutral pattern, and the fabric is actually quite nice. the fit is at least a size or two too large though, with the bust being way too large for me even sizing down. my normal 4 was big everywhere, and the 2 was still big in the chest, but fit everywhere else. the belt is handy for cinching in some of the loose areas, but the top section just didn't work for me. maybe better for someone better endowed?
A bit tight in the crotch, constantly gives me a wedgie. Wish they had a non-polyester version.

This is a beautiful tunic. i wanted it to work so much but i couldn't get past the itch factor. also, the sleeves were shorter than i expected. when i wore a light tee underneath, it didn't move well and looked bulky so sadly it went back to the store. if the material doesn't bother you, buy this. would look great w/ tights/leggings and boots.

Didn't love it, didn't hate, rather indifferent. the grey was a little more muted than i wanted for a summer tee.
i'm 5'4", 123lbs, 34a, the xs fit if it wouldn't shrink, if you're about this size but larger busted go with the s.
Sooooo soft! not a ton of shape but very versitile and warm!

These black moto jeans are sharp looking and slim fit as described.  There is some fading already built into the knee pads so it will age significantly over time.  I'd recommend spot washing, and only use the laundry as little as possible to avoid fading into gray.I am a size 35 and the 36 is falling off my behind.  I have to wear a belt to keep it on.  Had to take two stars off for the cheap and poorly stitched leather label on the back.  Chinese manufacturers shouldn't put cheap labels on jeans unless they invest in properly designed logos.The little zipper pockets in the front are ornamental and will not fit anything.Interestingly, it's identical in construction to Amazon item B098Q63XNZ.  It's obviously from the same factory, and multiple sellers are simply rebranding them to sell on Amazon.
Product is a bit bigger than the older real cotton lined Levi jacket I have & also thinner from choice of materials. There’s no actual cotton lined for warmth, it’s simply just cloth & cold.

I'm 5.1 and always bought 27p. they didn't have petite anymore, so i bought 27r, knowing that it'll hit my ankle instead of being cropped. it's very cute as an ankle-length with some flare. my only issue is that the 27r was very tight around the crotch and upper thigh. it's a very tight fit just right there!... and not enough of stretch to be comfortable when sitting. i wonder if it will stretch out a bit more from wear? i then ordered a 28r to see if that fits better, and it fits a tad loose ev
Was very disappointed in the quality and size. This is at least 2 sizes smaller then stated. Had bought this last minute for my son to wear for a formal occasion and felt it was very cheap looking.

So i thought this sweater would be snowy white, but it's actually a beige kind of dingy color. i do not mean that it's unattractive, i do like it, just because it is not snowy white like i thought, it makes it more of a casual sweater in my opinion and i was hoping for a dressy sweater. it is very super soft and is as long as it is pictured. it fits like a dolman sweater which i did not expect either. it's a bit fitted around the very bottom and sleeves are billowy at the top.the picture does no

Though the quality is good and the fabric is both sturdy and soft, the cut of this top made this a no-go for me. it's a bit short in front and also boxy, which is emphasized by the dolman sleeves. i ordered the coral color and it was much brighter - almost neon-y - as opposed to the soft salmon color my screen shows. i regretfully returned it.

I now have two pairs that are a bit too tight to wear. The third size for great but unfortunately started unraveling after I washed it. So now I have three pairs of these shorts that are not wearable outside the home. Disappointing.

Like a previous reviewer mentioned the jeans do not necessarily look like the one in the photo. i first ordered them in my regular size and also had to notice that they are cut like men's jeans with legs so skinny that i could only force them over my calves. the embroiding is beautiful, but it also stops the material from stretching, so the the super skinny legs are a real problem. also, they are not as intensely stone washed as shown in the picture. i decided to order them again one size bigger

I bought these pants two months ago and have loved the fit and comfort level. They ripped in the crotch after only two months of normal wear. Levi’s used to be good quality, but I’ve never had to retire a pair of pants after such a short time.
the shorts are great as far as fit and cut, except for the pockets in back. Wish the shorts didn’t have pockets. Not comfortable for me

first the good: the design. it is classy. it will keep boobies (the ones of the larger side) in place. this is amazing as there isnt really a way to wear a bra with with dress. it is slimming and i have hips. 

the bad: surprisingly, the fabric gets dirty super easy. i have no idea why everything clings to it. i got my dress f

Fit was perfect, but the button hole was sewn WAY too small to pass the button through, so required a quick adjustment. Expected a little flex in the waistband, given that it's "athletic stretch", but there wasn't any (the rest of the material was fine, though).Overall it was a worthwhile purchasing experiment, I guess, and we won't be returning them. In the future we'll be buying Lee or similar, though. These do the job well enough, but they aren't cheap enough to justify purchasing over a brand with better quality control.
Wear around house only. Extremely tight on neck & chest and short. Would not recommend at all!

The fit was a little larger than normal, but not flattering at my size.  The length and almost shiny fabric only draw attention to the middle area that I am trying to hide. I purchased the gold color for fall, but it was a fail.Maybe with shapewear and in black is a better bet when that size becomes available again.

The tag on the jeans said "won't stretch out", and i've already returned one pair to size down when they stretched out by the end of the first wear. ive been wearing the smaller size for a week, and it's stretching out as well. the crotch ends up dropping two or 3 inches and i keep having to hike the pants up in public, after just a week of owning them. i love paige jeans, and the cut and color of these are amazing. i'm going to have to size down one last time just to get them to stay up, i hope
It is not jeans, it’s in the middle between jeans and chino, and this is ok with me but the quality of the final product is somehow low as it has several knots on the fabric

I wanted to love this dress so badly. it came and the material is beautiful, but when i put it on it fit so awkwardly. there was just no way to make it look good. maybe i needed a smaller size, but oh well.
