anyway, these were loose in the waist and crotch and fit snugly everywhere else. i have a fairly athletic build, so it's not uncommon for me to have issues with fit around the calves and thighs,
I loved the colors on this dress, but i don't like the way it fits. it is tight around the shoulders, but the rest of the dress is really big and has no shape

I purchased this sweater because of the cute unique diagonal design. however, i was largely disappointed by the fiber of the sweater, it is rather coarse to the touch and a bad fit. on the model it looks nice, but it was large around the torso, yet short at the same time creating an awkward and unflattering fit. i shall be returning it.
Bought them for my fat friend I even went a size down so they would be like a Slim fit. He looks like the 2000’s era. Everything else good tho, quality, cloth, etc

Color is beautiful but looks like a maternity top on. i found i could tuck it in slacks and it looked fine. now for the cons:  it is supposed to be peacock design but i had only one peacock,under my arm, which could be seen, i guess, if i waved. the rest were parts of the bird. i would love to have the one in the photos!  next, who thought cheap white buttons on the back was a good idea?  if i had gotten a nice patterned top, i would have replaced the buttons. blouses that i like never seem to b

My hubby loves these. They look amazing on him! Great comfort, length and fit. BUT, they break so easily between the thighs. I wish they were made better for that so that they last longer. So quality can be improved I think and hope. We love these pants.

This is a relatively cute top when you try it on. however, i don't think it will hold it's shape after even just 1 wear. it also doesn't seem like you could wash it without ruining it (like a shirt form a 'throw-away' cheap clothing store). i checked the fabric tag and it is a very high % viscose - meaning, it won't last long at all. i'm returning and feel frustrated with how cheap the fabric is.

Thought this would be my goto fall "dressy sweathsirt." it ran smaller than expected and it just didn't have the drapey sweatshirt shape that i prefer. the detailing on the arms and waistband is to die for though.....
This is a gorgeous dress. i got the red version. it's stunning...the zipper is trash however. i'm scared of getting stuck in it like another reviewer.
Sheer and lightweight. perfect for summer. great detail could not justify paying full price.

The shorts are decent cotton shorts.  They are 100% cotton, so they don't have any stretch, but they work fine.  However, the sizing changed between colors.  I ordered at 31" silver version as well as the 31" stone version.The silver one fit perfectly, the stone one was a little too small.  When I held both next to each other, the stone colored one was about 3/4" smaller in the waist.
I love the design of this and the pattern! it's comfy but a bit too much side boob for actually swimming. i like a bit more coverage, the front has great coverage but on the side... whoa!!!

Very long, too big in the waist. I bought a size small to account for the fabric and stretch, and they were still too big. Some of the reviews mention that the pockets are not deep enough, that's definitely true. The cargo pocket on the leg is very low, you really have to reach for it. Only the front pockets could hold a cell phone.
It was supposed to be for Church but not anymore.
I'm on the fence about this one. it is pretty

If you can get over the fact that this skirt feels (and looks awfully similar to) the exact same fabric your drugstore halloween costumes had when you were a little kid... then, it's surprisingly fun to wear.
Not flattering

I saw this dress in our store and immediately walked over to check it out. it is quite a stunning piece. i purchased it without trying it on and wished i would have. unfortunately, there is entirely too much material in the bodice. it was overwhelming on me. for reference i am 5 "3 and i do wear an xs but i am muscular and not thin. i think it would work well on somebody taller or leggier who could balance out the amount of material in the dress.

I agree with some of the other reviewers; this dress runs very large. when i tried on the xs in my local store, i loved the color and thought i could work with it with the right bra or camisole, but it was just cut far too low in the front and when i tried it on at home, it was just too roomy and not fitted enough. i ordered both an xsp and an xxs today so we will see if they fit better. it is an adoreable design, cut and color. it just runs way big so size down if you decide to get it.
They wear well. But they are snug at the waist compared to other pants in the same size. If you conceal carry IWB, might want to get 1 size larger.

So much about this dress is wonderful - the fabric is a nice weight, the color is gorgeous (i got this in the blue), the length on the petite hits right above the knee. unfortunately, i got a 12p - my usual size in antho dresses - and the elastic waistband was on my boobs rather than under them. i've got a sizable bust (36g), so this happens from time to time. i'm exchanging for a regular, which hopefully will have a little more room, but busty gals beware! at least it's not too low cut!

I bought a 3 pack of these sleep shorts and washed them before my son wore them.  The black and gray pairs were fine but you can see how much smaller the green pair is.  All are marked extra large.  Tried to contact seller to replace green one but no response.
Beautiful dress, wonderful fabric, very well made, just runs really small! so sad, i wanted this dress for a special event!

First order was on the spot and fit was perfect… 2 weeks later the second order arrived for the same size… this were drastically smaller despite what the tag said. A little Q&A would help tremendously.

I love this dress and bought it in the store in the orange, without trying it on as i usually wear a 12 in this brand.  the over-dress is beautiful, however the under-slip is very tight and is apparently made for some one who has no bust at all.  i am so sad and am considering returning it or re-sewing the slip in some way so that it fits.  not sure what to do. don't want to spoil the color combo by wearing something different underneath, but it is so sheer you need something.

I got this dress in the mail, and while i loved the concept of it, it really is too boxy. the tie is very superficial and does not really nip you in at the waist, it is more so for show. it is fully lined which was interesting, and to me, made the dress seem boxier. the quality is good, but i am an hourglass and this was completely unflattering. i would have had to size up to make it look like the model shot, but it would have still been a shapeless dress, just bigger. it does fit true to size,

This product is comfortably soft and warm. However, I would suggest ordering a size smaller than usual unless you like shirts oversized.  What I didn't like was the shrinking in length after washing . I like my sweatshirts a little longer

I'm 5 11, 183 lbs on the muscular side. I bought 42S. The product itself is not bad, 94% wool 6% spandex. However, the packaging is terrible. It was as if somebody just threw the jacket inside the package. Upon opening the box, there was pretty much no support in any way to hold the jacket. Not surprisingly, it has plenty wrinkles all around. On top of that, there is no suit/jacket protector bag with it.
Pants fit perfect. Jacket was too small.
This would have been a great hoodie, but the sizing is all wrong. Sleeves are the right length for a Medium, but the body is too short.
This is absolutely huge.  it felt like it was at least 2 sizes too big - the empire waist wasn't even semi- fit.  36d chest and size small was like a tent.  however, the embroidery was beautiful

This is really a cute top, nice fabric, the print (the version i bought) is lovely though the colors are different than pictured. the problem for me is that i am 5'8", 36b with a longer torso and the proportions were just wrong on my body. the blouse does not have much shape at all and fell a bit too short for my liking, especially in the front. it hit at hip level, as in photo, but would look so much better if it had been a couple inches longer. looking at the other reviews i see that most of t

I ordered this top online in two colors, and kept the berry color. i liked it while trying it on. when i wore it an entire day, the top just didn't look that good. it wasn't flattering, and it focused on the bad areas despite being loose fitting. it didn't seem very flattering. i wore it for one day and am not happy with my purchase. i wish i could send it back but i already wore it. the fit just isn't very flattering. it is loose but focuses on the curves not in a good way if you are curvy.
Just didn't look as cute on me as the pics online. the color blocking was kind of odd actually. returning.

I love the concept of an airy, flowing sweater that has great detail. this item stole my heart online. however, i am fairly petite (5'3'') and it looked like it was drowning me. the neck line is decently wide and my small frame couldn't hold it up; it kept falling off my shoulders. i ended up returning. i think it would look and feel fantastic though if i were taller and had broad shoulders.

I am a 10/12 and ordered the m/l. it's very large! i normally take a large in retailer, but i can't figure out my size in this. it's very wide. i love the denim patchwork detail so i will order the s/m and see how it is.

I was excited to order this sweater. when it arrived, the green didn't stand out as much as the picture here. it also felt too itchy. i usually wear either very soft wool or wool with cashmere because i can't stand plain thick heavy wool. this one was just too itchy for me, it is going back.

High quality, yummy soft fabric, gorgeous color. even with those three pros, this jumpsuit is not for me. i am 5'2" and 150 lbs, size 10-12 m/l in the lines that retailer carries. i own one of their jumpers and it is very flattering! this one, however has capri pants, hits awkwardly at the midsection and makes my torso look even more square. on a tall, thin woman, it probably works!
It was ok. The pants was to long. I had to cut some off.
Not flattering on me

The colors are beautiful and the fabric is very soft and comfortable. i will be returning because of issues with length and being low cut.

for reference i am 5'5 145lbs, 38-30-40, 34ddd. the dress was low cut and showed too much cleavage for my comfort, but this may not be an issue for women with smaller breasts (or if you don't mind some cleavage showing). this length was also a bit too long, so if you are 5'5 or shorter you may want to order the petite size.

I love the look of these shorts but after just a few wears, the right side became unstitched quite far on 3 of them. I would simply return for an exchange and hope it was just a fluke but I’m a couple weeks past my return window 😢

I don't love this skirt as much as the other reviewers do. it fits a little bit weird on me, and i wanted the tie to be adjustable so i could bring in the extra fabric a bit (the knot is not adjustable). the skirt is borderline tight around my rear and legs, so i can't size down. the knit is substantial, so that's something -- but i found the extra fabric around my middle just wasn't flattering on me. i had recently bought and loved lilke's tideline pencil skirt, which also has a fabric tie wrap

I really wanted to like this, but like other reviews say, the knit fabric pills easily and i don't think the tank feels or looks as good as it would were it cotton. a good deal on sale, but i don't think it will hold up very long. i got the teal/white, as black/white and coral/navy were sold out.

The material is soft and the pattern is pretty, but it fits like a sack. it's too bad that this wasn't more form-fitting, with some stretch and a zipper, because its fit is just not beautiful. for tall, very slender ladies, this will be pretty, as it is in the photo. it fit me just fine (with a little extra room on top), but it went right back into the bag without a thought.

Ordered a 31 short, and the label on the product says that's what it is. But the length is "regular" length so I do have to fold it in for about 3" to cut off just at the ankle for someone 62" tall.Jeans have good stretch on it. However, the waist was considerably loose that I have a 2" gap on the back when standing straight. Nothing a belt couldn't fix or hide, but I'm not considered curvy by any standard.Front pockets are small, even considering it is a women's clothing item.

I like the overall look and feel. However, the inseam is pretty small for a guy like me. Things get tugged on and compressed when I sit or bend and squat. Sometimes I actually worry about certain things being inappropriately bulgy and visible in these due to how tight the inseam is.
Even though I cannot unzip this sweater, I love the way it looks so I kept it

This truly is a dress and not a tunic. i normally wear a medium but they were sold out so i thought i would try a l petite. i am only 5'4 and the large p was really long. i could definitely wear as a dress with tights. i am hoping it comes back in stock so i can try a medium p. unfortunately it is going back. cute sweater as pictured on the model!
I'm a small and this small fit like a large.Fabric is not soft like most cardigans. Better to purchase in store.

I wanted to love this but if you carry your weight in your hips, butt or thighs this is not the dress for you. runs tts. i'm 5'5, 135 lb and the small fit but made my lower half look even wider than what it it. also felt like it was a bit too long in length.

The fabric of this dress feels like suede, i couldn't stop touching it. here comes the "but": the dress is cut straight down, no definition. the rosette lace is sewn on, like an afterthought just to make the dress not to look plain or cheap. i tried it on with a belt and by itself, and i still feel like it's just a plain dress that i can get at a discount store. i'm a big fan of tracey reese and own a lot of her dresses, and i feel that this is the most plain dress she ever designed. size s regu
I ordered the pink in size xl. the color was pretty. the problem is the material was too thin and tight. it ran at least a size smaller than shown in the photos online.
I thought i might like the look of this oversized odette dress but after i tried it on i felt it was not a flattering style on me. the color was pretty and fabric was nice - just not a fit for me.
The shirts were really short for a guy.
I thought I was getting a sweater top and shorts set based on the picture. I didn’t read through the entire description. The sweater by itself was very basic for the price

I was excited to receive this top because i love the design, but was very disappointed when it arrived. i thought the embroidery would be striking but it's not. the material is a t-shirt knit which also added to the disappointment. it was not flattering at all.
Little disappointed. This dress is huge on me! I even washed it to shrink it and it did nothing. I waited too late to return :(

This shirt is not awful but not anything pretty. there's a reason the main photo has the model with her arms crossed over the waist! it runs good on top and then you get to the body of the garment and it runs straight down yet the pleats even make it manage to expand a little but then you get to the lovely detailed hem which reins them in. so now you are left with a bit of a poof effect making you rounder in all the wrong ways. it's one of those, "i'm too lazy to send it back it's not that awful

Well, this top just did not do anything for me - it's a very conservative style with the high neckline and blousy fit. you'd need to go a little lower in size if you want any of your figure to show through. i guess it might be good for a church function or some other conservative event, but it was too buttoned-up for my style. i also had a hard time getting it off even though the size i tried on was large for me. i didn't care for the feel of the fabric either, although the lace is nice.

The jacket is pretty good but the pockets are off. For some reason the pockets have been sewn farther back than normal pockets. So when you put your hands in the pockets it pulls the jacket tight to your back. Other than that is a great jacket.
Holds a lot of lint

I love the relaxed flattering fit of these pants but the navy die runs..a lot. the first time i washed them t did so per instructions on the label. i did my next load of laundry and everything turned blue/ grey! i tried washing them again with vinegar to set the color and hopefully that will help. lots of color running still though, so to be safe wash and then run washer with nothing in it to clean it before doing more laundry. i'm keeping them because i like the pants, but wanted to let you kno
Zipper handle is on the left side along with the flap that covers the zipper, making it awkward to zip up. The jacket is comfortable though
Picture shows new pants at the front. As you can see I’m an Amazon jeans devotee. Bummer this pair is a full waist size smaller than previous pairs I’ve ordered.

I originally got a size L and it was way too small so I returned and got a 2xl. Great fit and comfy second time around but when I tried them on my run….no go. I had terrible chafing on my inner thighs not 15 minutes into my run. Not runner friendly if you had big thighs. I’ll be keeping them bc I can wear them at work & I ordered some anti chafing bands but on their own these running shorts don’t work for running (with thick thighs).
They are pretty tight in crotch area which makes them uncomfortable at times
Liked the style of the dress.  Having pockets was a plus..  It was much too large.

The material used is very soft and comfortable - until you get to the waistband.  The waistband material is rough and feels scratchy on the skin.  If you are always going to wear these shorts with your shirt tucked inside, then they are great value for the money.  But on bare skin - a fatal design flaw!
I think this blouse would work for petites. it is super short and boxy. looked nothing like the fit on the model. sad to return it, love the print.
I didn't care for the weight of the material. It was too heavy and pulled downward. I did like the wrap style.
these do no breathe very well, even for denim. hot pants. will be great for winter
When i received the dress i went to try it on and one of the loops for the string to cinch the dress broke. guess that's gonna have to go back

This is super cute and the colors are so vibrant and its thin enough to wear with tanks for the summer but it already had a hole forming in the upper back shoulder.  i guess the material was a little too thin....$98 is a little too much money for something that gets holes so easily!

I bought theses for my husband who wears a medium. He is 5'6 close to 5'7 and around 165lbs. These were way too small and tight on him. Idk if they run small but theses don't fit like normal medium on him. He does like how light weight they are so I'm going to be returning these for a larger size. Idk if a large will fit because of how small the medium fit. He may need an XL.

The fabric felt beautiful, and it felt great on, but once i looked in the mirror it just looked too housedress like. maybe because it runs large. the price seemed high as well. i wanted to love it but i had to return.

I loved the design in the fabric and how soft it was. But the elastic buttcrack is a no go for me. It felt weird wearing it and definitely wasn’t what I thought I was going to be getting when I bought them. Yes Instagram influencers wear this stuff, but for someone who isn’t made out of plastic or with perfect ratios this is not for me
This is cute and good material but I’m not busty and it’s big in that area.

Online this dress looks so perfect, but in person it's a bit dowdy and unflattering, at least on me. i'm a size 4 with curves, and i was hoping it would enhance my waist and flatter my figure. but, sadly, it was too large on the waist and too poofy in the skirt, so it just did nothing for me. i considered sizing down to a 2 so that the waist would fit, but the skirt still has too much fabric, making my hips look large. so much potential, but missed the mark for me.
I am looking for a waterproof coat with a thin layer so my boy can wear it in fall windy and rain days, this jacket is very thin , not what I am looking for, returned.

Runs a little big. I’m good with that. The style and brown color are great! I love the wide sleeves. The material is very soft and cozy…but I wore it once for 3 hours and the sides and stomach area pilled. I am disappointed. I am going to hand wash it and see what it looks like. I may need to return it.
Nice shirt but it came so wrinkled.  Literally waded up in a ball.  Took me an hour to steam with a professional steamer.

I love the color and style of this sweater and was very eager to wear it, which i've now done on two occasions. but now i'm concerned about the quality and also wondering if there is a long version of this sweater and a shorter version i am 5'6" and thin, but the sweater doesn't hit me mid thigh - only goes to upper thigh and i measured 25" in length on my sweater rather than 30" which seems to indicate a shorter length than on the model i wish it were longer. more a problem is that the fuzzy pa
I can't fit into them without them being like a second skin.  Run small.  And are not sweat material but are very light material.

I love a cropped pant but these do not hit the mark. the pant would have been more flattering if they hit just above the ankle instead of the calf. i think they make the leg look stunted. the material was a nice weight and good quality but the bow being attached was a big design flaw. it look cute tied but would have been much nicer if you could remove it when needed.

i bought this for a wedding pants fit great but waist coat and jacket were too small, i returned it and ordered the next size up and the jacket and waist coat fit great but the pants are enormous, wish i could exchange just the pants

I wanted to love this skirt. i love high-waisted skirts and the length seemed flattering on the model; it was not so flattering on me. the fabric is so lovely--truly the photos online don't do it justice. it's heavy and luxurious, wonderful for fall or winter, and the gold, gray, and navy floral pattern is not too flashy or bold. plus, pockets! however, the midi length did not work for me, despite the product's suggestion that it was a universally flattering length, just above the knee. i'm not

There isn't much shape to this dress. it's fairly straight from top to bottom. i'm smaller on top with a small waist but slightly pear shaped. the top half was somewhat loose but the bottom half just clung too much. i'm 5'2" and 107 lbs and bought a pxs for reference. also, i wore a tee shirt underneath and the dress shed all over it.

I have bought 4 for my husband.  They look great on him, they are very soft and perfect for warm summer days.  The only problem is that the more you wash them, (and more specifically dryer drying) the thinner they get, the amount of lint that collects from these shirts is quite unbelievable.  Hence with every wash they get thinner and thinner, to the point of being nearly see-through.  Now I wash and hang to dry.  I’m afraid that a fire might start because of the lint the comes off the shirt. They are nice shirts but buyer beware…they won’t last very long.  They really should be 10.00 not 29.00.

On the mannequin this looked adorable. it is made well but if you have any bustline it just billows out below like a tent and is not flattering. if it had less fullness it would have been really cute.
I bought this for my husband and he refuses to wear it unless he has a long-sleeve shirt underneath - he says it's itchy and uncomfortable. Looks great on him though.
These shorts run SMALL.
The overall quality is weak.
Felt cheaply made and definitely runs big/loose, like 1 size up.

This is a pretty dress, although it runs smaller and the colors aren't as vibrant as on the website. the waist ran very small for me in a size 10 which is my normal size and normally runs looser in the waist area as i have an hour glass figure. this probably will look very nice on someone smaller.
Reviews said it ran small so i ordered a size up, was large on me. nicely made, but wanted something a little smaller.

How can some reviewers say this jacket is true to size, yet others say it runs small? i think it's because this jacket is cropped. by the time i took advantage of the fall perks 20 percent discount, the xs peach was sold out so i ended up ordering size s. i also got the xs gray to compare. sure enough, the xs looks better but is cropped on me. for ref, i'm 5' 5", 32a, 115 lbs. i don't really need another almost black jacket so i'm either sized out or have to exchange for xs peach to wear with dr

When i saw this dress in the store in a size small (i usually wear a large), i thought, "how cute!" so i tried it on. it fit very well...all but in the armhole. so i decided to order a medium. i received the medium and it fits exactly like the small, armhole and all. in addition, i agree with other reviews that this dress' description "above the knee" does not accurately describe length unless you're somewhat tall. i found this dress hit me just where i'd like it to...right above the knee. not a
These seem well made and fit like you would cover but the belt loops are TINY. I don’t have a belt that fits through the loops
I liked everything about them except the material pulls tight at the knee when I lift my knees. In humidity it annoying

So, so cute. totally flattering. but the seams don't lie flat and there are loose threads all over the place. i've had issues with quality from retailer for a while (random holes in things) and was disappointed this fit that bill. i'm keeping it anyway because it's so cute!

This is a beautifully made dress and i couldn't wait to put it on. i was disappointed. i am 5'5" and a size 4- 6. i ordered the 6 and it was too 'long and heavy' looking on me. but the waist and upper body fit tightly. the zipper up the back was very heavy looking and the cut away shoulders didn't work for my body type, making me look bulky on top. the torso is really built for someone with small breasts - i am average and the way the darts are, made my breasts look flatter and lower than they a

I was excited about this - - such a lovely look online. but on me...it was just meh. i'm a little heavy right now so that could be playing into it...but i will say i loved the top part of the dress. very flattering and subtly sexy. but the bottom..it just hangs like a rag. it needs either more material for a swishier effect...or it needs to be a different material. or maybe knit just doesn't work on me in the form of a dress! the knit is nice but i kind of also feel like it is chintzy...i can't
I like the outfit and fits perfectly with my son, but I wish there were pockets in his white shirt or pants.

This dress was super cute online. i ordered it in small and medium, both fit, one tighter--obviously, but could have gotten away with either. the dress is cut a little funny under the armpits and fell a little weird in front so i didn't think it was flattering on me. it would be flattering on very slim body, smaller on top. i sent it back. i'm a 34 c, athletic build.

I really wanted to love this everything about this piece. especially after reading all of the great review i was so excited and looking forward to getting this dress. unfortunately it just did not work out. i ordered a large and it fit fine but the dress did not give me the faltering shape i had read about and was hoping for. it literally just hung on me and made me look wider. sadly i had to return this.

Just got this in the mail yesterday and i want so badly to love it but it's just a little too big and boxy. i'm 5'5", 125lbs and ordered a small but i really wish i'd ordered the xs. not sure if i'll exchange or just return. seems high quality and the pattern is gorgeous. it's basically exactly what i'm looking for until i actually put it on and then it just kind of looks like i'm wearing my grandpa's old sweater.

I got the pilcro hyphen chinos in a size 25p and they fit, so i assumed i would be the same size in the pilcro stet chinos...nope. the 25p was way short and way tight. i'm 5'3" and about 113 lbs. my mom is 5' and 98 lbs and they fit her so i gave the 25p stet chinos to her to keep. disappointed!

Cute dress to throw on and go. fits pretty true to size except for the slip underneath. it's a little tight and i felt to short for the dress. i ended up wearing a full slip i had under it and that work great!

The dress is well made, not see through, nice amount of stretch, slightly about the knee, and the color was as pictured. I loved it except for the excessive amount of material where the ruching is. This would fit great if you have more of a pear shape with bigger hips and butt to fill in the ruching. I can't go with a smaller size because then it wouldn't fit in the chest area.
I'm 375 soaking dry but they ran a bit large.

This dress fit me like a glove and it's very pretty on, but the fabric looks and feels very cheap in person. it didn't look like a dress i spent this much money on. the lining is a very silky thick polyester that doesn't seem like it would be comfortable in any sort of heat. the lace overlay has this strange fusing kind of material between the pattern that looks so cheap. i love the idea of this dress, but it just isn't worth the money (in my opinion) so i returned it.

I so wanted to love this dress. i bought it in a size 4 and in both petite and regular, as i'm kind of in between and have a long torso and short legs. anyway, i'm 5'5" tall and 130 lbs. the regular fit my torso well, and length not was too bad. with heals it might have worked without hemming. here is where it all fell apart. while understand that only really expensive designer clothing can afford to seam a pattern perfectly, i felt that the dot seam in the front of the dress was in a bad place.

This skirt runs very large--even in the petite line. there was also no shape to the skirt (at least as it looked on my body). the color was nice (in the pink-grapeish hue), but ultimately the skirt just looked like a tent on my body (00p).
This shirt is nice in theory but you need to have pretty long arms to make it work. you also need to be average to tall in height.

Too much of a good thing is...still too much. there's too much flounce on this jacket for me--the waist sits slightly high, and the incredible amount of fabric beneath it (when you twill around, it's basically a full circle) makes my hips look huge. if there were about 1/3rd (not 1/2, but 1/3) the amount of fabric to the skirt, i'd be totally in love. 
as it is, i'll be returning it.

Not keeping this one. the fabric is a bit tacky-looking in person, the cut is odd and it's just not me. fit is fine and there are snaps to keep the neckline flat and shaped, the colors are as shown and it is a good length (falls to top of hip). i simply did not like it. too metallic looking maybe...

This dress is the perfect combination of bohemian chic. however, the slip below the dress runs a tad bit small. i have a wide rib cage and normally wear between a 04-06. the dress would have been just perfect if the slip was a bit larger.

While the fabric, embroidery and sizing are dead on, i just couldn't deal with the shiny little mirrors that the designer embellished this shirt with. that detail is not apparent in the photographs and i felt lessened the versatility of this blouse. so, it must go back to retailer.

I like the look of these joggers, but you absolutely need to get a size smaller than you’d normally get.  They are so big, they will fall off of your body and they are way too long.  I’m going to order a size smaller and maybe update this post to see if it was a better fit.
there an ok pair of pants 3/5
Fyi to help with sizing i am 5'7" weigh 134 lb and like things loose fitting but the medium was too big and sack like. dress is cute and the color is true to photo.
Bells out to much i had to send it back

This dress was as pretty in real life as the picture. flattering also. unfortunately it is definitely not appropriate for office work. even though it appears so in the picture, the back is very low cut and there is no way not for bra to show (unless you don't need one) also it was much tighter on top than the model picture, even though the rest fit perfectly.
very thin fabric.

When you buy a dress full price and it goes on sale before you can even wear it ($168 down to $49) uuuuggghhh... i like the dress fine enough, but it has a weird under wire, it makes my chest look strange, like i don't fill it in. i usually don't have that problem as a c cup. more orange/red then yellow as well. wouldn't recommend.

Ditto to all of the reviews who state that this top is beautiful but runs small in the bust. i am a large or an xl so i ordered this in the xl. i'm a little broad and busty and it was too small/binding. this is a beautiful well made top for a certain body type.

Or maybe it's the cut. I fear when washed it'll be too tight.  It's also see through.  I might buy a larger size because it was cute and soft. Just wear the appropriate bra color to make it less obviously see through.

Let me start off by saying i never write reviews, but feel compelled to so that no one else gets swindled into buying this beautiful one-time wear piece. i absolutely fell in love with this shirt when i bought it in the fall in black... perfect basic to wear under my new draped open vest from retailer! and perfect fit! i'm long torso-ed and long armed and always have trouble with fit. this being kind of oversized was just loose enough and long enough i could actually feel comfortable wearing it wi
Front pockets developed holes in them within 2 to 3 months.  So....not such a good deal for the money.

I bought this dress to wear to my low-key backyard rehearsal dinner. the dress it's self is beautiful, good quality, and a perfect summer maxi. however, it was way too big. i'm 5'6, 118 lbs, i typically wear an xs/0 and felt like i was swimming in fabric. i loved the style and make of the dress, so i choose to get it tailored.

I'm surprised this worked for so many people. for me, this dress fit terribly. however, the fabric was very thick and the dress felt very well made. i am 5'3" and about 117 with a really short torso, and this dress just showed every bump and lump i have. i think the bodice was just too long for me. the neckline was also too low. on someone taller, or maybe with a longer torso, i could see this dress being really lovely.

I ordered the petite in my size, since i'm well petite, but curvy. i recommend this dress if you don't have a lot of boobage. unfortunately, for me the waist line came up high an inch below my bra line and made the dress poof out at my hips in an unflattering way. its so pretty and i was really excited about ordering it. it fits, but just is not flattering because of my boobs. this is always my problem though with dresses.

I love the design of this sweater and ordered it online, but was disappointed with the quality of the yarn when it arrived. also the color was a little different than i expected from the photo, still a type of ivory, but a little yellow-y. the sweater was solid looking, but the yarn seemed a bit cheap and i'm not sure how well it would have worn over time. flattering cut. i liked how it fit, but for the price and fabric, i decided to return it. unfortunate to lose money on shipping.

I loved this dress the minute i tried it on and am actually really sad that i had to return it. however, the embroidery was unraveling in several places before i'd even worn it, so i thought it would probably only get worse.

Product is of average quality. One set had a minor sewing fault (unstitched pocket) that needed repair. Fit is a little tighter than expected as I am on the smaller end of the "large" range with a 35.5" waist.A reasonable value for the money though.
This sweater is very pretty, i love the knit and the cream color. for some reason it just didn't flow the way i wanted it to, and i didn't love the v neck. just didn't pull me in completely!
Shirt is huge. Ordered an X-Large should’ve got the large. The shirt is comfortable it just doesn’t taper it’s like a wearing a box

I love the style, but it didn't work for me. i ordered the r size. they were way too too long. i generally wear size 26, and the r length works with most retailer pants. with this particular pant, i could barely pull up the zipper. i'm not sure what happened bc i haven't gained any additional weight. i am 5'2, and 110 lbs. unfortunately, i had to return the pants. i think the design is for supermodels. maybe a petite size would have worked? the p was out of stock. good luck!

This is a good fitting shirt and nice heavy material.  I'm 5'8 150lbs and bought a large.  Great fit.  My only complaint is when hung on a hanger, the collar creases. Looks like it was not sowen correct.  It somewhat straightens out once I put it on.

The snake and the studs, they make the dress. sadly, the snake is hard to find, as mentioned in another review. this dress also runs large, i'm usually a 12 and went down to 10. the images are misleading too. two pics show a small, fitted look, and the other two show a full, swing look. i'm trying to make this work but it may have to go.

I just tried on this dress in the store, in red, and i loved the off the shoulder design. the color is just as pictured online (a light poppy red). the neckline began a few inches below my collarbone and was super flattering. however, the skirt portion of this dress flared awkwardly at the hips, causing my hips to look much wider than they really are (and also disturbing the otherwise clean lines of the dress). it seemed to me that there was too much fabric at the back portion of the skirt than

My husband bought the same size he always does, and they fit before washing them. I washed in cold water and tumbled them in the dryer. They were uncomfortable for him and too tight. All of his other pants that are the same size fit perfectly. So be aware, you may want to size-up if you want a comfortable fit. We came back and bought a size-up today. We'll see what happens. He did say he thought they were a good buy for the price--they feel nice, lightweight, and they look sharp.

Skirt was too big in the wiast and too much fabric. was not flattering, and generally not cute enough to warrent spending 50$ to get it tailored. usual size, oop felt atleast 2 sizes too large. the pattern on the skirt, and the nuetral color is very nice. if you can find one that fits, would be a nice 3 season skirt!
It’s alright. The shorts look like someone quickly machine sewed it. It’s weirdly shaped. Too flat
They fit good the first day I bought them but after the first wash they got too tight around my waist and thigh area.I’m a skinny guy so if you’re looking to buy go a size up in the waist

Fits nicely although a little tight across the back.  Also the back is much more see-through than the front, so unless you plan to wear a blazer or sweater with it, it's not that great.  I was planning to keep but saw the reviews about the black color bleeding, and didn't want to deal with dry clean only, so I'm sending it back.
This top runs 2 full sizes large. had to send back and didn?t want to bother with getting a new one.

I love the color and the look, but the quality and durability of these pants are not worth $35. It's also pretty disappointing that Dickies refuses to produce these in 28x32 or even 29x32, so if you have a thin waist and are of completely average height, you're stuck with pants that don't cover the full length of your legs when you sit down. It's ridiculous. With how much they cut corners for quality, you'd think that would afford them to ability to produce some of these pants in more sizes that accommodate thin people, or cut the price down to what these things are actually worth. Dickies are also notorious, in my experience, for fading incredibly fast, especially in areas like the knees and the pockets (keys or medical inhalers in your pockets will leave fade lines after only a few days), etc. I just don't see this as an almost $40 product after taxes.

I loved how the skirt looked on the model, but when i tried in on it had no shape on me. i usually wear a size 6 and received a size 4 which was large on me. also, the material feels rough which i was not expecting as it is advertised as a silk skirt. i was really looking forward to wearing this skirt but it is just not i thought it was - i expect better quality from retailer.

This shirt is gorgeous at first glance. the quality is there and it has a beautiful design...from the front, that is. but it is huge and billowy with back pleats. i cannot imagine this being flattering on anyone. it just adds so much volume to the top. i am thin and petite so maybe that was the issue, but i just can't see adding so much volume. this was a total miss for me. such a shame. would have been great without all the extra volume in back.

I wanted to love this dress because the fit is so flattering and the color is so great however i could not get the button along my bust to lay flat. normally this can happen if the fit is too tight around the bust but i promise there was still plenty of room. the fabric just bent in a way that left a gaping hole at my bust. unfortunately it's going to have to go back.
To tight. Cannot wear. Donated

Material is nice. design would be so great if it didn't fit so large! i am 5'4" 118lbs, athletic build. the dress could be belted i think (a very slim girl at retailer did this), but it is not worth $158 in my opinion. if on sale i might keep it due to the hastle of returning it, however, it is not "flowy." it fits okay in the shoulders, almost too loose, and the rest looks like a potato sack. so disappointed!!
This piece is lovely if you do not plan to use your arms, or if you are a t-rex. if you are not a mannequin or a dinosaur and actually plan to use your arms, this top may not be for you.

I'm not sure i recommend this shirt but i did purchase the plum yesterday. i'm always always a m and had to size down to an xs on this one. that's how large it was! even the xs had plenty of room; i'm 5'6 145 lbs 36b for reference. the material look like it will stretch out even further but i got it anyway. it was on sale plus 25% off and for that price i can use it for casual days on the weekends. it's comfortable on and loved the lace detail.

I was excited to see this top in person, but once i got a close up look at it (and also tried it on) i was disappointed. first, the color is much more persimmon orangey in person and that's a hard color to pull off for a lot of people. it just pulls any pink or red in your skin and highlights it. 

second, the top was poorly finished. i had to pick up two to try on because the lace was wonky across the front of the first one i grabbed. so much so that the lace was puckered because it had been

So i haven't actually tried this and i'm sorry for the misleading star rating. i just wanted to get someone's attention on the length. the photos show the dress draping with almost a train even with the model in platform heels but in the video, the dress is about 2 inches off the floor. is it the model in the video that is extra tall? someone help me out. this looks gorgeous but since it's an online exclusive, i won't be able to try it on at the store.

Order two sizes up to be safe (they shrink a bit during the first few washes). I have several pairs of these. I have maybe two, that I wear at least once a week. They both are on the cusp of tearing at several places. I'm expecting to need to replace them next year, so I'd say, look to get a year out of them. They really are great when they are new, and for the price, I'd probably just buy a new set every year. Its just a shame they wear so quickly.
This was well made and very cute.  If you're broad shouldered or big chested it may not work for you.  I could do a Hulk impression and split the shirt. I wish it worked for me.

I absolutely adore this skirt! sadly it was a lot of skirt for me- i'm 5 feet nothing and it would have been too much fabric to hem. wish this skirt came in a petite size. great color and a fun option for the fall wedding season!

Very attractive pattern and color. the black is so soft that it seems close to sepia. the length was fine. the fabric, meaning the dress, is quite heavy for not having a lining except just around the bra area---even though the facing didn't successfully substitute for a bra in my opinion. the arm holes are cut in quite a bit so one would have to find the appropriate bra.
the dress runs very large. i ordered an xs petite. it was about 2 inches too large (4 inches total) on either side across the

This top is really beautiful. the color is rich and the texture on the back is a unique touch. and i think it might have worked for me except that i could only find a m/l and it was just too big. i love drapey styles and think this top would have been just the right amount of drapey if i'd been able to snag a smaller size. but the m/l looked like a teal sack, so it's going back.
Wish the zipper was more durable. It broke after only a handful of washes.

The product arrived early. Material was good. Unfortunately, when I opened the package. The box was opened and pants looked like it was just shoved inside. Pants was really wrinkled and had a black stain by the buttons.
I have a curvy figure, and this top is not for me. it fits loose at the top and is tight at the bottom. it is also short. i think this top works best on slender figures.

This piece is stunning. you can dress up or down with it. my husband said "wow that's very elegant". it is very soft. thin but warm. however, it came to me with numerous holes along one strip of fabric. i returned it for another. it is a very delicate fabric. the zig zag stitching may snag easily.  i'm afraid it will not wash well. definitely a hand wash item. i'm not sure i will keep it in the end. the design i thought should be a 5 star because of the look and versitality of the item. quality

The dress fits true to size and is pretty comfortable. i did look kinda matronly with my 34d chest. it's a good basic to have on your closet, but i ended up returning the one i bought. it didn't feel special enough to keep.
I liked it, it was so soft inside but it was  big so I gave it to my grandma and she loved it! but I was sad it didn't fit .

I love these pants. like, obsessively love, like didn't want to take them off to wash them, love. annnnd i wish i hadn't because they came out of a delicate cycle cold water wash with a huge part of the leg seam ripped apart like a spider web. maybe i just got a bad pair, but i wasn't prepared to have to patch them after one wash for the price.

I had a really, really difficult time reviewing this dress. the instant i touched it, i wanted to love it! in theory, it should have worked for me. fit and flare is usually a really great option for my pear shape. the silhouette shows off my thinner upper body and camouflages my thicker lower body. best of both worlds! however, as you can see for yourself in the photo, this dress makes me look pretty big. i'm a solid size 8 and i feel this dress makes me look like a 12. it really makes my middle

I love the look of this dress. the fitting could use some work--the top layer could be slightly more fitted--but overall it looks adorable. as other reviewers have mentioned the top does not have any button loops. 

my biggest issue with the dress is the quality of the material. one time through the wash on the gentle cycle and the slip underneath has shrunk at least a full size. for the price of this dress, i don't expect disposable clothing. if i had known it would shrink, i would've hand wa
Fits true to size but very short with the pants

I really wanted this dress to work out, but i was slightly disappointed in the fabric for the sleeves. the fit was accurate. i'm 5'7 and ordered a 6, however, my husband said it looked too little girl like. i did end up returning it :(

This is a beautiful piece but the cut is not flattering. i ordered my usual small and while the top fit, the fringed part was huge, kind of "maternity." i can only imagine there was some clothes-pinning going on for the photo. this would have been great if it had about 4 inches of fabric removed from the lower part. obviously, it cannot be altered. so sad, must return.
Agree 100% with the other reviewer who said the material is too thick. Virtually zero stretchability
I love the brand and the Jacket but my Levi's were made in the USA. So why is this jacket over one hundred dollars when it's made in China? It's a nice jacket but no more Levi's for me.

I was searching for the perfect large comfy sweater for the cold winter weather ahead and i thought this would be it. it looks so cute in the pictures but when i received in by mail it wasn't what i was searching for. this sweater, like on the model, is quite large. although i wanted a large sweater, the fit of this one didn't fit well on me. it has more of a boxy feel to it. i usually wear a medium, but went with a small because i expected this to fit a little large and it still engulfed me. i

More importatn, super soft matieral and comfortbale, hwoever, when i put it on, ilfelt like i was wearing a robe... i do like the detial in the fabric, but jsut dind't feel right as cardigan. maybe purchase if you are looking for a light robe.

true to size, tried on xs, maybe petite would work too.

It's not totally apparent in all of the photos, but this dress does have a very noticeable a-symmetric hemline. i have read other reviewers that have said this dress is "forgiving" and a good choice for people with an hourglass frame. if you are truly an hourglass (small waist, larger shoulders and hips due to bone structure rather than weight,) this dress is a poor choice. the fabric of this dress tends to cling to the outermost hip, and the a-symmetry of this particular hemline not only draws

This is a lovely dress - however, there is a weird flap of fabric under the bow that doesn't sit right. it feels a little like a bib. if i could get it to sit right, i would keep it. every angle of the dress is lovely except for head on - which is a small problem.
Nice look but too tight.
No me gusta muy estrecho

I bought the blue dress, though the "blue" dress was a little more like grey according to my husband and i. the quality of the fabric was quite nice.

i have to return the dress because it does not fit me around the bust. i consider myself to have a good size bust (not huge), but the dress seems to expect quite a bit smaller. 

i was initially attracted to the dress because it looked a little more casual, which is what i wanted, but i guess i just wouldn't call it at all pretty.
Very loose fitting and long because of the way they fit. Not very stylish.

I followed the advice of other reviewers and sized down. however, the jacket was still too large. it fit fine in the arms but the body/width of the jacket was huge. also i found the wool material to be extremely itchy. it might work if you are layering it over long sleeves but still make sure to size down at least one or maybe even two sizes.
The sweater is soft.  The color however of the Light Pink/Lilac is way off, it is a Bubble Gum Pink color.  Not into this color so returning.
I want to love this dress. the colors and pattern are gorgeous, and i love the hemline. but something seems off in the chest and shoulders area. it almost feels a little slouch-y.

I really like the color of this and the feel, but that is where it ends. it does not come with the gorgeous flattering belt that it is pictured with, and is cut without shape so it does not fit to your body and show off any glorious womanly curves. i could purchase the belt with it, but i don't prefer to purchase products that cannot stand on their own.

the f shorts are SO THIN. for a summer time work out, PERFECT. but also some colors are see through. material is kinda fragile. one of the 5 pairs i bought have ripped already. they’re not made for lots of activity. more like lounge shorts for summer time.

I love everything about this sweater except the sizing. i purchased the deep red in xs. the yarn weight is perfect for me (in los angeles), the length is perfect, the sleeves are bell shaped but not at all a problem for me (they're not so big that they get in my way at all, unlike another reviewer),the collar can be folded in a way that it stands upright for a kind of retro look, which i love. the only problem is that the sweater is way too big. i can handle a wide, swingy style, but with the sl

A little disappointing. The arm openings at the cuff are not totally even. I like to pull the sleeves up a little bit and it is tight on the right making this difficult. Not a deal killer. I did not return it. It is OK.
The fabric is very thin, the fit is poor and small, I was disappointed since I've found many Amazon Essentials great items to buy. Sadly, this definitely isn't one of them. My advice, keep looking.

Ok, so I have bought all my Levi wedgies from Nordstrom. I wanted to try these. They are NOT the same fit even though I bought the same style and size. That being said, I think they are Levi’s cheaper line that they make for their outlet and places like Target. I have been to the Levi’s outlet and their wedgies fit like these ones, so I think they are authentic. They have way more stretch to them, way less “denim.” Wedgies fromNordstrom are much more stiff and less stretch, which is what I like since they have less spandex and more denim. That said, I think these are authentic, but lower line Levi’s, which makes sense given the cheaper price. This price is the same as the outlet price. So my recommendation: if you have never had wedgies, you may like these. If you have wedgies from a department store and love them, you won’t like the fit of these at all. I returned mine.

I bought this online in my usual size (petite xxs) for in-store pickup. when i tried it on, the kindest word to describe it would be "voluminous"--it was at least 2 sizes too big on me. i looked like i had taken grandma's tablecloth and constructed a homemade blouse. the blouse comes with an attached cami, which was also way too big for me. the color is not white (as described), but rather an ivory/cream color--definitely not the best shade for my light olive skin. i do think that it looks lovel
The top is beautiful however the inner layer is a but tighter than the outer layer, so it will tug the shirt in non-preferred directions. I am constantly tugging the shirt into place.
The cut of this dress is super flattering; I wanted to love it. However this was totally see through on me. I purchased the white, so perhaps other colors are better.
The fabric , feel and design of this dress is sooo cute, but so large that sadly, it will need to go back. beautiful and softly flowing design but so full that not flattering.

I was excited to buy this sweater based on the online pictures.  although the ombre coloring is beautiful in person, i did not like the metallic trim at waist & cuffs.  the pictures don't really show the extreme brightness of the trim.  it looks literally like xmas ribbons were sewn into the sweater.  to me it looked like something a child would wear.  i ordered the 1, which was the smallest size offered.  it is oversized without much shape and i felt it added bulk around the middle.

So this is still a pretty cute shirt, but my xs is missing the ruffle in the front and has layers on the bottom front of shirt. it doesn't seem to be defective, just a different version of the shirt. i'm curious to find out from others if they have gotten the same shirt as i have. still deciding whether to keep or not. no more left in xs to place another order and see what's up. i do wish it had the ruffle in front, as that is what caught my eye.
Very thin material which makes it lightweight and comfortable, but extremely see through which is why I ended up returning it.

I was so excited to try this on after having discovered it on the retailer app and stepping into the store and seeing it. on the hanger it looked alright, but once i slipped it on, it's like everything i've got going for me disappeared. granted, i'm s little bottom heavy, so these types of dresses don't typically flatter my body type anyways.
They are cute and true to size but I don’t have thick legs so they are a little baggy on the legs and butt. But besides that they are cute
The colors in this dress are much less vibrant in person. the scoop of the neckline is very wide and deep. i know others have posted that this is a great dress for work, but not in my workplace.
They are comfy and bottoms fit perfectly.
The fabric is great quality but it stretches too much around the waist making it look a little awkward. other than that the quality is good.
I will send it back. But i will try to order it again.

It feels soft and like a good quality. however it really does run large and long. i was looking for a loose tank but this one was almost a tunic on my short height and even with a cardigan to give it a shape didn't work out. i also thought it would shrink in the dryer but it didn't. also wrinkles easily.
The fabric is too heavy and scratchy for my taste. It is ok for doing summer errands. Nothing I would wear out for a special evening.

This sweater in the neutral beige coloration was exactly what i wanted to rotate through my winter legging/boot rotation with different vests, belts, and scarves...spot on. it is not heavy weight, soft, perfect length for a tunic on a 5'4 frame, 34c, 125 lb....now the weird part - sleeves were excessively long and seem to have stretched longer after wear??? anyway, hand wash and little to no pilling a plus. i literally roll up the sleeves to wear this tunic and it tends to be bothersome, hence t
These pants are very thin. It would be comfortable to wear in the SoCal summer but I am expecting them to rip at the knees very soon.
The small is huge on me and the sweater is very itchy. cute idea but not for me. i will return it.

This top has a really pretty pattern and is good quality, but was just too boxy for me. i also felt like the sleeves were a little odd/big. 

the fit is tts, though slightly shorter then it looks on the model.

The skirt in person is not like the picture. baggy and runs large. i wear jean size 25 and the xs is two size too loose. there's no pocket which is surprising on a denim. the slit in front makes the skirt  look even loose , no shape near what's in the picture. and there's no petite sizes. i am going to return it.
Beautiful victorian look blouse. runs large and overly blousy on me.
I wear a medium, 15 1/2 neck, 33 sleeve length.  This shirt was classified as a medium, but was more of a large.
The same size in Levi’s shorts fit perfectly, but these were small. I wish the sizing was more consistent. Otherwise they were nice pants, but I returned them.

I was a little surprised when receiving these on how thin they are. I am not quite sure yet, if they are thin/see through or just thin to allow an athlete to breathe...Color was very vibrant/very bright/not dull.Runs larger than expected them to run, could have sized down to an medium.

I really wanted to like this sweater. it was featured in the dressing room and i am a sucker for animal prints. the dog print is unique, a "mossy" fuzzy print, and the grey really shows off the dog print. i like regular xs because i like the fitted look (i am 5ft2in, 34b, 26 waist, 36 hips), the hem falls at my upper hip and the sleeves fall a bit pass my wrists. but, if you do not wear a turtleneck under it, you will scratch all day long. the designer should try on the fabric before selling it!

The design of this dress is darling and so unique, and it's very well made. but i agree it's very boxy and overwhelming for a petite frame. i'm 5'3" and ordered the 2, and it was like wearing a hospital gown. if a petite were available i'd have tried that, but this one's going back. shame, too, because it's adorable. the gap in the neckline could easily be stitched or sewn shut, but that's an inconvenience when this dress is already priced so high.

Very lovely sweater - lightweight with cute detailing at the side of the waist, sweet but not saccharine bow at the back of the neck. i really wanted to love this sweater, but it had to go back because it looked, um, used. pilling along the arms before i even got to wear it? it got returned, sadly.
I was in a bind to get lightweight pants for work. Little did I know these pants would be so baggy like puffy and mase videos.

I tried on the grey version in store, and it was significantly longer than pictured. the back came down to just below my knee, which looked awkward with the split sides. i am 5'4" and this was a regular (not petite) size. however, the overall quality of the fabric was good and it seemed durable.

This is such beautiful material, but the sleeves at the shoulders are terrible -- the gathered material makes it look like i'm wearing shoulder pads. that structured element compared to the rest of the dress (relatively unstructured) just looks ridiculous. i was so looking forward to this dress, and now it's going back.

This dress is really cute in person. however, it did not fit me like it does the model in the pic at all. first of all i'm 5 feet 1 and it was wayyy too short on me. i didn't have the petit on either-- i had the regular xs. it just hits a couple of inches too short for me. i am 50. it would be adorable if i were more comfortable in shorter dresses. i wear short things a lot, but this was just too high on me. it was probably a good 8 inches above my knee. also it flared too dramatically at the wa
I like this top.
Fits a lot different than the ones made in Mexico . Fit is very baggy and saggy Must use a different pattern in Nicaragua , try before you buy !
Doesn't lay flat, hard to keep smooth. Bunchy fabric not my fave, and looks messy on, even when fresh from dry cleaner.

I am so disappointed! I bought three pair, different colors. Right off the bat, first wash, the hem came out of the gray pair. It was withing the 30 day return window and so was sent back and replaced. The tan pair, however, went on vacation with me, washed it when I came back and just like the gray pair, the hem came out in one leg.  This pair is 9 days outside the return window so I am stuck with a pair of pants I will have to either hem myself or hire someone to hem. The fit is wonderful, they feel good, wash up beautifully, but the stitching in the legs is terrible. I can't recommend them unless you are adept at sewing in a hem.

I love ag jeans. i own several pair, and i think they wash well, and wear well. that being said, i'd never purchased a pair of the "stevie" cut before. they have the same quality one would expect from ag, and i like that the ankles aren't true skinny jeans, but have a little width. it's more on-trend for this season. for me, the issue was more with the color. i order pink. when they arrived, they were beautiful in the little plastic bag. my heart skipped a beat. hooray! cute new jeans! except, w

I bought this for a trip and days in, it started tearing at the seams on the sleeve. By the end of the trip, it was torn all around.Aside from that, it kept me warm on cold nights but sadly have to return

This is a beautiful dress with unfortunate design flaws at the bodice of the dress. the fit at hips and length is perfect, falling just to my knee (i'm 5'5" 142 lbs.) and grazing my hips. in that regard the fit is spectacular. but the bodice seems cut very oddly, which would require tayloring to correct. the armholes are large and flared at the bottom which leaves 'wings' just under the arms that stick out. since this dress has a side zip, to correct that would seem a major undertaking. the stra

This sweater has a fun big bold flower and a nice blue color and is quite roomy. the fit is larger around the arms and chest, which might work well for people who are very curvy on top. it seems to taper a bit to the waist. the roomy fit to the arms gives it almost a bat wing shape. it was too overwhelming on my petite frame, what with the bold flower and the fit, so i passed. but if you like the big flower and color and want a roomy sweater, this could work well for you.

I love these pants! best fitting pants i've ever owned. flattering. stretchy/don't stretch out. i am so sad that retailer didn't plan well and stock enough. i bought the black, want the gray and all sizes but 25 and 31 are sold out. i might just buy another black pair so i can have another. i really wish retailer would re-stock these!!!! although these are 5star pants, i rated them a 3 for retailers poor / low stock quantity.
I ordered a 3 pack of large, black, brown & green.What I got was 2 medium & 1 large.They are OK for lounging but the medium are a bit tight.

I have long arms & the sleeves were not quite long enough for me. I’m kind of curvy and found the way that the sweater gathered in the back at the bottom wasn’t  super flattering. It wasn’t awful, but enough that it would’ve bothered me. Length was great for my short torso and long legs. It could’ve wrapped around a little more nicely in the front. I’m a 34D-36D & it just barely wrapped around to cover (which isn’t how I usually wear similar sweaters, but worth noting for cold, windy days. Nice weight & seemed comfy, but not the right fit for me. On someone with shorter arms who is less curvy, it would be great, but not for me.

I'm not much for ponchos, but this one looked unique. it is thin, kind of a felt material - that was expected - but i was surprised to find it was shorter at waist than how it appears online,, and it was wide horizontally. the colors were more muted and the design was slightly off center unlike pic. the turtleneck was thick and itchy. it was a return.

This is a comfortable sweater dress, and the quality of the material seems good. the solid blue strip down the front makes it look very bland. i think it would need some dressing up with a necklace or scarf. i decided to pass.
These are baggy at 5’6
These run pretty small in the butt/hips/waist. Order one to two sizes larger.
I returned, it was tiny. Color was nice though but maybe size up

I’m normally a medium and that’s what I ordered. It fit great except the sleeves and shoulders were really poofy. my 14 year daughter asked if I was going to have dinner with the pilgrims when I tried it on… definitely not my style and didn’t fit like how the pic looked. Will be returning. I’m 5’4 135lbs 36b and wear a size 6-8 in pants
The dress was pretty but the pattern on the material didn’t match on the sides and I felt that cheapened the look of the dress.

I received this yesterday and the fit for me is so strange...to tight in the bust and the arms were to big for me..i am so bummed...the arms do not stay on my shoulders. i have many tops but maeve and they fit me well..this is the first one i have to return. this top is made well and i do recommend, but it should be tried on before purchasing as it is pricey if it does not fit you!

I'd previously ordered a medium in Navy (May 2021) and the fit was what I'd call "relaxed." I kept them because, though I like long pants more fitted, a pair of loose shorts is perfect for lounging around the house, gardening, or exercise (a kind of "full" fit that allows completely unrestricted movement).  Back then, I used the Amazon recommendation to determine my size selection. (It was based on purchases of size 4 32" inseam Wrangler jeans and Baleaf highwaisted size S 32" length yoga pants and Prana size 2 reg Halle hiking pants among other orders.) In other words, I bought what I "knew" was one size too big, because I wanted exactly that "full" fit. (My stats are: 5'8", 130 lbs, waist 26", hips 36.5".)This most recent pair is Light Steel. Right out of the package, the fit on them is beyond loose. I am hoping they'll shrink, because they are NOT at all flattering -- too long (touching my kneecaps!) and tent-like in the waist and hips. I'd swear they didn't have a size chart when I ordered my Navy pair and a look at the current chart would suggest a size XS. Besides after laundering the Navy ones, they were the right amount of loose for me.Here's the current (Aug 2022) chart:US WOMEN'S SHORTS SIZE CHARTSize  Waist  HipXS  27 - 28  35.5 - 36.5S 28.5 - 29.5 37.5 - 38.5M 30.5 - 31.5 39.5 - 40.5L 33 - 34.5 42 - 43.5XL 36.5 - 39 45.5 - 47.5XXL 41 - 43.5 49.5 - 51.53XL 45.5 - 48 53.5 - 55.5I also have a Black pair (size M) ordered, but they're not due to arrive for another 5 days. My history with Hanes is that there can be HUGE differences in fit and fabric content between colors, so I will give the Black ones a chance. I will definite keep the better (out-of-the-box) fitting of the two and may or may not return the reject.

Pretty good for value leader jeans. One caution: buy the size that you would if they weren’t stretch jeans. I typically go down a size in the waist if I buy jeans with spandex in them, otherwise the fit is too sloppy. These jeans don’t use genuine spandex, it elastic thread by another name and they don’t stretch much. Accordingly, they fit like non-stretch jeans. Otherwise, my wife likes the way that look and fit.

.

I love the metallic colors of this top and figured i could wear it under a ruched jacket and circle skirt for work. welp, that's out the window. this design is poor. for one, this is not a piece for a petite woman with no torso and i don't know how anyone with a longer torso wears t his. this hits above my belly botton on and i got apetite 2. i have no torso. so, without a jacket, i would never wear this. it's very low cut..the back is very low..it's a little loose but i run between a 2 and a 4.

While the dress is pretty, it's a lot more boring than it seems online. the box top is actually a completely separate piece, which is kind of neat - you can choose to remove it or not. the box top is very wide (much wider than on the model) and very unflattering! also, the dress is a stiff silk fabric and doesn't flow like you would think it would. returning it!
I purchased this shirt with the purple colored flowers. while the cut is fine, the quality of the fabric is not great so the shirt is very see-through. will be returning it.

This is a beautiful beaded shirt. the quality seems good. i just didn't like the shoulders. they are pleated and puffy. the picture doesn't really show them very well. also the collar is a little floppy. i was hoping it would have an option to stand up but that is not the case. the beading is well done and looks to be stable. i just thought it ran a little large and the shoulders looked puffy. i returned it.

Loved this shirt but it runs pretty big. i'm normally a sm/med due to bust size (34ddd) and ordered a small based on other reviews. could have gotten an x-small. debating going to exchange. i ordered it in three colors bc it was on sale. better quality than some at retailer.
The shirt is beautifully made and very comfortable. i'm a medium though, and i ordered as such- but it's way too big for me.

The pants look good I like the color, the rips, and the style. I usually wear a 34/34 when it comes to pants. I am more built so my legs and butt needed more room in the pants I couldn’t zip them up. I will be purchasing the pants again in a size 36. When they arrive I will leave a review on those as well.

I really like the look of this dress, but i ended up returning it because it was too short. the shoulder area was also too big on me.

Pretty color and fabric nice but small.

This top is beautiful in the model shot, but average in person. it ran really small, i usually take a medium in retailer tops and ordered this in a medium. it barely fit over my chest, and was pretty short (i am 5'7"). also, the material is very thin, not so much that you can see your undergarment, but if you get cold everyone will know it. also, for the price, i expected a sturdier fabric. i would recommend holding out for sale, if you are interested in this top.
This dress is well made and of good quality it just looked a little too old on me. the skirt was heavy and the fabric was cozy, perfect for a fall outfit.

Large definitely was more like an extra large. It would be ok if winter time and I had on layers but not for summertime. I’m 5’9” 180lbs and it was way too big. I like this blouse. I am 5’4 1/2, 140 lbs., 36 B bosom. I ordered Size  Medium in the flowered rose color and the color and print are very pretty. It is fully lined, no undershirt needed, and it is “flowly”  and very comfortable BUT, it fits very loose on the body.  It is the correct size for me  because the shoulder and chest area fits my body well, doesn’t slip down, does not show too much cleavage nor do the sleeves slip off my shoulders.  A size small would be too tight and uncomfortable around by shoulders. To make this blouse look good on me, I have to front tuck it into my pants . It looks good with jeans, casual and dressy pants.

I did my best to remove the lace with scissors but the remaining pieces of lace continue to be scratchy. If you don’t get easily bothered by scratchy things in your clothes, it may be a good comfy option.
The design of these is adorable with the lace up ties however they are a dingy looking off white color. they are also pretty see through. returned.
Nice sweater, not as great quality as photos show. It's not very soft & cozy as I expected but good for business casual in the fall / winter for work.

First of all, I purchased these at Target.  But they are the same as what is on this page and I want to get another pair because they are good for work.  The biggest issues are the following:The first and weirdest is that if you look at the photo (and it's hard to see), there are tiny yellowish strands that appear on the surface as the pants wear.  At first I thought I had brushed up against some pollen, but after washing and wearing they are becoming more numerous on high traffic spots.  I haven't figured out how to get rid of them.  I feel like if they weren't there, the pants wouldn't look faded.Second, the back pockets ARE too small (see the one start reviews).  My wallet has dropped out twice, luckily in the car as I was getting out.  The left rear stitching also came apart causing me to not be able to use it until a repair was done.Why three stars?  Because they fit me correctly, and the zip pocket on the side is useful.  The durability is the question, I've had these for daily wear for around 5 months. They are perfect for my job because it's more about function than appearance...  So I will buy them again.  Looking here because it looks like they are not carried at Target and may be about to be discontinued.

I gave three stars because I love and am keeping the print, but I have no idea what I will receive if I repurchase. I recommend to try multiple colors and sizes if you are comfortable with returns.

First, this is a really cute suit and I'm excited to put my kid in it for Easter. However, there were a few disappointments. First, the photo showed an image of a Navy jacket with khaki pants, light blue, shirt and pink tie. What was delivered was a navy jacket, grey pants, blue shirt, and navy/gold striped tie. Like I said, it's a cute outfit. It just wasn't what was described. Secondly, while the jacket seems quite nice, the pants seem very low quality. The material is super thin. Lastly the tag on the shirt is really irritating, and one of those stiff plastic feeling tags that even when you cut it out of the shirt, the remnants still remain.I'm giving this review three out of five stars because the product as a whole is still a good deal for the price. I just wish it came as described. Ultimately, I ended up buying an additional tie so my son and daughter would match colors. So maybe the price wasn't such a good deal after all.Anyway, if you're not picky... Go for it! If you want something specific, get it somewhere else.
