I needed something relatively light weight and insulated to use for chilly work days. This pretty much does what I had in mind. It's a decently light weight and the insulation keeps you warm. What keeps it from getting 5 stars is that it could breath better and the drawstrings for the hood are ridiculously long.
The lace detail is very classy. a great go to white dress.

I am going to have to disagree with the first reviewer. this is not the most beautiful top i have ever purchased from retailer, but i like it. it is a nice change from the swing silhouette that tendd to look like maternity wear on me. the key to this is to tighten the drawstring a bit. it is a working drawstring all the way around, and i find that the top is much cuter with the drawstring cinched a bit. i actually like the flowing arms, too. the fabric is lightweight - nice for the very warm midwe

I got this top in navy and i love it. it's loose and flowy and comfortable, yet dressy enough to wear for work (or dress down with jeans). i'm 5'4", 125lbs and the 6 was a bit large on me. i could've sized down a little but i actually liked the loose fit, and the length was long enough to tuck in if i wanted to. definitely recommend.

I love this skirt; but it is so long that i have ordered the petite as well to see which one i will keep. i am tall; but even pulled up higher than my waist, there is at least 3 inches too much in length and i want to wear a flat shoe or boot with it. if i keep this one, it will need to be altered. 
it has pockets which i love. it is an effortless long skirt which i will wear christmas day for sure. the pattern is stunning with the mixed prints. the fabric is silky. it can be dressed down with a
Really gorgeous dress...great fabric/weight, great color & style. runs one size small. i ordered my regular 6 but had to return...hope the 8 works!!!
This dress is nicely made , fits well and is the right length.
Not a second or misfit .  Proper size

The blue is a beautiful color, rather unique and it is really soft being cashmere. although, for the price i do feel it should of been a bit more "special". i also feel it's loose lower half feels a bit maternity. all that being said i do like the overall sweater and am keeping it as the color and feel win.
A nice alternative to jeans, good fit. i like the casual but edgy rocker look they have. will look good with booties and full length boots. i took the same size that i do in all pilcro pants.

For me a good pencil skirt makes me feel so ladylike. i love eva franco pencils but be warned they are designed to be a tight fit through the tush. i wear a 12 and i ordered the 12 in this skirt. the pouch another reviewer pointed out seems intended to be a pocket, but because the skirt fits me pretty snugly it doesn't stick out when i walk and sit. the fabric does seem like it would snag easily so i'll choose accessories thoughtfully. for reference i have a 33" waist and 42" hips.
This shirt runs boxy, but the print is as cute as it looks online

This sweater is beautiful, but is definitely more for looks than warmth. it's very soft, but very thin. i prefer the way it looks open rather than buttoned. i got the moss green color on sale, and i am glad i didn't pay full price for it--it's lovely, but certainly not worth $88.

I actually like this top, but i am wearing it as a cowl neck rather than off-the-shoulder. i found it at the store, so i didn't even know it was supposed to be that way. i have the ivory color, and it it does have some tan/beige specks in it, but i don't mind this at all, it adds some texture and warmth. i think it is a great neutral top for work. it has a double layer of fabric, so not sheer at all, and this keeps it smooth over my middle without a tank or cami.

Comfy, warm, soft. No pockets.

This is a super cute dress. I wore it to a wedding and got tons of compliments! I ordered a medium. I usually wear S/M in most women's dresses. I do think I could have sized up. I had to pin the chest area though so my bra wasn’t poppin out all night.

Really cute top, comfy, with just enough flare that it can be dressed up a bit, or worn just casual. not clingy at all...in fact, maybe just a tad too flowy around the middle, but not so much that it kept me from going back to buy it immediately in a second color! i typically wear a large, but suspect the arms on the medium might be a tad small if i sized down.

Fit is a little big but usable. I ordered the size 4 for my 5 year old who usually wears a size 5. They’re a little baggy but still work. Quality is good, the white is a little see through but not too bad.
If u have found this jacket buy it. Like right now. What are u waiting for? Go ahead and add it to ur cart. Then u can thank me later.

Absolutely beautiful & so soft. I was reading other reviews about the quality and its longevity. I just got it so haven’t had that issue yet however the minute I took this sweater out of the package I knew this was delicate and had to be either dry cleaned or washed in a cold delicate cycle. So for now I am saying it is perfect

This sweater is super cute and perfect for a fall day. however, i am 5&#39;9&quot; and ordered a small which was way too long in the arms (the sleeves came down to my fingers). wish there was an xs i could order because i do love it.

As the sizing indicates these jeans are cut for juniors. If you have hips or a butt, size up. I did and they are still a bit tight across the hips/thighs. Hoping after a few wears they will loosen up. If they do, I will order a second pair because these jeans are just what I was looking for.
The color of this t is beautiful and the shimmer is understated. very thin fabric, but should be fine.
I have difficulty finding pants that stay on my waist without a belt. These stay up due to the elastic waistband perfectly
Now this is a summer staple! love the design of the bib of this tee. super soft, great neutral charcoal color and can be dressed up or down. it is loose, i'd recommend sizing down.

Love how soft and stretchy these are! They don't restrict at all (so these aren't for you if you want compression) I got them for post partum comfort and beyond...they make the best shorts for under a dress and often are my go to for sleeping (and I'm a hot sleeper). Only downfall is they slide up through out a wear. They wouldn't be good for working out, but for comfort they are perfect!

First off, i adore this jumpsuit.  i love the mixed stripes and i love that the fabric is structured, textured and substantial.  and for me, the xs fits perfectly, however the sizing is way off from standard sizing. i'm 5'2", 110, 24.5 waist, 32.5 hips, and usually 00p-0p, and this is fitted on me.  the wide legs aren't too wide like most wide legs (which wear me instead of vice versa) and the structure of the fabric make this piece so flattering for petite ladies.  if you are petite, this jumps
This sweater is amazing. color is vibrant. quality is high. but i have a super long torso and it fell short on me. if you are shorter this will be amazing. sad to send it back.

Great layering top! love the color- grey striped, matches almost anything. the sizing is perfect and the material is nice and think but not so chunky that it adds pounds to your frame. interesting detail with the snap neck looks sporty and jeeps it from being just another basic turtleneck.
Love the style and cut of this top, but fabric is quite thin. tts if not a tad on the small side. i'm small busted so my usual medium was fine. undecided if i'm keeping this top or not.
Got an XL for my boyfriend who is 6'3. He likes to wear oversized t shirts to be comfy. It definitely has a loose fit. I would've liked one size smaller on him, but he really likes it as it is.
The jeans actually was good quality I was kind of shocked will order again !

Yeah before I ordered these I read reviews saying go up a size than your normal,nope there definitely regular sizes and fit to match.because once I got them after listening to the reviews they ended up being to big,yay.but they are stretchable so even if they were to small for you it would still stretch to fit more than likely.othe than that they look good 👍

This is a cool relaxed style with the benefit of an open neckline to add a bit of femininity. i tried on the faded blue and striped colors in the store. the faded blue goes well with the style, but the stripe is cute too. the sleeves are quite long and too tight to roll up, so if you are petite like me you will definitely want to order the petite size- and probably even those you who are in between petites and regular sizes. the sleeves may also be too narrow for some people.

I love the lace up design and bought the red xsp, fabric is a bit thin and mediocre quality, but over all happy with purchase. wish this top came in navy and white as well. even a navy/white stripe would be a fun option too. thanks you for offering this top in a petite size. :)

This sweater is far more slouchy and relaxed in fit than in it seems in the photograph. definitely size down. honestly, i kinda love it anyways! the inside is so very soft, and it's perfect for a sleek errand-running or hiking kind of day!

Very pretty top. runs a bit large (i generally take an xs and the xs in this top fits me a little longer and larger than on the model). comfortable and easy to wear. nice cut with angled front and bit longer back. did develop a small hole very quickly as some thinner and tissue tees do but hoping that's unusual as i did buy two different colors of this tee shirt and will be totally disappointed if this happens to both, especially at this price.
I like this shirt.  It's pretty and flattering.  I ordered the ginger color and it's not sheer at all.  I ordered a Medium.  I'm 5'9" about 155 lbs and it fits great.

When i tried these on in the store in my size, but thought they felt tight, but the person helping me pointed out that they hug you, but are not uncomfortable. i uncuff the bottom and wear them full-length. ended up buying one of each color.

Overall looked pretty good for the price in comparison to everything else out there which is why I gave it a 4. It wouldn’t have been too difficult to tailor to fit a little better. The adjustable waist band on the pants was pretty cool it just took a minute to figure it out. The one problem was the bottom button and hole did not line up which for me was not initially a deal breaker because I could fix it up a bit to at least look good on the outside although the button would need to be moved to the edge of the fabric almost. I eventually decided linen wasn’t the best choice for us and I really don’t need yet another project right now
Super cute version of your standard chambray shirt. i'll be adding more of my own patches to this one!
Too sheer outside
It is pretty and dressy looking o have not worn yet. Undecided on how it looks on me I am picky and large busted so it hangs out.
Comfortable but not sweatpants!

I bought this in the white in both the sp and the mp. i am 5'2". i ended up keeping the mp (my usually size at 36c, broad shoulders). i found that the top of the sleeves to be a bit snug and i have normal size arms. if you look at the model shots, you can see that they are tight on top. i also found this shirt to be very long, even in the petite sizing. overall, i kept it as it was slimming, quality made, and the tight sleeve hopefully won't bother me (or shrink!)

I have bought several of these jackets over the years and they work well in keeping you dry. The water repellency will wear off in 3 or 4 years, depending on usage, which is OK in my opinion. You will sweat some if you wear it an hour or longer in very warm weather. Wear characteristics are good overall.

These pants are so stretchy that without a belt they continue to slide down.  Very weird fit, not digging the feel or fit.  Anything you put in front pockets is a giant bulge.  Pretty comfy on the motorcycle but would not want them on a long haul ride.
Cute top, i actually got a lot of compliments on it.  the white is slightly see through, which doesn't bother me but could bother other people. all around cute casual piece.

I like the idea of a skort, and how it is different than everything else out there. this skort is a bit dressy--perfect for a summer party or drinks on the patio at a city cafe. i love that it has pockets. the fabrics used in the patchwork are quality and the tailoring is nice. it fit me true to size. i can't wait for warmer weather to wear it!

These are pretty good high-rise jeans--probably the best you'll find for the price. they're all one color, no whisking or fading, so they look dressier than your average jeans, and the cut through the leg is bone straight, which i think flatters most body shapes. i agree with the other reviewers--they are tight. i got these in a 25, my usual size, and they squeeze my belly. i probably could've sized up, but i'm waiting to see if they stretch out the way most levi's do.
Nothing to dislike.  It fits comfortably , not fitted.

I like the sweatshirt, but I should have paid more attention the color description "safety orange" rather than the pictured color which is darker and a more muted color.  It is lightweight and comfortable.  I ordered all three of the blue colors. I am 5'6", 150 lbs and generally wear a medium in all tops.

This dress is so lovely in person, with more muted colors than pictured which will transition nicely into fall.  the overall cut of the dress is really flattering, especially for hourglass/ pear figures.  sadly, i had to return the dress because the arms were insanely small.  i after putting the dress on, i was worried i wouldn't be able to actually get it off.  if you have teeny, tiny arms...you'll probably be okay with your regular size.  if you have any kind of muscle (or squish :)), size up.

This is a really pretty shirt - the colors are beautiful.  it runs large, and it's semi-sheer.  shape is loose and boxy, but because it's more sheer, it didn't seem as boxy.  i'm tall, and this was long enough.  only change would be to make the sleeves a little less bell like.  not tight, but lose some of the volume.
The material and fit just wright

The details on this are beautiful. i love the gold thread and white beads. i thought the medium fit too large and got the small. it seems to fit really well. so you might want to size down one size. the only thing that seems a bit off it the length. it's pretty long.

I absolutely loved the print on this shirt, and as soon as i saw in the catalog i knew i had to have it. the velvet is beautiful and the pattern is even more rich in person. unfortunately, the shirt is very thin ? much thinner than i'd expect with velvet ? and is so short that it is more like a crop top. even with the shoulders pulled down for the off the shoulder look, the front of the shirt hit me barely below my navel. for reference, i'm only 5'1. i would buy this over again if it were only l

This is a cute and quirky feminine top with the ruffle detailing and polka dot flannel inside the sleeve cuffs. i wish it was little longer and maybe not flannel, then it would be perfect, but overall i liked it. i am 5'5", 135lbs, 34c, curvy/muscular frame (plus a relatively short torso) and the small fit throughout the shoulders and chest.
They fit and thy were a good price but due to the widened of the legs make for a boxy look,

I first saw this shirt on one of the workers at the retailer stores and it looked beautiful. i loved it so much i had to order it when it came on sale. the fit is a little too short for my liking, but i think i can make it work. also, it does fit a little snug around the arms but it at least it doesn't show your undergarments. overall, i think it is absolutely beautiful. the fabric has a beautiful shimmer to it and it looks easy to dress up for a day at the office or a night on the town, or paired
Husband approved.  He likes them.  Fabric just a bit thin.
Although this shirt runs a little large, the snowflske and stripes makes it a classic. very comfortable shirt.

In maeve i run between a size 2-4.  my regular size 4 was too tight in the shoulders, the fabric didn't drop off the shoulders like it does on the model.  it also felt too tight near the back were the button is, almost as if there was not enough fabric.  the sleeves were also too short and tight around the arms.  sized up to a 6 and all those issues were fixed.  since this top is billowy anyway the size up really didn't mess with the shape of the top.  love the gold color, so pretty!
Color is beautiful I usually wear a 34 x 32. This one was extremely tight on the legs. I'm no Mr Olympia but dam. But it did make my ass look fat.
Exactly as described and light weight, proper sizing and flattering

Overall great romper! i have a long torso and thicker legs so i sized up to a small and i am very happy i did. the shorts are a bit on the shorter side and go upon the sides so another reason to consider sizing up. the quality is great and super soft chambray with a trendy tie up.

But the back of it, by the waist, bunches just a tiny bit. if i get bigger, it will be too long. but i love the skirt, it is flattering and cute. not itchy for me even if the title says wool. i ordered the 00p and the length is pretty much as pictured, just below the knee in front. the waist is snug, bigger it would fall more on my hips (hence the too long comment earlier. (115 lbs, 26-27 in waist, short legs...)
Very flattering to a woman's figure. can dress up or down.

I love thick T-Shirts and this is a thick classy T-Shirt material. Very dressy for business. However its… SEE THROUGH… I only ordered white. Its thick enough that it shouldn’t be see through. To be clear I put both a nude and white bra under it and could see them. I love the shirt just not the part where I need an undershirt thats also a t-Shirt … because you can fully see the cami too.

This sweater is very pretty but the material is extremely thin. the blue was ok but the white is nearly see-through. the design is unique but unless it fits really well, the bottom hem where it criss-crosses can bunch out in a weird way. i got my usual s and it was rather loose, causing this to happen. i suggest you size down if you want it to look smooth like it does on the model.
Its a stocking stuffer
Sleeves are bigger than I like. But very comfortable shirt!! Great length too.

The color of the sweater I received is not what I would call marshmallow. I have always considered marshmallows to be white, like in the photo. This is more off-white. I'm not mad about it because I like the actual sweater, but do not order if you are looking for a stark white sweater. the sweater is a stretchy. Again, I'm not mad about it. It's very comfortable.
Overall cool pants, looks like a jeans but rather streachy one. Time will tell how they survive the washing machine and everyday life.

I got this number in the turquoise and i hadn't expected the skirt to be ribbed! are they all like that? retailer was out of the petites, so i sized down in a regular instead -- yeah, that didn't work. i definitely needed the petite version and perhaps should have even sized up. the bust was scandelously tight. in the end the dress wasn't flattering on my figure the way this style usually is on me -- the proportions were off somehow. it's just not one of those dresses that curvy petite girls shoul

This dress is exactly what i was looking for. i have a very business casual job but wearing jeans and blouses can get boring so i'm constantly on the lookout for easy, go-to dresses that i can throw on year round with flats, booties, sandals, etc. this dress is exactly what i had in mind and i look forward to wearing it in the fall/spring with booties and in the winter with tights.
The material was a little stiff. But, the design is nice.

I love the desi blouse! i got it in white and it's a little more off white than pure white, but it is a great flowy top. the touch of lace across the bust is a nice accent. the only down fall is that the sleeves are a bit puffy, but the rest of the top makes up for that.

I did size up on this one. it came in and it was too snug for a loose shirt. i sized up and i love it now. i went to the store and bought it in white and black. i sized up in the white but not the black. you may want to try them on before purchasing them. i want more.
Very nice and true sized. Excellent coverage not sheer at all
But the fabric seems to be acrylic? It’s very cute on but not sure it will stand the test of time?
Good company, good product good for working.
I love the look of this dress but wish the bottom was lined like the top is. it's a little sheer without the lining.

I bought the extra small and although i love the style and unique color combo, it's pretty large in the collar area and without the right blouse/shirt underneath it makes my neck look really skinny. the rest of the coat is true to size, longer and straight. the design just doesn't have the right balance for me so i'm sending it back.
Great shirt however sizing is a little askew. Strongly suggest to purchase a smaller size, as all but one in our wedding party had to return and purchase again one size smaller.
Too long but ok

Beware ladies! these are the first pair of cartonnier pants i've tried that actually run large! i have several other pair of cartonnier crops that are sized way up to a 10 (my normal size is 6 or 8). to my surprise, my normal size 6 in these for perfectly!! the fabric is way different than the printed crops. i got the bright red, and fabric is stretchy! great fit and great weight for summer!
Looks nice, easy machine wash, just wish I didn't have to iron the vest and pants.

I had previously purchased this dress in all black from Macy’s (size large).  Size was perfect so I expected this one to be the same.  When I finally put it on this summer…it seemed to be smaller.  It was too snug to wear out & about and feel confident.  I tried the black one back on just to make sure it/compare again, and it fit perfectly.  I wouldn’t say the flowered one fit as a “medium” - it wasn’t THAT much smaller - just seemed to cling in places I didn’t want it to whereas the black one didn’t do that.  Perhaps if I wear shape wear or lose about 5 pounds it will get worn.
Works as expected.  Might even be a little too stretchy
I think the shirt is supposed to be a relaxed  fit, but i could have definitely gone down a size

My significant other looked handsome in this shirt. He jas extra wide shoulders but it fit him perfectly.  My only complaint would be that the buttons were looser than I cared for and one came off in the wash so I just resowed them on.
was a little loose at waist

I loved this dress and i really loved it more after i bought it on sale. i am 5'3 100lbs and the only thing that bothers me is that the arm of it are somewhat tight when i reach out to get something. other wise the dress is great and get a lot of compliments on it. i paired it with black nylons and black plain leather booties and it looked great!
I order my actual size 16 just like all my other pants, these fit like a size 14, length wise they fit percent. They don’t have much stretch to them so size up.

I love the look of this blouse and i like the light weight material. it would require a camisole underneath but could be worn at the office or a night out. i purchased a size 4 and it fit perfect once i was able to get it on so i wouldn't want a larger size but because it doesn't button down all the way and it's so fitted in the waist it was nearly impossible to get it on and off over my shoulders, there's no give at all. sadly i'm going to have to return it.

I have a sillier style sweater from moth that i got last year and love. this is not as great, but i like the style so i will keep it. i knew the sleeves would be shorter, but wish they were made full length with a little less "bat wing". the color is close to as shown- maybe a little lighter. i was hoping for more of a navy since that is what they are calling it- but this is more of a denim blue.

This blouse is very pretty, but the overlap in the front is a little "strange." it seems to fall open and will require either a pretty pin to hold it closed or a cami underneath. despite that "flaw" i am glad that i purchased this blouse. the trim at the shoulders gives it a romantic and special appeal.

Well made and fit nice. Fabric didn’t seem like it would wrinkle. At 5’6” I felt it was too long and made it look matronly.  Ultimately, I returned it. I ordered several black dresses and kept another. This was my second choice but it would have required hemming.

This dress is stunning- vibrant colors and flirty feel to it. i got the small and i am a 34b/27 pants, 132 lbs- great fit. i only question two things- am i tall enough to pull off the extra fabric in the back and what the heck do you where for a bra? those two considerations are why i didn't give it 5 stars.

Cashmere is soft as a feather, yet warm, easy to wear and the pointelle stitches are lovely. i feel lovely wearing this and i'm really not that kind of "lady". so, if you imagine a side of yourself wanting to try out feeling lovely, bite the bullet and buy this cardigan. it does run small in my bust area, but all the rest fits well.

Good quality as known by UA. Sizing seems consistent with other styles that are the same size. Stretchy waist AND tie string, which is really nice. Length is great. Shorts are a little thinner than I expected but I think white or nude undies will work under them. Bought for kiddo that is 4’11” and solid 95-100 lbs

I love this blouse. the color is so pretty! i might even wear this to a holiday party. the tie looks great so many ways--love the versatility. i think i will get a lot of wear out of this blouse--with a pencil skirt, jeans or under a blazer.
Great colors and cut. This runs pretty small. You should size up at least one if you want to wear it.

While shopping with my daughters, i bought this tee in white. i immediately felt guilty for spending too much on a white tee that was thin and see-through enough that i'd need to wear something underneath. i returned the white, but then retailer had a sale weekend, so i ordered the blue with a discount, so less guilt and the color is beautiful. i don't need to worry about wearing anything underneath - the fabric is very thin and super soft and feels so nice.
Cute top, good color, fabric is a little rough and scratchy
Good design, comfortable fit. however, sizing is way off. i am a 34c and the small fits with minimal support. agree with the previous review. not sure it is a keeper.
I have thicker arms and wide back but it fits perfectly, weight about 250 pounds, the material its ok for a regular shirt
This had been folded for so long - I ironed it, I washed it, I ironed it and finally took it to the dry cleaner to have the creases steamed out. Otherwise, fit is as expected and looks nice.

This top fits loosely through the body and a little snigger in the bust. fabric is nice but does require some ironing/steaming at times. it is a little pricey but you won't find anything similar so being unique makes it worth the cost. i ordered online but it was available at my local retailer store; unfortunately the online order didn't show availability & i would have liked to see it first since i was unsure of size ( usually wear medium if top has a relaxed fit, large if not). very cute too!
Me gustó, aunque hubiese Sido mejor una talla más pequeña

These jeans have the good, classic 501 jean construction with medium weight fabric, tight french seams, and grommets at the ends of seams through the torso. however, the construction was not an ideal "boyfriend" slouchy style from my small hipped perspective. on me, these jeans were very large through the hips.
another odd fitting (assuming we are talking about "boyfriend" jeans) issue is tapered lower leg. i can imagine the jeans would fit a woman with average to slightly padded hips, but that

The blazer is a good material and well tailored. I bought the xx at first when I was pregnant nad it was too big for my 5ft 9in, 38ddd 42in bust. I bought the xl it was still too big. I bought the L and it was ok at 210lbs, 37wks pregnant. So post-part, I did not put on much weight. I am like 190lbs, 40im bust, 33in waist and 44in hips now so I bought the M and it works for me. I do not have fat or very muscular arms. If you do, go with the L because I do feel the tension in the arms when putting it on but once it is on, it is very comfortable and it looks more slimming than oversized like the Large.

I love love this top. it is a very pretty casual top. it looks very nice on and is more like a tunic. perfect with jeans, very casual but the embroidery, ruffle sleeves, and buttons at the top add a nice touch. i have the red, i am considering buying this in blue as well, i have so many newly purchased blue tops!

This hoodie is really cute-i got the polka dot color and it is very soft and roomy. i am normally a small but got the medium and it fits exactly how i wanted. however-it is not a pullover and instead zips up. so odd that the pic of the hoodie is a pullover. debated returning because i wanted a pullover, but have decided to keep it because of how soft it is.

If you are afraid of the jumpsuit trend but like dresses, this will be for you. 
 the cut is flattering, and may not need a bra (i am droppy, but it was fine). the legs are wide enough that one time, i had both legs in one hole, so-to-speak, and it is very flowy. the patterns are both nice, i like the geometric one, but the polka dot is always a classic. the petite size fit me just right (xsp) at 115 lbs, 30dd. i like the tie it goes from around the cups to tie on the back, so you can almost ti
Prior reviewer nailed it with the summary of this dress. it definitely needs heels. i'm 5'4", 120#, 34d and this is a size 36. i usually wear a size s or 4 with most retailer stuff.

I have two other pair of the shorts in medium and light blue in size 6 (I typically wear 8). The black fit VERY different. I ordered a 6 for myself and 8 and 10 for my mom. None of them fit me. The size barely differed between all 3. Crazy how they differ between colors. Great shorts, just not in the black.
Very nice. True to size. Wash up nicely

I just received the top today, and will send back for a larger size. i am i between a 4 and 6, so tried the 4 thinking it would be boxy. it is very fitted with no opening to assist in pulling over shoulders. i am hoping the 6 is only slightly bigger. the shirt also had a slight musty odor. it's a rather thin chambray....with 3/4 sleeves. the top came to just the top of my jeans, which should work for higher waisted skirts or layering.
This is a very pretty dress and looks just as it's pictured.  however, there is a lot of fabric - the lower half is very full and runs very large.

Love the shape of this top. i bought in white and a friend bought in the neutral pink. we both required a tank/cami to layer under it. i am 5'5", 135lbs, 34c, curvy/muscular frame and ordered a size small.

I ordered a m and l based on the reviews - and both were too big. this is a drapey top with large arm(pit) openings.
i have since ordered a small and hope this fits well.
in general, this top is beautiful.
i usually wear a 4/6 or s/m top/blouse and am 5'8" with a slim build. the m should have fit better than it did.

Great leggings for the price. they are ultra soft and stretchy. a great pair of leggings to relax in. they are very stretchy and only come in 2 sizes s/m, l/xl. i am 5' tall and they fit fine, because usually such generic sizing is too large for my small frame. they are a bit long for a petite person, but tucked into boots and nobody will know.

I always coveted a pair of flower camos that my sister used to wear. they were perfect, fitted, but not too, casual but not too. i saw these and thought to myself that i finally found them, that i didn't have to covet my sister's pants any more. these check all the boxes--comfy, stylish, high quality, but by the end of the day, they bag out. when i wore them, i had to keep pulling them up--a belt would certainly help. so, i love the pants, but am a bit disappointed with how they lose their shape

This dress has the perfect amount of swing to it that it hides a stomach - which i looooove! the blue chambray color is beautiful and it is lined partially. so here's what i don't like - this dress would have been so much better fully lined. now it could just be that i am extra sensitive to fabric and find it to be a bit itchy where the ruching is on the upper back of the dress. but i somehow can't get myself to take it off the hanger to wear it....i may just be returning this dress.

I bought the mosaic pattern in a small. the pattern and colors look much better in person. the design and quality are solid. the top runs small. it is difficult to put on, but stays in place. i would recommend.

I was attracted to this sweater because of the pretty fur collar and the color, which is a gray-black that seems to go with everything. the cut is a-line so it drapes over what you are wearing underneath. since the fabric is soft it doesn't add a lot of bulk and keeps the fit flattering even though it is not fitted. i have worn it many times since purchasing because the color and fit make it easy to throw on over your outfit for some additional warmth. personally i found that it runs very large.

I recently purchased this vest and unlike other reviews, i found it to be tts. with that being said, i am typically a medium in retailer tops or 8/10. i have broad shoulders (5'9, 145lbs). i purchased the medium and it fit perfect through the shoulders. it is meant to be flowy and gives some volume in a good way. if that's the look you are going for this is the top for you. had i gone down a size, i would not have been able to hook the top. i am going to be wearing this with blue jeans and white s

Jacket was nice quality. But it was NOT bright orange like the photo. It is a burnt orange color.  Not at all what color I expected.  Also I usually fit a women size large.  I bought this coat in mens small.  The arms fit but it was too small around the waist.  I'm afraid that mens medium would have too long of arms and wide shoulders.  I guess they make these in a slim fit.  I sent it back.
I should have sized up one size as they’re a little tight on my thighs but not too bad, can still wear
Worked perfectly for my bf and I couples safari trip! A little large for me, but it is perfect for men. Ladies should order down.

I’m 5’3” 175 38DDD. Normally I’m a lg top.  Medium does cover my chest without peeking through the buttons. I read it was slightly big so ordered smaller. It still flatters my tummy. The only things areThe collar is a bit large looking (more like a cape for a costume size) but not terribleAnd for me the sleeves were a bit snug around the arm but wearable. Perhaps go larger if your arms tend to be snug in topsOverall I think I’ll keep it
Value for the money

I ordered this in size xl in the multi combo. the fit matches the photos. it's a strange sweater but i like it. i'm glad i got in on sale though. i'm pear-shaped and the curved hem fits me oddly. i like the longer length and the mix of blues/whites/peaches so i'm keeping it. it's not scratchy but also not soft. this is one of those purchases that i probably should return because i don't love it but i know i'll get enough use out of it to justify the sale price.

At first i wasn't sure about it. the neckline is much lower and wavy than i thought. but after wearing it, it really is comfortable. it stretches a lot, so i wear a cami underneath so when i lean forward i'm not showing the world my torso.
I like this dress a lot, the fabric is nice, the necklines are unusual and flattering but there is definitely some added volume at the hips with the pockets. really comfortable dress.

This is a great staple piece for your closet. i do agree that it runs large. i am usually a small and ordered this in an xsmall and that was perfect for the billowy-ness of the top. i have a long torso and arms, so going with an xsmall made the arms slightly short on me. i do not see this as an issue as i just pull them up to 3/4 length on my arm (the sleeves are elastic so this is possible). i receive compliments every time i wear this top. it is beautiful and comfortable. i definitely recommen

What the picture doesn't show, is that there are pockets on the side seams that do add a bit to the hip area. also, the dress runs very large, in my opinion. i ordered a medium (my usual size) and everything was loose. i am going to exchange it for a small and hope the proportions stay the same because it's very pretty.
it is very boxy, and kind of nightgown looking when it's big, so if you wouldn't want it to cling a bit this might not be a good dress. the fabric is gorgeous and soft, but be a

These fit just fine.  I have an oversize waist and the bottom waist has both elastic and a tieable drawstring, so they fit me fine.  Sleeve and leg lengths are consistent with an XL size.  The fabric is fairly heavy and stretchy.  These are more for winter than summer.
Was received sorry was hidden out front

I tried the b&w one in the store. liked the look and feel of it. fabric is soft and comfortable. for reference, i'm 5'4" and 115 lbs. this dress runs large. size 0 was too big on me - armhole, waist, length, etc. i'm ordering 0p online, hoping it will fit better. not a huge fan of the black belt, otherwise very happy with the dress.

I am usually a 32a. i ended up with a 34 b based on sales assoc input and what was available. the 32 gave me back fat ( i do not have back fat) so she said the 34 would be better, it ran small etc. the 34 also fit ( had to be ordered and mailed) but it still gave me "flab" over the back band. comparing it to my other regular bras, i can see that the band has too thin fabric and rolls and has "harder edges" compared to wider , thicker band on my other bras. very pretty but i will be returning. sa

Perfect waist, legs too long.  Top is at least one size larger than stated in chart.  Two washing in hot water and drying on medium have shrunk pajamas about one half size.  Two more washings should make a good fit.  Midnight blue color does not fade.  Material is comfortable but lots of loose strings need clipping.

Loved the way these felt but like the previous reviewer said it did run slightly large. i am usually a size 6 or m and the legs were a little baggy w/the medium. since the m is sold out i'm going to try and see if they shrink in the dryer. the color and design of the ankle is different from other leggings which is a plus. i'm 5'7" and they are the perfect length.
Not the material I was hoping for, med fit well on 33 waist

I love that these are a nice thin stretchy material (not in a bad or cheap way) because they are perfect for the warm weather as well. i got the color grey in a size 29. i usually wear a 29 in stevie's so they were tts. maybe a bit tight in the beginning but they do stretch a little with wear. i did try on the size 30 but they were a little big around the waist. for reference i am 5'6", 145lbs, size 6/m. the fit of stevies are perfect and hugs in all the right places. i have wider calves and it
Lovely, comfortable top.  not flattering on my full figure but would be flattering on most--especially younger women who want to emphasize their curves~~

This coat is cool, the cut is classic and well fit. i've been wearing it as a jacket every day since purchasing 3 days ago. it already has begun to slightly pill. i have not worn this under other jackets, so it's pilling quickly from very basic wear.
This shirt was very cute, but it was just a tad too big on my petite frame.  Nice quality!
Jeans are very nice. Perfect fit on wait and proper length but I feel the picture in the used is misleading. The jeans are straight but slim fit looking but the jeans are quite wide.

Cathart has changed the material used on their T's. Part of my order was their old T's that was excellent and the other was their new which is not same quality. Color's are similar to old but different also. Unless Carhart still goes back to old material and Color's they are no longer a premium Tee lMO.
I a.m about 5 7 and small fit perfect for me! I a.m not supet fit but I am in decent shape!

Needed a vest that was a good indoor and outdoor vest.  This fits the bill nicely given it's weight and fabric.  Size is as expected.  I'm 5'8" 135lbs and wear a 34A.  The vest hits me about 2" below my hip bones...perfect length on me.  I docked a star because it advertises a drawstring on the back of the collar but mine doesn't have that.  Fine by me...doubt that is a feature I would use anyway but wanted to draw your attention to that in case that was important to you.  It's been a bit chilly here to wear it outside as a running vest over a long sleeve top so not sure how it will perform in that regard but so far so good.  And the pockets are perfectly sized for a large phone.
I ordered a medium, and I always get a medium in my jackets but I should have gotten a small maybe even extra small!

This sweater is very comfortable and soft. unlike other reviewer, i did not find the lace to be itchy. i'm 5'4", usually size 6; decided to order medium to give it a nice and relaxing feel. this way i find it to be not too short nor fitted. it's easy and relaxing but the lace makes it a little more dressy. not sure how it's going to handle the wash.

Confused and a little disappointed because the s is too tight in my shoulders and the m is too big all around.  weird because i'm a 39" chest+breasts so m shouldn't look that baggy on me.  please sanctuary, make a petite version, maybe that will solve my issue.  otherwise, this jacket is soft and relaxed and has no distracting collar.  price point is bit over indulgent for what it is combined with my issues.  who knows, maybe i'll try again?!?
Nice quality, can work as a jacket or sweater. i've worn with and without the tie. i didn't realize from the pictures but the sleeves bell out giving it an extra touch.

These shorts fit as expected.  They are very lightweight, breathable, and stretchy as described.  The fabric is a woven polyester, so understand that they could be prone to snagging if you are running in the woods or on trails. The one thing I wish they had were zippered pockets...these do not.Overall, for the price, I can not complain.
The top is a bit light and not as warm as I had hoped. The flannel pants are just right. Perhaps when the current cold snap subsides, all will be perfect.
Amazon essentials clothing is good quality and a great price. I have never been disappointed

I purchased the black in small.  I'm 4'9" 102lbs.  My shoulders a a bit broad so I was a little worried this would fit tight.  The small fits well.  Not too tight and has enough stretch in it for my shoulders to move.  The material is polyester so not very soft but I like the textured look.  I liked the look so I ordered the ivory too.

The dress is pretty, it feels nice. It washes nicely, hasn’t shrunk. I was expecting a smaller fit for a medium, a small would have fit better since I’m short and petite, my weight didn’t make any difference.
Nice casual top. Light weight, good for warm weather. So soft. But after washing only 3 times it is already pilling. It will be good for the season, but probably not the next. Sad.

I got the green motif color which is really multi color: blue, orange, purple, yellow, green and brown. the fabric is gauzy and sheer, nice and breezy for summer. there is a subtle stitching detail at the shoulders. i ordered my usual size, medium, and it fits well in the shoulders and arm holes, but it is extremely billowy in the body. i had to take it in a couple inches on each side to make it a little less full. it's still has some swing, but not quite as much as before.
I'm 5'3" 118 lbs and the 26 navy fit great.  the gray i can hardly button and are less flattering.  i will order another size 26 in gray to see if it will fit better, but also try a 27.

I was looking for a lightweight top to wear with black linen trousers to a party, i was not sure of this top seeing it on a slender model (i am a more typical 50 year old mom body) and i have never worn a peplum style. i put it on for my husband and approved, so i wore it. i received many compliments - a few from good friends who congratulated me for going out of my 'comfort zone' with the style!
Great jeans!
I really like how this fits. it is soft and the eyelet details are very cute.
Good quality, beautiful color options, runs small

To my surprise these vest came with sleeves,but only can zip up halfway,so that armpit will show and it looks like the jacket is ripped at the armpit area! why? that's a good question! it does run very small.i'm 5 feet tall and weighs 115 pounds,luckily the only one left is size l,so i ordered and it fits perfectly!

I love this tee. really comfortable and super cute too!
Not stretchy but it looks really nice if you get your exact size. I really like how this shirt looks and I wore it to a professional setting that we had at school.

Es de algodon, pero una recomendacion es pedir una talla mas. Ademas cuando sale de la secadora sale un poco arrugada, comparada con otras camisetas de otras marcas.

I tried this cute black dress on in the store and even in the xs it was a little too big. i'm 5'3", so if they had petites available in the store maybe they would have fit better. just found too much material around the middle even though it is meant to be a loose fitting dress. the material is heavy weight, very stretchy, but not a thick fabric. could be great in the summer.
Quality of material was nice but they were too short.  Since I purchased  the “long” length, I was expecting a 34” inseam.  They came just above my ankles.  So I returned them.

I always go back to this exact style/cut/brand because I have such a funny fit for jeans.  I have REALLY long legs (short torso), so I always buy a couple pairs.  I love how long they are (however this last purchase the pants were slightly shorter than usual about an inch-I haven't bought any for a few years).  The stretchy fabric is just enough to fit but not be too tight to the legs.  I wash in cold and line dry so that they stay the shape of my body.  Drying shrinks them up again and then they have to stretch out to fit.  They sit right on my hips at the belly button. The only thing I don't like is that I HAVE to wear a belt because they also stretch at the waist and me with a tummy and no waistline there is nothing to hold them up so they are always rolling over or sliding down.  This is a "me" problem, though I wonder if they could make the waistline not so stretchy.  Anyway I will keep buying until they don't make them anymore or I find something better but I have been looking for 15 years and these are still my fav.

I was taking my time with this purchase i needed a top for a pair of ombrÃ£Â© silk pants that i had tailored to fit. but everytime i put these pants on i couldn't find any top to come close to match..especially since the pants are for a more sophisticated look. well this top fits that perfectly and i'm excited to pair them for a nice dinner out. plus i was equally excited when i could pair the top with my jeans and sandals.

This dress is unusual. it can be dressed up with wedges and dressed down with cool sneakers. if you have any under arm excess fat it will show...but you can hide it with a cropped cardigan. i am 5' 1", 105 pounds, lean athletic frame with a 32b bust and it fit well and snug.i bought an xxs. i am relatively lean under the under arm but this dress does show any flaw in this area and it does not look good. minus point. super cute and made well. i wear it with a cardigan.
They're short. They're comfy. They're decent. Will probably get more so long as they stay cheap

If you happen to get a size that fits you, you will love these leggings. they are true to size when the quality control works. i got 2 pair, both in size 28 - one fits perfectly and the other fits like my mothers high waisted jeans! the material is very soft and comfortable. also, not sure who named these colors, but the grey is really light purple and the dark grey is dark purple.

This is a very well constructed sweater. It's weight is heavier then most but not to heavy. I bought a size larger then I am, not knowing what to expect & thought I could "shrink" it in the wash if it was to big. I should have purchased my size & not sized up. It does "shrink" abit in the wash, but then stretches right back out its original size.I purchased the dark gray & the color is spot on to the photos. However I am having issues with the color rubbing off onto my undergarments & white t-shirt that I have worn underneath it.All in all. I would buy this sweater again. I really like the boxy high in front, low in back cut.
Neck is way to big

Love this dress! it's a little roomy on me & i maybe should have gone with the medium. i'm 5'11" and about 165 so usually wear a large. my problem is with the length. i knew it was a gamble, but the other color images on the 5'10" model gave me the hope that the dress would come close to being near my knees ... nope. it's a good 6" above them, and i couldn't wear this to work. so being the crafty sort, i'm pondering adding a few more lace layers to the hem.

These are great for travel. Light weight and compact. Makes it easy to fly with just a carry-on. I think their sizes run a bit small. nice jeans. people ought to be ashamed

Whoa! these are very high-waisted. but i think i like it! this is a very 70s style with the high waist and wide legs. the brown motif is kinda funky! i am a 70s/vintage lover though, so i was pleasantly surprised. the tall length is more than adequately long for my 6'2" frame. i may need to take them up a little bit, in fact.
Ordered my usual medium. it swallowed me. have returned to store and they ordered me a small to try. very cute comfortable top

Cute, basic white shirt with nice detail. i love meadow rue and this is another great shirt from them. while i love it, i wish it were just a little bit softer (i am a sucker for soft things). however, i am keeping the shirt and it will be great for work or play.

Loved this top when i received it. unfortunately it runs very big. i ordered a small because it had come up but in reality i need an x small and maybe even that would be too big. im 130 pounds and 34dd. its a nice shirt just a little expensive.

I ordered a size xl in ivory. it's prettier in person. there are great details. it shrunk a bit after washing and air-drying. i cut off the layer of chiffon around the neckline to make it more comfortable. a cute summer tank.

I love the vest and have worn it a lot, perfect for early spring weather here in the mid-west.  It is a nice weight and exactly what I wanted. Note that others have noted the elastic finished edge on the arm opening as it does give it a less polished look. I have sewing skills and I did "take" it in a bit under the armpit area. I was able to make it less "bunchy" looking and more polished.  It still has the elastic trim but I was happy I could alter as the vest was exactly what I wanted.  Fits nice and great weight and pockets.
I bought the red.  Will be great to throw on as a second layer when the weather gets cooler.  It’s very flattering.

I ordered the gray/plum colorway and while i'm disappointed in the large percent acrylic fabrication, the vest is very soft and warm. the unfinished raw seams add visual interest and i'm tempted to remove all the care tags and wear this inside out for a different look. i am worried that excess pilling will be an issue so i will update my review if the quality deteriorates beyond a simple lint shave.
good product, great color

I love pilco jeans - they fit in all the right ways for a size 12. this is a great pair of everyday casual jeans. a tiny bit oversized in the ankle (a bit of a flair) but overall i am very happy! very comfortable.

Got the black but the orange it very pretty too the black fabric has a sheen to it; almost like snakeskin. as other reviewers have mentioned, it does run small and the armholes are cut in a bit. overall it is a more interesting than a basic lbd.

Notice the neck, before you buy. It goes up higher and even though the picture clearly shows it, I was surprised when I put it on. Sweater is short. I have a short torso and it falls just to my hips. Perfect length for me. Nice colors. Thick, but not too thick. Good quality.

For reference, I’m 5’2” and 145lbs..I decided to go with a size 8 because I was afraid they’d shrink in the wash but could have sized down as they do have some stretch to them! However, the smell is still slightly noticeable after one wash. It’s not too bad so I plan to wear them before washing them again. I will try soaking them in OxyClean before the second & maybe hanging them in the sun to dry.

Never spent this much on a dress so it needs to be amazing for me to keep it.  i've never seen flannel patterns and colors like this. the details in the back are unique. but in the end, i decided to return because it's too long and although it fit fine in a size large it didn't look that great on me. the dress has an exaggerated drop waist that was too low for my short waisted frame. the fabric smells odd. i tried belting it but the pockets and back buttons created bulk.

This lovely sweater is super soft, comfy and 100 percent cotton!I ordered a small and looks more like a medium.  It is supposed to be a loose fit, but seems at least one size larger.  But overall, awesome sweater!

I agree with the previous review that this skirt definitely runs small. i am normally a size 4 with rooms but this size 4 was very tight. i decided not to go through the trouble of exchanging and to keep it. my boyfriend seems to like the style more than i do so that's a good thing :)

This definitely runs a little large, but i love this tee.  i actually went back and bought it in a second color. it's perfect to throw on with shorts this summer.

I am 5 feet and 120 lbs. i ordered the honey. quality was excellent. no button issues. fits true to size. i ordered a small petite. my issue was the chino fabric was too casual. it's okay. if it were on sale i would keep it, but not at full price. color is as shown in the honey. no issues on arm length. but i like mine a little longer. it's kind of menswear. which some gals would like. i am a 34 c and it only looks good buttoned up on me. i'd say if your on the fence give it a try. it's tts.

I have always love tracy reese products. this blouse is really fun, nice fabric and the proportions are perfect. but why does it have to show the wide band of my bra across my back? the cut out dips low so i can't imagine a bra that would work with it. it's a 70's hippy themed blouse- maybe the designer expects us to go braless? unfortunately i'm going to have to wear a cami underneath it. my girls need support!
Really cute and very comfortable. material is thin and sheer. i wear tanks under things anyway, but especially in pink, you would need to. but love the style.
the pants are great if you have the correct size- order the next size over because they come smaller than other dress pants.

I like this robe a lot. the tassel detailing on the ties is beautiful. i like the soft interior-but wish it went all the way down the arms. the cozy part of the robe is only in the center section and hood-the arms can be a bit chilly while the rest of you is warm and cozy.
i do not think the robe is necessarily flattering, in that it does not do me favors in the way of slimming, it is more of a cozy-around-the-house robe rather than one to hide lingerie underneath.
I loved this but didn't realize it has mohair which agitated my contacts. i had to return it. if you don't have that problem, this goes great with leggings or jeans.

The fabric is breathtaking, both the jewel tone colors and the burnt velvet that would flatter any skin tone. as usual, eva franco clothes run small so i went up a size, size regular 6 (i am 5ft2in, 34b, 26 waist, 36 hips) fit well, the hem is below my knees, appropriate for work. but i think it would look better as a skirt or a sheath dress. the top part looks strange, does not enhance any curve and turns the dress to frumpy on short folks like me, thus one star off.

This shirt is pretty nice and can be dressed up with a skirt and heels or dressed down with jeans and flats. An all purpose black shirt that should be a staple in your wardrobe!

I like the lightweight fabric that provides good ventilation - perfect for summer. I've bought a bunch of these with different patterns. I'm 6'0", 205 lbs, and this gives me a slightly slim look - not baggy, not too long or short.

I ordered it with a particular outfit in mind as i liked the purple (burgundy) color. ordered xxsp, as with most t-shirts at retailer, they run a little big. xxs seems to be my new xs (which used to be s!).

color was nice , fit was good too, i just felt not "special" enough... but if you are looking for a tshirt, then i say give it a try, as it was comfortable and the shape at least is unusual.

for reference, 115 lbs, 30dd, 26.5 in waist
Bought this dress for my boho bridal shower and loved it! it was perfect for the season and fit like a charm. i normally wear a 4-6 and needed the 2 so heads up that they run a little big.
Beautiful skirt! the only reason i didn't give a five star rating is due to some bunching on each side - hopefully can iron it out or i will get it tailored!
My son pajamas

I love these shorts and they have deep pockets but i will say they glued the stitching on the waistband and I find the texture irritating on my skin. Wouldn't recommend if you have sensory issues, but otherwise great shorts with lots of stretch

I accidentally bought these thinking they were another style of underarmor shorts I have. They're fine but I was surprised by the mesh brief style inner lining, which isn't ideal for what I'm using them for. Otherwise fine shorts

Beautiful dress but runs very large. it is made of a material that does not breath so if you tend to run hot, skip this dress. great style and looks good on almost any body type. colors are very attractive and is dressy enough for special occasions,

I really liked this top. i wish it was not so sheer. even with a nude bra, its just too much. it's a very loose fit throughout the body, but the shoulders, arms, and neckline remain true to size so it looks nicely tailored on the top. i just can't do something this sheer. i feel too exposed. i wish they had it offered in other colors.

I really like this skirt. it is soft and the length is just right. i hate skirts that go below the knee. the only thing i don't care for is that there seems to be extra fabric in the back... maybe i should had ordered a size down. and the skirt does wrinkle easily. still, not enough reasons to send back. i have had many compliments at work.

This is a nice cotton sweater. I love cotton. I bought two. The navy blue and then about a week after I bought the oatmeal. Both colors are pretty and on point. The sweaters are boxy which I like for a casual look with high waisted jeans or high waisted joggers.  I’m 57 so no mid drift bearing for me.  I like wearing a white cotton crewneck tee underneath so you can see it under the sweater neckline. I bought the medium for an oversized look. I’m 5’2” and about 117 lbs. A small would have been a perfect fit. Not oversized. I don’t think it would have had a good look with the sweater being boxy. I am happy that I sized up one size. Delivery was on time and the sweater was packaged appropriately. I always love pretty packaging. Something extra like you went to a boutique. This was not the case and I suppose not a huge deal as long as the item is not damaged on delivery. I still appreciate it though. A little hint for the seller!!!

This is an interesting skirt. the fabric is comfortable, breathable and flowy. it is eye-catching. but the pattern is not one i would say i love, although i do like it. the lighter color in the pattern is more pink than off-white, which is fine, but that did surprise me a little. overall, i kept it for comfort and because i liked it enough for the sale price i paid for it.

I love this coat but it does not work for my body type. it is a beautiful coat and of very good quality. it has a wonderful lining which is so nice to see as many of the "coats" retailer is carrying right now are not lined. the coat is soft and feels so good. it seems to run true to size. i would have purchased this if the button placement were higher up. the button closure is right at my hips ( i am 5'6" for reference) and i am pretty curvy. when open, the coat looked great but when i trie

So a bit of a bone to pick with retailer. i am normally a petite xs (32b chest). however the petite sizing was not available online so i ordered a regular xs thinking i could always have it altered. i could barely button across the chest. huh?! when i went to return it at the store, i noticed they had xs petite on the rack so decided to try it. it fits perfect - like how it should! i can button fine across the chest and there is a little extra room.
i have no idea why the sizing is so off between

The sweater keeps your neck warm without the high collar of a turtleneck and the burgundy color is nice.  The material is a bit scratchy on the outside, but I didn't notice it as an issue on the inside.
Me gusto mucho súper elegante

These are nice shorts, but a little longer than I like.  Probably should have that length to wear in public, but I don't go out much.  Too nice to wear for daily work on the ranch.  Nice if you did go out.

I bought the moss, which is more of a pretty pastel green. the only drawback is that they stretch a lot. i can get two wears out of them, maybe a 3rd, if not worn for hours and hours or all day each wear. i'm getting the light yellow pilcro hyphen chinos, now. all the colors of both styles in the store are very nice. i'd like to have each color.

This is such a cute shirt but it is transparent. I run hot so I wanted to wear it by itself but even with a nude bra, it was completely see through. It’s perfect if you want to layer it under a jacket but that wasn’t the look I was going for
The jacket runs large so size down. it's a good jacket to throw on the go. but i don't see this lasting long bc after he first wash, it started piling. the quality of the material isn't great!

I love boys and arrows, but this top is really best suited to smaller size chests because there's no adjustable ties or straps or reinforcements for support. also, the fabric is super soft, which is great for feel but not so much for fit if you require a little boost! for my 32d's i chose a different design.
It’s great as long as you don’t mind replacing it often. Stitching is all coming apart.
overall great fit, lightweight, and comfortable when used for workouts
I use these for work and play. They fit nicely and have good stretch.
32w Regular Is too small for me. Yet, I have 32w Regular from other brands.Price / qualitu ratio is amazing

I saw this coat online and loved it. the blue collar is great. the length is great, fits over bottom. it is quite warm. the arms are a little tight but they loosen up. the sale price plus 40% off was the ticket.

I ordered a large but the jacket is very stretchy, it fits perfectly. If you like a perfect fit you won't be able to wear too much under this jacket maybe a sports bra or a waist shaper but not a shirt, the material is soft and comfortable, can't wait to hit the gym in my new gear
This is a very cute top. my only reservation is that where the elastic is on the side sticks out a little more than i would like. it's not that big of a deal though.
I love this shirt so much i bought it in another color. it looks like it does in the picture, loose and flowy.

I loved this top so much i bought it in both colors. i have not seen anyone complain about this, but on me, the mock neck collapses in and looks messy. unfortunately i returned both. i sew, and i do not understand why this happened.
I like the shorts. It’s soft and breathable. But I wish they had another version with no liner

These pants overall are very comfortable, but have an unusual fit. they tend to run a bit short, and i always have to get pants hemmed shorter, so if you have long legs or like more draping, you probably won't like these. they also ran a bit large in the waist and thigh, a bit puffy, i had to size down in order to get a good fit. very good quality, and cute design.
Stunning on, but mine was missing a button when i received it. i found a similar button and replaced it. still worth it, even though it arrived "damaged"

true to size and fits just fine. more form fitting than model picture.

Very pretty and soft but too tight in the waistline and I have a smaller waist.

This pair of flare is just what i have been searching for. the color is a nice vintage blue. i love the fit of the flare however please keep in mind these do run long and larger that size.

As long as you’re not a delicate little flower.  Then these are fine shirts. Good thick fabric, 100% cotton (but low thread count feel), will shrink, NOT tagless but tag rips off easily.For this price point, there is no point in complaining as if you paid more so here are some things to expect:It’s 100% cotton so it’s going to shrink since it’s not “pre-shrunk”It’s possible these are “fake” as many claim, or it may be Hanes cutting back on quality control. There is no way to knowing one way or another but here are some observations.Got 3 packs and 1 shirt had a hole in the back already.Shirts will NOT arrive in Factory branded bags, they’ll be in generic sealed plastic bags (my guess is because its easier for “try before you buy returns” to be folded/packaged/resealed for the next buyer) so wash before wearing.This is NOT tagless, but the tag does tear off easily. This doesn’t PROVE these are fake of knock offs (Maybe Hanes has a large stockpile of tags they can sew on for the cost of nothing instead of spending on the special ink, running the machinery and employees trained to operate said machinery to get that tagless. Idk.These are most likely 100% cotton as claimed so they WILL shrink! I find the larger the shirt size the more they will shrink relative to their size. So plan accordingly.A common complaint is that they’re itchy. All I can say is WASH BEFORE WEARING as you should be anyways. Ever heard of demodex mites? Now you have.Another complaint is that they feel rough. this isn’t 3000 thread count Egyptian cotton feeling more like 300 thread count. With that said these are FAR thicker than the genuine Hanes shirts I’ve bought in store in the last few years. Personally, I’ve never noticed.Bottom line: If you are the type of guy who may not even own a pair of cargo pants (anymore) but loved them because of its functionality. Who knows what SAE/metric is, and doesn’t wear tight jeans (by choice).Chances are very high you’ll be happy with these.$2.50/shirt + tax

This was a last minute purchase for an out of state conference. I needed two blazers around 72 hours from departure and these fit the bill. They are oversized, so keep that in mind. The black one is lined with a black/white polka dot liner so just heads up. I also purchased the brown plaid and it fit slightly larger than the black. It also had some loose strings that I had to cut off. There was a weird smell when I opened the packages, but that went away after washing them. I followed the instructions for fabric care and they did wrinkle. The steam cycle on my dryer helped, but I ended up pressing them when I got to my hotel room on a low heat and used a wrinkle release spray as needed. Overall, not bad at all for the price and went well with my ensembles. I felt very professional and comfortable in them. Highly recommend if you're in a pinch or on a tight budget.

I ordered two in large.  The white one fits looser but the black one is still good.  Inconsistent but keeo both. Like the fabric.

This top is well made and the pleats give it a whimsical feel. i'm still debating on keeping it as it's slight boxy.

I am going to keep it. i think it will be a great "throw on and go" piece you can wear with many different types of shoe/sandal. the detail on top is excellent and it is a flattering cut. two complaints: runs a little big on bottom, a little "genie" looking...like there is too much fabric above the elastic around your upper ankles. but the bigger issue is that there is no zipper or elastic on top so slipping the top over your shoulders is super tight, to the point i thought i was going to rip it
Great top for in between seasons. comfy/soft/roomy. fyi - the pattern has tiny holes that will show through - i.e., bra, skin, etc.

The way the zipper is with the pockets makes the front of the pants balloon out a bit.  They fit me perfectly everywhere, but seem roomy up front.

I got this dress for my younger sister who's in the process of losing weight. she's currently wearing a size 12 with comfort room but can occasionally squeeze into smaller sizes depending on the product. this dress is deceptively true to size. at first glance it looks like a roomy dress but the inner part of the dress zips up real tight. as a result, the boxy top part of the dress doesn't look too big and is in fact very flattering. the dress is very silky and looks as high quality as its price.

This is a lovely top. received many compliments. felt very feminine, and perfect for chilly spring. please take this to the dry cleaners, you will avoid feeling distraught as i did after washing it, which is the recommended method to clean it, and seeing it shrunk to half it's previous size. sad.
Only one pair, but the pocket has a hole in it.

This dress is modern yet timeless, cute yet rock and roll if worn with boots. i am 36b, 26 waist, 36 hips, and size regular s fits well. i like regular size because it is longer in the torso (lengthens waist for a belt) and the length is right above the knees, appropriate for work. the bust area fits me perfectly so well-endowed ladies may want up a size. i am into grey now but all colors are gorgeous, love the sheen, colors are true like shown (1 star off for hi price for a simple dress).

Love the colors and design of this lace-printed top but didn't realize it's not lined. the description says its polyester lace with polyester lining so i assumed it was lined and when you look at the photos, there is a lining under the top. the arm holes are slightly cut-in both front and back so it will be rather difficult to find a camisole with thin straps with a similar cut so they don't show. other than that, it's a beautiful, unique summer top.

This dress is attractive but it runs a little small. i'm a small curvy girl who usually wears a 2. this was small in the top and short waisted. i wanted to wear it to a recent event and didn't have time to return it for another size.

I am 5"5', 170ish, and wear a 38D or 38DD and size 16 pants.  I only have a 3 inch difference between waist and hips, so I do not have an hourglass figure at all.  I got a 3x according to the size chart.  It is fitted on me, but not tight.  A smaller size would have been too tight, but the 3x is fitted without hugging my back fat. I wish it were longer so it would help mask my mom flab, but it looks nice enough for me to wear with dress pants to an interview for a promotion within my department (we have a business casual with jeans every day dress code, so I don't need to look like a top executive, just put together).  It has some wrinkles from being in the shipping bag, so it will wrinkle.  I hate hand wash stuff, but I don't imagine having to wash it super frequently.

This is definitely again, a bit big. i'm usually a med, that is what i got, i could have gotten a small, but the arm holes might have been a tad tight then. i'm keeping the med, in case it shrinks, as it is part rayon, and rayon always shrinks if put in the washer. it is a great casual piece that will go with most anything. i love the tie, as you can then tighten the waist up a bit, or leave looser. the material is soft and not clingy. this is why i love a rayon blend. it hits me below my waist
I love this jumpsuit! it runs a little large but still works for me. it makes it super comfy and a great piece for every day!

This is a cute, fun addition to my wardrobe, especially since i am a polka dot fan! it is alittle short for me and i think it runs just a bit small, particularly if you want to wear like the model with longer shirt under it. overall, it was worth the sale price and will look good with casual pants, jeans and with dressier black pants for work.
I bought this top for my 15 year old daughter, and she thinks it is beautiful. it's very comfortable, and good for days that are not too cold, but not too warm. lovely!

I love the fabric of this shirt and particularly the blousy back. it is slightly boxy on me and i wish it was just a little longer. looks really cute under cardigans.
