I do like this sweater. I purchased a small and it is not oversized so size up if you want the oversized look. I am 125lbs and 5’4” and it is a nice length: not too long or too short.

I'm a slightly pear shaped girl. a c chest with size 14 hips. the dress fit great around my waist and would have been perfect except the space in the chest area was too big. it looked odd on me with all the extra fluff in the chest. fabric is nice and flowy. the dress is lined.

I always have problems with the chest area of dresses due to my size as I’m smaller chested and bigger waist, I got a XXL and it fits snug but comfy around the waist, I wear a 38B (barely) and there’s a lot of room in the chest with this dress but it’s made well enough to still look flattering
These are great, just wish the wash was as dark as what’s pictured. Probably won’t wear these as often because of that issue.

The jacket overall is really nice.  Great quality.  The only complaint I have is that on both sleeves there is either a stain or some of the fabric is missing.  It arrived this way.  I am working on returning and getting a different one.  Hopefully it is back in time for my son’s ball.

I love this top! although, i wish i had ordered the large rather than the medium. i am 5'4", 138 pounds and a 34d. the medium just fits but is ever so slightly snug across my shoulders. it will work; though i will probably have it dry cleaned rather than risk shrinkage by washing at home.

This is a cute top but a little pricey for cotton t shirt material. the arms and shoulders/armpit feel a little tight but is loose and flowy below the bust. it is not as dressy in person as it appears in the photos. a cute top for jeans or leggings as the length falls below the hip.

I have ordered these in the past and they fit great. They now seem to be a more modern slim cut.  I order 2XL because I am not slim.  I still like the shirt but I would recommend ordering a size up if you prefer a shirt that is a little forgiving in the torso.

The dress is  very feminine and very flirty. i love orange/melon-colored dresses. this one does not disappoint. it does run extremely small around the rib cage. i had to size up to a 6 when i typically wear a 2 or 4. my bra size is 32 b. nice quality fabric, lined, with built-in bustier.

I bought this for my dad, I kept it for myself  ..the wrist openings were too small to fit his hands through. I usually wear an xs, this was so soft , warm and lightweight I just kept it and rolled up the sleeves. My dad is 6' 145#

The dress looked great right out of the bag. I ordered up a size to make sure it wasn't clingy, glad I did so to have a little roominess. Unfortunately after one wash in cold water on delicate cycle then hung to dry, it looks worn. The fabric no longer looks smooth but has (for lack of better explanation) a lightly fuzzy look all over. I will keep it even if I can't wear it out places, it will be comfortable around the house.
Loved the design and legnth but the material was not a light and soft as i expected.  i would get this in another fabric.
Nice feeling blouse but very loose. Size down possibly.

This is really cute sweater, soft, cozy. around the chest bit small went up size but the shape looked the same. i'm keep it because of softness, warmth and versatile. i got it in black. would recommend it, or at least try it for yourself.
I was looking for a navy top to replace an overused navy silk cowlneck that i have been wearing for years. this is perfect. light, versatile and classic.

Okay, i get the idea of the loose swing dresses but i have a couple that do it well without looking like a moo-moo. i ordered my "typical" pxs. the length was good and the color beautiful. i like the details of the dress but it was huge and not in a flattering swingy drapey way. i was undecided if i should try the pxxs as the pxs was so large that i don't know if the pxxs would fix this problem for me. i will still be thinking about it.
Nice fit, color as described & good quality!!Not always easy to find!

I purchased this in gray and it is proving to be quite versatile. it is softer than i expected and not heavy or bulky. i also like that the side slits are a bit higher than i expected. i have paired it with knit pants and with a maxi dress. i think it will work pretty much any time i need an extra layer.

Ok because i'm petite i thought there's no way this was going to work, but it does! a little sheer would probably wear with a boyfriend cardi to work, dark undergarments a must. but flattering and comfortable.
This cute dress is swingy and chock full of fun little details.   don't like that it's all polyester and some embroidery is unraveling so i don't know what to do about that.
Great shirt and fits well.  Will order again when needed.
These little shorts have become my favorite. they are so sweet and feminine and very comfortable. the fabric washes very well

The colors and fabric on this dress are really pretty. the lace is a soft blue instead of white. i have other dresses like this from this brand and really wanted to keep it, but it runs larger than the others i have. also, it doesn't have pockets. if it fits you properly, i think you will love it!

Nice but i thought these ran big. me: 28-29' waist, 36" hips, athletic thighs. usually a medium in leggings but these size mediums were a bit baggy to my surprise. hoping to exchange for a size down as they are pretty, the ankle detail is fun and decently made.

This poncho is very pretty and unique.it does run very over-sized, however that's how it is styled to be. the embroidery is very nice, it does sit back on the should a little further than pictured. the open weave is a little looser than the picture seems and you will need to wear something under it (cami; tank; body shaper). probably will pick or snag pretty easily also. the longer hem in the back is cute, but if you are on the shorter side you may not like where it hits. it will look best with

I tried on xs in the store (returned) and it looked huge on me, i like the rushing idea, the material is super soft, but overall, couldn't justify even at sale with 40% off, as it wasn't flattering when it looks big. blue color nice in person.

It's a lovely and unexpected sweater. a few things to keep in mind- 
- it's pretty lightweight.
- the color is a little darker than the picture shown- it's a very dark plum.
Nothing nice product

I tried on a returned 24p in my store, they were almost the right length, but the fit was more snug than pictured here (i have muscular thighs/butt, and 115 lbs). they were nice though, kind of a skinny pant. the carbon is a dark grey, can go with anything... only gripe is the waist height is low, at least on the behind... i would certainly show if i bend down without a long top.

Adorable fall dress. but it runs huge -- i'm an hourglass 8 or 10 usually and the 6 fit best in the top and full skirt (36d, 30 waist) but sadly each size the sleeves get like 2 inches shorter. since these are blouses sleeves they look off. so sad bc this dress is adorable otherwise. if you always find sleeves too long for you, snap up this gem, this is for you!
Just as you would expect they are well made and fit just as I expected

I really liked this jacket for style in fit, but I purchased the wrong color so I had to return it. It was well-made and flattering I look just like the picture except that the color was a little off. I will buy this jacket again another color. Great value for money as it is well-made.
An amazing sweater. Cute, fashionable, fun to wear. My only problem with it is that it pills pretty easily, but perhaps I should have expected that from a sweater.
Fun socks you will want to show off. design is printed on a relatively thin (trouser sock).
Very nice sweater, comfy fabric, good buy.

I love the look of this right away. i found it ran small to retailer's clothes (where i'm inexplicably a xs or s here i was a m). i also am a dd, so would have appreciated more support, but as the other reviewer, i can get away with it to wear this cute suit.

Love the cute cat pattern and quality of the blouse. unfortunately the front was too short and the back didn't fall properly. also, i found the arms to be tight. i'm usually an xs and a size 2 in maeve blouses. i would've ordered the the 4 but it's sold out. definitely size up if possible.

I liked this top a lot when i saw it at the store - the cotton is soft and comfortable, the colors are good (i tried on the white, charcoal, and light aqua blue), and the asymmetrical edge really makes it. the subtle ruffle detail at the edge combined with the pieced asymmetrical hem takes it from a classic tee to a contemporary style. however, my store doesn't have petite sizes, and the regular size hit me at a point in the hip that wasn't super-flattering on me (at 5'1"). it imay be an excelle

I wear this out, but it's also a super comfortable to lounge around the house in. i measure 35" 28" 40" (6 through the top, 10 in the bottom). i ordered a medium based on comments from other users concerning the top and it being constricting. i didn't find that to be true, but for a closer fit i probably should have ordered the small. overall, this is a fun dress to wear.
The fit was great and it matches my work shirt color.

My 14 year old son decided last minute That he needs a suit for his 8th grade graduation . He is tall and skinny. Starting to wear men's small stuff. Hard to find stuff that fits him being tall and skinny. Looked great, price was worth it for a one or two time wearing. 5'8 and 115lbs. Had to wear belt but jacket and pants length were perfect.

These tights are comfortable and the material is great. i bought the gray and holly color and the colors are as shown online. similar to most nylon tights they snag easily. definitely not a legging and similar to other reviewers these won't keep you warm in the winter.

This coat is gorgeous but it runs huge! i am typically a s so that is the size i purchased and it was swimming on me. i sadly had to return for an xs so fingers crossed it fits. the coral color is gorgeous and looks nice with my olive skin. very unique coat and as long as the xs fits i will be one happy lady.
Style is good for comfort.

This cover up is precious. i ordered both sizes because i was unsure of how either would fit since there was only a s/m and m/l. there is not a whole lot of variation between the two. i wear a size 10 pants and the s/m fit, but i may still keep the m/l instead for fear that it may shrink when washed. the garment is hand wash only which i will do because of the delicacy of the tassels. that's a little high maintenance for a cover up but i am willing to do it because it really is a cute cover up.
Too soon,  just received

Bought this in an xs and i liked the style of the skirt. it was long enough to wear to work. 
however the waist was too large and would not stay up on my waist. returned.
This skirt is a great length and nice piece for fall/winter. i love the color. it fits like a high waisted skirt would which is why i purchased the next size up.
This feels so nice and light and summery. nothing like a crisp white top for the season.

I really wanted to like this dress, but it just didn't suit me. i have others in a similar style, and they are a bit tight in the bust but not too much for me. the print is adorable - very quirky, but subtle. in the end, it's the bright white that doesn't work for me. it made me look incredibly pale.

I love the length of this top and i love tops that don't cling in the tummy area. it fits well and the crochet detailing is nice. for reference, i'm 5'.4.5", 150 lbs, 34dd and the m fit me well. since i'll be wearing this with leggings mostly during colder months, this top is a little bright and the material is not meant for cold days. since i live in texas, i can get away wearing it even in colder months.
Love the cute print and texture of fabric. perfect casual t-shirt.
I bought two of these dresses, the green and pink.  Both were too small.  I usually wear an 8-10 and purchased the dresses in Medium.  They were both too small through the chest area.

I was hoping this top would be a nice architectural piece to add to my wardrobe with its straight black line accents. sadly, in the end, it is just a t-shirt. a large t-shirt. i ordered my normal size (medium) and this shirt ran more like a large. i also did not like the way the neck was hemmed. the fabric folds over itself, when i think a better design would have been a more simple hem. i ended up returning this item due to its size.

I love how unique this vest is. i'm still figuring out how to wear it in a feminine way, as it lacks shape at the waist and the collar sometimes doesn't behave. i think the sweater texture makes it more casual, but i could belt it and wear with fancier shoes to glam it up. it is a nice third piece to keep warm for fall or winter--hopefully i"ll wear it more once i figure it out!

So much prettier in person than online. the animal print isn't in your face, but subtle enough for almost any occasion. the button-up collar and slightly past knee length make it work for a casual work environment. the pleats and airiness of the dress remind me of kate middleton in anita dongre. 

fit: 5'4", 140 pounds - i bought a six, but the four would probably work as well. because of the lightness of the fabric, the extra fabric doesn't overwhelm my small frame. goes slightly past my knee

I generally like this jacket but there were issues with the lining.  The lining near the armpit of the left shoulder was not entirely sewn as it should have been.  I decided to keep the jacket and repair it myself since the quantity of the jackets on hand for sale was low.  I was afraid the I replacement would not be available.
Beautiful fabric and color, bit very large  overall and sleeves are especially loose.
Runs a little big and more cream than white, but still cute! Wore it over a dress for a baseball game. Very breathable!
I ordered size XS, and it is too big.
This is cute with the shoulder detail. i ordered a medium- will be returning for a small. i'm kind of in between small & medium.
I wore this when i was in my third trimester and it worked out great.

The proportions on this are a little off but fortunately they worked fine for my husband. It actually looks a little dressier than his fleece quarter zips (which we stock up on every winter) so it's nicer for a casual dinner. The price is nice but it is a gamble on whether the proportions will work for you, especially on the sleeves and width.
Size was perfect and comfortable

Amazon, as I order a lot of shirts and sweaters, recommended I order an XL and that it would be a good fit, and while the shirt is slightly stretchy, it still didnt fit completely. I typically wear an XL (unisex) T-shirt which gives it the typical loose fit, but in these shirts I would need to wear an XXL to avoid it being almost skin tight. The lengths otherwise are fine, and in my own home at roughly 70-75 degrees (F) after a few moments it becomes fairly warm to wear.

Love this dress. in fact, i loved it enough to get it altered so it would fit. purchased the black dress in a size 6, but the top was too big. and i'm not small chested, i am a 32d! i had to get the seam under my underarms taken in for the top of the dress to fit properly. but, now that it is altered...i love it.
Product as described

I purchased this top in the navy. the picture makes the top look like an interesting blue with some purple in it, but in person the top is just... navy. the lace and fabric are soft. it fits true to size; i almost always wear a small and the small fit fine. it wasn't quite my style, but it's a pretty top that will be great for spring and summer.

These are a great dark wash and they fit true to size to every other stevies i own. for reference i am 5'6", 145lbs, size 6/m and the 29 fit perfect. they are a bit long but i fold them up and it looks just as cute. i highly recommend especially since they are on sale, definitely a closet staple.
Soft and fairly true to size but sleeves seemed longer that typical. I only wished it was slightly longer but still kept it and look forward to wearing it when it cools down.
In the photos i have a different tank underneath than the one that comes with the shirt. i am wearing a medium and for reference my measurements are 38-30-40.
I like the jacket; however, the material knots up after wearing it twice. I thought this item would last me at least a year before having to give it to Goodwill.  : (
These are cute as novelty Christmas jammies but for every day wear they’re pretty annoying. The print is painted on and they stretch out.
These bottoms run very small! i'm 5ft 3in and 100 pounds with a 25 inch waist and both the xsmall and small were too small. i think i'll need a size medium.
Very comfy and with some stretch.  Washes up great with no wrinkles. Great alternative than my long lab coat .  I have bought a couple and plan to get more

The design is very cute. i'm glad i listened to reviews b/c this blouse definitely runs at least 2 sizes small maybe 3. i bought the blue and it's more of a navy blue instead of royal blue. at the sale price and additional 40% off (my daughter is an employee) i didn't mind paying $24 :).
I have several of these jeans and where them to work on the daily. They work great for dressing casual.  However lint likes to stick to them and the black color fades over time fairly quick.

There is so much i love about this dress. like many of the other reviewers i simply love the fabric. it's soft and comfy but has texture and interest at the same time. there's beautiful detail to it as well. the edging at the neckline and hemline are unfinished and beautifully so. having said all that, i like many other reviewers i just don't have the body type to pull it off. there wasn't one angle that didn't make me look even bigger than i am. the pleating in the front, while very cute, gave

I am not quite sure what to think about this top... color is nice, cut iis pretty but the material is denim denim....it would probably soften with wear but the deal breaker for me is that i have a vein in my neck that pops out like crazy when i wear the top. if i release the neck it goes back to normal. not that it is tight but apparently it blocks flow somehow. so i passed. 

i tried on regulat 0 and it was fine at 115 lbs. 30 dd chest
I love these! they are cute enough to wear out, and they are really comfortable. i ordered a small and at 5'3" they are a little long but they shrunk in the wash and they're still totally wearable
Not bad over all. Finished hem tends to roll if you are not careful. A fair number of loose threads, a little obnoxious, but given the price per piece, hard to complain over much.
Love these jeans however they get a little saggy in the front while wearing which i don't like :/

This dress is a lot of fun and would be great for a party or a wedding but unfortunately it didn't fit me right. i ordered a small since i usually wear a size 2 but the waist was just a little bit loose while the dress was too tight across the bust. this caused the dress to pull up in the front and make it look too high in the waist. i guess i'm just too busty for this dress. too bad because i really wanted it to work. it is a lovely dress.

I wanted to love this. the color in the picture is pretty true-to-life. the top fit well, if a bit smaller than usual, but the skirt piece was way too flared for my petite (5') frame. it was too voluminous compared to the top of the dress. the material is very soft, but thin, and is lined, which was a pleasant surprise. sadly, a return for me.
Such a cute top! can be dressed up or down. i wore it on sting break and had many compliments.

This shirt is incredibly comfortable. the material is so soft, and it fits so well. i am 5'6" and 130 lbs with a 32b chest and i purchased a small - it is large on me, and i would have preferred an xs, but the small is just fine as well! it is a great shirt, especially for an oversized henley. 100% recommend. (one star off for the larger sizing.)

Very pretty fabric and beautiful color, but i agree with the other reviewer here, the fit is a bit strange. the waist is very small - need to size up at least one size for that to fit - while the rest fits nicely. it's also a little longer than i had expected...sort of looks like it should be a couple inches shorter (and i'm 5'11"!).

I really like the soft and very wearability of this vegan leather jacket. my only wish was for the jacket color to have a bit more rose tone to it as the color description implies. overall a definite keeper!

This is a beautiful blouse however it runs big. i order the small and had to return it. my measurements are 5'4 135 34c-28-38 for reference. you will not regret buying this blouse but it has to be the right size if not it would look like it did on me, frumpy. i kept taking it off and putting it back on trying to make it work (because i liked the material that much) but if you look at the model she has her arms straight down. when i lifted my arms i had 3 inches of extra material on both side. th

Jacket fits perfectly im 6’ 265. Xxl fit great. Material seams durable, good stitching, all snaps lock good. Only downside is the zipper is not metal, somekind of plastic and the pull is on the left. Overall i only gave it 4 stars because of the zipper.

The print was what attracted me to this dress. and the material is soft and comfortable. however, the fit was all wrong for me. it had a great belt in the back, but hung very loosely in the front. it reminded me a little of some of my maternity dresses. maybe sizing down would have helped, but then i feared it wouldn't fit my hips right. this dress may look better on someone who isn't as curvy. it really looks great on the model, but not on me.

My daughter is 5yr old, 47 lb, 42 inch tall. And usually wears a size 6 pants. These were verrrrry loose on her. And i need to buy a belt or sew them about 1inch smaller. I wanted for below the knee, but ended up using as full length.

Cute, easy to wear dress. personally i think it looks better with a belt, or something to accentuate the waist. otherwise it's a lot of fabric in the middle. i didn't think the top was too low as others have mentioned. though, it is possible to wear backwards (with a v neck front) if that bothered you. nice length, long enough for work.

This dress is definitely light weight and it requires a slip or you could wear a black tank and tights with boots. there wasn't a security tag in mine so no holes when i bought in store. i even accidentally caught it on a costume bracelet and it did not rip or damage. although, you probably wouldn't want to sit on concrete or rub against something rough. i would recommend this dress- its gorgeous on. for the price, i think it should come with a slip. fyi, the back half of the waist has elastic,

Love everything about this dress except for the elastic waistband. it's a dressier style, and the elastic cheapens the look--definitely needs a ribbon or belt to cover. otherwise the cut and fit is very flattering, the fabric is nice, and the floral pattern is lovely. i found the dress tts (size 4r and i'm 5'4", 120 lbs).
I bought the 0p and love this skirt! it works well dressed up for a night out or i even wore it to my nieces baptism...have received a ton of compliments each time i've worn it.

I have many ponchos! i think they are timeless, fun, and sophisticated. and this one is definitely a nice addition to my wardrobe. as many have mentioned, the center of the poncho is off center, however, this does not detract from the beautiful pattern on this item. i will enjoy wearing it (with a tee or tank underneath) this winter and fall. great purchase.
Perfect sweater to throw on with anything. it is fairly thin, i wore a cami underneath. the sleeves and hem are rolled. you have to be careful and it can snag easily. happy with my purchase.
I like the jacket and it fits well. I was, however, disappointed to see my Levi's product was made in Bangladesh.
The material is good and suitable for casual wear.

I love the design of this cape. most capes are coats which can only be wore in the fall months here in the midwest since winter is too cold. this cape is more like a layering piece for indoors similar to a cardigan sweater, which i like. it can be wore in an office setting or out on the town with jeans. the constructions is well made as well
I bought this shirt in black and green and now bought the orange. it is casual and stylish at the same time. material is soft. great shirt!
I love this dress. i think it will be awesome to wear this summer but also a great transition piece into fall. very boho!
My little guy looks good in his rain jack has held up well no complaints.
Bigger than expected. Love the quality .
Quality of material is excellence, fit as expected. Would by again.
Read the reviews and order your size accordingly. I love this dress. Fits well.
Very nice looking, traditionally cut slacks.  Quite pleased initially, I will see how they wear.

This was my first shot at high-rise bottoms and i love them. the fit is very flattering and the print is adorable. i just bought the bottoms so i can't comment on the top, it looked a bit small for my bust so i am purchasing a solid colored top to match.

I tried this in the store and i liked it. the color is very pretty and the fabric is soft and drapey and feels like good quality. i like the little subtle dots. i ultimately did not buy it because the tie at the throat is not my style and because i just don't need this kind of piece enough in my wardrobe at the moment. but it is a very nice top and i would recommend it if you like the color and style.
So comfortable! Long, so if you are short like I am, plan for som cute sandals that have heels. I’m 5’2” and it for fine with 3” heels.
Sorry, I don’t know, it was a gift
Great product feels super soft against your skin and is easy to move in. I was in between sizes and sized up but sadly it was too large.
This was surprisingly good quality for the price. My husband needs a blazer only occassionally for work, so we didn't want to spend a fortune. This one fits well and looks nice.

I was a little hesitant to buy these given that i am just 5'1" - i didn't want to look like an extra from the set of "newsies." but these are very well made and tailored for a woman's body...the trousers actually accentuate the waist and the cropped leg works well for a petite frame. they are nicely lined and the wool blend is soft and not scratchy. i love them!

I am powerless to resist hot air balloons and had to get these the moment they popped up! the pjs are charming and comfortable. the material feels very satiny. it's hard to tell, but there are small white dots in the midst of the champagne colored background. true to size.
Soft, comfy and cute! great for casual wear! should've bought in more colors
i dress kogal and this cardigan is really good for that. i ordered two sizes up (Large) and it was perfectly oversized :)

I love this dress.  I'm 4'11'' and 145 lbs.  I bought a size large because the medium was too tight.  I turned around and bought the blue one in a size medium and it fits great.  I need to exchanged the large olive green size large to a size medium.

I just wore these for the first time and they are so comfortable. the mid rise waist is not too tight as many jeans are on me and the fitted hips keeps the wide leg crop cut from being frumpy. i wore them with sandals and i think they will wear well with booties and boots as the weather gets cooler too. they are a substantial weight jean not just for summer. these jeans will be seeing a lot of wear.

Just wanted to let readers know that the dress doesn't flare out at the bottom like it shows on the model. for me, that's a good thing. it definitely sways and swishes, but doesn't flare out. you definitely have to wear a slip with it, not because it's see-through at all (it's not), but because of the static. 

also, this is the perfect dress for belt-lovers.

Wasn't sure what to expect but i like it. ordered size large and it's a perfect fit. the color is a blush beige. it falls at the top of my hips. i don't think you need a camo under it because the holes are small. it's a sweater type knit that's substantial but not heavy.  love that it ties at the shoulder to adjust the fit and length.

Bought the red/white. normally a size small but they were out so tried a medium. it fit perfectly. and feels amazing. love how it hangs and know i will get lots of compliments on this! jeans, white linen pants, very versatile how this can be warn.

I have been desperate to find a fabric mosquitos can't bite through until it dawned on me: waterproof. But then finding pants that were ACTUALLY 100% waterproof was a whole other issue. THESE ARE. I've bathed the dogs while wearing them, they are completely waterproof and better than that, THEY'RE MOSQUITO PROOF. I get snacked on like a juice box once it's warm in Texas and typically they only EVER bite my legs (even though I never wear shorts and I'm always in a tank top) and that is where I have a weird horrible allergic reaction to them. Since I got these, I don't go outside without them on and now they're just biting me on the back like cowards (but i don't have an allergic reaction to those so whatever i guess) SO THE PANTS ARE DOING THEIR EXTRA JOB. Zero bites on my legs.As for fit, I got x-small, I'm about 5'4 and weigh 100 pounds and they fit perfect. I probably could have gotten the shorter fit and it would have been fine but I don't mind a little extra length at the bottom, they're not dragging on the ground or swallowing my feet or anything like that. They DON'T have pockets, however there is one small pouch on the inside that you could put something small in like a wallet or money (it wouldn't fit a phone its not that big).They do do the swish swish sound like windbreakers so if you're looking for quiet pants, these aren't them, but otherwise, they ARE waterproof and they are mosquito proof, and they're comfortable and light enough to wear in texas heat without feeling like theres a swamp in my pants.
Perfect fit and very, very comfortable. Plan to buy other colors (I got black).

Liked it was casual and easy material to wash not much fuss also it runs true to size and doesn’t wrinkle too bad,
I love these jeans! Perfect fit for me.

These are GREAT for coaching gymnastics!! Also great for working out, bending down, and are very comfortable.

The pole shirt fits as expected, I ordered a large and it just fits perfectly - I’m 5’10” 185 lbs medium built. The shirt did not shrink after washing. Depending probably what detergent you are using, color will fade a little bit.

I'm 5 ' 5" and 132 lbs., 34d and the size m is perfect. i will probably wear a thin, long cami under it as it is slightly see through. it doesn't gape under the arms like some sleeveless items...it fits smoothly. as the other review mentioned, it would be a perfect swim suit cover up. but i'm going to wear it more as a casual, very versatile, perfect for a hot day summer dress!
Used for wedding. Grandson is 9, husky  & tall. Fit with growing room but not baggy!

Love this sweater! bought it in pink and grey and it looks great with jeans. great quality and true to size.

I used it for a sweet 16 and really needed it for 1 time. Still I took it to the cleaners and I have it ready if I need it again. I love the design of the vest.
Very comfortable and the price was great!
Love this sweater! you can wear it with just about everything. i have worn it with dresses, leggings and jeans. you can dress it up or down. wonderful quality for the price.
Great fit i'm petite and bought size 29. my hips and waist differ by 10", so i'm very curvy. i love the fit and look just by rolling them up. my 1st pair of ag jeans and i will definitely buy more.
Great look.

Perfect fit. Fine in the wash.
I love this t-shirt - the moss green color is just what i wanted, cute fit and true to size. purchased the medium b/c i like t-shirts to be a little loose.

This super cute sweater is comfy and fun to wear.  i love it as much as last years wool paned sweater tunic, except this sweater is too short on me to wear as a dress.  wonderful with leggings and boots.  i bought the blue in size m regular and my stats are: 63"t/39"c/28"w/35"h/30"i (tall/chest/waist/hips/inseam)
I didn't look at this dress twice online but when i tried it on in the store i was floored. it was beautiful, flattering, and so much fun.

If you're looking for a sweater that's super soft and comfortable, you've found it! you could wear this almost anywhere except for a dressy occasion, but then, of course, you wouldn't wear it with a dress anyway. i wish it came in other colors because i'd buy several. it's on the thin side but not too thin. the only thing that i should mention is that it's not a black black but more of a faded or brownish black which is really obvious with black leggings or jeans.
It is one of my favorites from retailer. i received so many compliments while wearing it! i usually wear a 6 but i sized down to a 4 and still had plenty of room.
I love this shirt. wore it today and got many compliments. i bought the mauve (looks lilac to me). it's very comfy and long. its got a lovely swing feel which is great for covering my baby belly.

I ordered the medium, my usual size for flowing tops. it fits nicely, looks amazing from the front and looks slimming. then i turned to the side and oh my...my boobs protruded like two big balloons. i looked like wonder woman. there was plenty of fabric and it was billowy so it wasn't the size just the cut. i do have 34 g's but what the heck? the color is glorious but it has to go back.
It’s not expensive material but it gives a nice look to an outfit. Very light weight.
I purchased the coral color. i'm usually between an xs and small in this brand, and i felt the top runs a tad small, so the small fit much better. simple and flattering top.

This sweater is perfect for cool days.  the fit is true to size, though a bit longer than in the photos, especially the sleeves (i'm petite).  i actually liked the length so did not order petite.  the sweater is a relatively soft cotton blend.  it is comfortable and the ruffle adds just the right amount of finesse.  the ruffle is stitched on all the way, so it doesn't open in front, which is a plus.  the blue grey is marled and more grey than blue.  the red is beautiful and as pictured.

Absolutely stunning top! love! what a great buy on sale! i wear a medium/large and purchased the size 12...fits perfect! beware that the bottom has somewhat of a flair! the material is light so i would say this top is something to be worn transitioning between seasons, late summer to fall!

My sales assistant/style consultant watched the dresses i had collected to try on, and how they fit, and she brought this dress in, with a silk cocoon wrap for me to try on. i took one look on the hanger and made an assumption it would be too snug, highlight every bump, and i could not have been more wrong! this dress is wonderful on! it is the most flattering thing i have now in my closet. you must try this on to see how flattering it is. i am still stunned with how it looked and made me feel.

This dress fit me very well; I am 5’4”, 160 lbs, with a pear-shaped, mature body.  Since I buy sheath dresses with my hips in mind, I was concerned that this garment would not fit my bustline properly. It did!  This is probably due to the princess seams down the front. It fits well through the shoulders, and although the underarms are cut lower than expected, they did not gap or reveal my bra. The material is quality,  it is nicely lined, and has a stylish kick pleat in the back.  The back zipper is hidden discretely in the back seam. My only complaint is that the hem is below my knees; this will need to be altered by a seamstress. I paired the dress with a sparkly hip-length formal jacket, and also a more casual blouson top, and both combinations “worked”. I think I will wear this often!
The fit was great!!!!!

useful with many skirts and pants. well made.

Great fit (adjustable strap), love the pockets, very comfortable and figure flattering (especially since I'm still working on losing a few extra covid lbs)!

This was the first time I've ever ordered clothing from online, let alone a suit jacket. Dimensions matched US spec measurements, so knowing your chest size/sleeve length is critically important to get a good fit. If in doubt, best to order one size larger than you normally get as it's easier to tailor down than up. Just note, that if you do need to tailor up, there are no additional cloth to do so.The feel of the fabric, thickness of the material and look of the fabric is indistinguishable from the $300 suit that I was comparing it next to.  There are pockets, but are gently stitched together which you can easily cut away with a small scissor.Overall, it's a good black tone and is very formal. Finding accompanying black pants were easy to find as well.

Alright, so I usually don't write reviews, which is ironically what every scam reviewer writes haha!Anyhow, I saw the reviews here, and honestly I can't entirely speak of the sturdiness yet. I have bought three pairs of these jeans in 28x30.So far so good, I have recently started buying deadstock and vintage LEVIS 501 from pre-2000, which are much better quality than new LEVIS, unfortunately, both in fit and quality. In quality level I'll compare NEW-LEVIS, OG-LEVIS and the Wranglers bought here.1: QualityOG LEVIS, wins hands down, the quality of material and stitching is just streets ahead.However insofar as NEW-501 vs Wrangler  Authentic 5-pocket- Wrangler wins, as much as I like 501s, their quality ranges widely depending on production year and colour. Generally blue 501 have a good quality, but their other colours often come out stiff, for comparison I bought the Khaki in LEVIS 501, I believe they were called timberwolf colour, but the same as Khaki here. Incredibly stiff in the material, even after several washes. Whereas the Wrangler has been nice and soft even after a couple of test-washes!2: Sizing & FitOG Levis and the Wranglers here are quite similar in fit on the hip and in inseam. I usually use 30 inseam, but that often comes out too short on many pants, however vintage pants and jeans with inseam 30 fit me like a glove. With these wranglers out of the three pairs of jeans, the inseam has remained the same.New LEVIS terrible inseam, too short compared to description, I know that it is the fashion currently to have a pants-leg that is at ankle/above ankle length, which is fine, but unfortunately sellers sell with the inseam being 30, when in fact it is only 29 or so.NEW LEVIS have terrible fit on the hip as well, it is slightly below mid-rise I'd argue, and perhaps some of them barely above low-rise, so much inconsistency with the 501 currently.OG LEVIS, nice solid mid-rise waist-line, and I can say the same for these Wranglers.Insofar as the hip is concerned, a bit tight, same with OG LEVIS and NEW LEVIS; which I don't mind, this is the standard fit, not the relaxed or flex version.For all of the jeans. The thigh and calf fit is also nice and roomy if you buy in your size; I certainly don't have skinny legs, relatively muscular throughout and they are not too tight, a little strain on the thigh perhaps, and on the peak of the calf, but not uncomfortable.What started my jeans journey was actually waist/leg fit, rather than quality. I went to a local store and tried a pair of jeans on in 28x30, and I couldn't get them over my calf, and the tightness in the thigh was ridiculous not to mention how low they sat on my waist. When I checked the fit it wrote "Standard" after that it was a long journey to find that Wranglers are generally consistent and high quality especially considering the price.Wrangler used to have this 5-pocket as made in USA, I was lucky enough to buy a pair a couple of years ago, and unsurprisingly the material is nicer than what we currently have as well as construction of stitching, with that said this current version, imo has a better hip/waist fit, if just barely.I'll probably buy another 1-2 pairs of these at some point

I bought 3 of these shirts in Dusk Blue, Dusty Green, and White.  I'm 6'0" tall with a 44" chest, 17" biceps, and a 34" waist.  I weigh about 207 lbs and have a muscular build with fairly low body fat.  I wasn't looking for a skin tight muscle shirt or compression shirt.  I just wanted a clean fitting t-shirt for summer that I can wear under a linen button up shirt without a bunch of baggy fabric at the waist.The reviews regarding size are all over the place.  I'll give you my take on sizing and fit along with overall construction and quality.  Spoiler alert, the sizing is a perfectly normal US standard.  A L is a L and an XL is an XL.So, most reviews stated that these shirts run small and recommend sizing up 1 or even 2 sizes.  I ordinarily take that with a grain of salt because most US guys are shopping a "slim fit" shirt like this despite the fact they are sporting 30% body fat and most of that sits around their waist.  People are delusional.But there were so many reviews recommending sizing up, I took the bait and ordered the 3 shirts in XL.  As I feared, the XL fit way too large.  The chest was not bad but not the snug fit I wanted.  The neck was OK.  And the sleeves were OK.  But the length was way too long.  And there was way too much extra fabric around the waist.  They looked sloppy on me.Guys, just because you're 6'0" tall and 207 lbs like me does NOT mean we are built the same.  I can only surmise that a lot of guys leaving these reviews have no upper body muscle mass or leg development and carry a lot of their weight around their belly.  The classic pear shape of a sunken chest, and spare tire, and chicken legs says you should be shopping foe a "classic fit" t-shirt, not a slim fit shirt with spandex.I sent the XL shirts back and ordered the same 3 colors in my usual size L.  The fit of the size L is perfect.  The neck is a high V.  The sleeves are snug against my biceps.  The chest is snug but not muscle shirt tight.  And there is enough of a taper towards the waist to keep it looking fitted and clean but again, not like a muscle shirt.  It looks casual and well fitted without being too baggy or so tight that it shows off everything under it.As for the fabric, I got what I expected.  I have some white dress t-shirts that are 95% cotton and 5% spandex and I figured these would be similar.  They are.  Adding spandex to cotton makes it stretchy but it also makes it weirdly smooth and adds a little bit of shine.  It ends up looking and feeling a little like polyester more than cotton. So if you expected that typical Hanes white t-shirt look with a matte finish, you may be disappointed.  On the other hand, the spandex keeps about 90% of the wrinkles out of the cotton shirt and makes it really comfortable to wear.  Again, the no wrinkle look is a little like polyester but is keeps looking sharp all day.As for construction, the neck is really well stitched.  Same with the sleeves and the waist.  The label is printed which I prefer rather than a tag.  Overall, this is the clean, slim fit look I was hoping for.In summary, this is a nice, slim fit shirt well suited for casual wear alone or under a long sleeve button up shirt worn unbuttoned in hot weather.  If you are muscular with low body fat just order your normal size.  If you are a typical US male with no muscle and a big belly, yeah, order up a size or two.  Or maybe look at some t-shirts that are "classic fit" without spandex to avoid drawing attention to your waistline.Hope this helps.

These are absolutely the softest and most comfortable sweaters I own!  They are perfect for casual or professional, and a simple layering tee or cami underneath gives a nice cozy feeling all day. I am typically a mix between medium and large and it does run the tiniest bit large, so a medium fit me perfectly.  I now own about 6 of them!

Another perfect maxi from retailer! the print is feminine and can be easily dressed up or dressed down. i ordered my normal size in maxis (medium) and the top fits nice and snug but not too tight. i am busty and the neckline is high enough that i don't feel like i am showing too much cleavage. it is a little long on me when i have flip flops on but with a little platform sandal it will be perfect.

I love this dress. it's beautiful and flattering. not to mention that it is also comfortable with a bit of stretch. i couldn't see it in the picture, but the black parts on the shoulders in front and on the back is sheer, so you have to be careful with underwear choice. i have an apple shape and yet this was flattering and the perfect length. i am short and apple-shaped and it was a great choice.

I ordered these jeans to wear to work since they are very dark and tailored. my usual size 26 fit perfectly, but they did have to go to the tailors since they were incredibly long, which is nice for those of you that need more length.given that i usually am in skinnies, i like how they fit singly on the hips and slightly flare out towards the bottom, but not too much. these will work well with a variety of looks, making the price tag well worth it.

I'm a 60ish guy, and let's just say that I no longer wear the 32" waist jeans I wore in my 20s.I've always been a fan of Lee jeans vs. Levi or Wrangler, for the simple reason that Lee jeans always fit me better than the others.But as my waist and butt have expanded over the years, I found that it was difficult to find jeans that didn't cut me in half at the waist when I bent over, making me feel like I couldn't breathe.But recently I discovered these.  Wow, what a difference!!  These without question, hands down are the best fitting jeans I've ever worn!  The comfort and fit is second to none.They have a lot of stretch in the waist, legs, knees, & inseam, making kneeling, squatting, sitting, & crouching so much easier.If you are looking for COMFORT & FIT, look no further, just buy these. You won't be sorry.
Husband was extremely happy with this hooded product! Comfortable soft and warm not to heavy!

Read all the reviews to figure out what size to get my tall, skinny son for prom. He is 6'2" and around 170 lbs. We ended up purchasing a size 44 based off of other reviews. The jacket fit great! Pants looked great on, but he definitely needed a belt. He said the suit was really comfortable to dance in and he is wild on the dance floor. The large tag on the sleeve was obnoxious, but my husband was able to very carefully remove it. The purple suit fit his fun, goofy personality perfectly. He really looked sharp in it and he got a TONS of compliments from everyone at prom. The price of $60 was great and it was way cheaper than renting a tux.  The quality is way better than I expected for the price.He will definitely be wearing this again!

Too often have I purchased an apparel item on Amazon only to receive something with a really strange fit or made of a material whose texture or drape I just can’t work with. It’s with that in mind that I offer this glowing review for these mock wrap v-neck dresses. In fact, I liked my first so much I went back and ordered the same dress in two more prints!The material is flowy and not too sheer - it’s breathable enough for a humid Florida afternoon, and can be dressed up or down depending on your choice of accessories and footwear. The colors in the prints are bold and hold up well to washing.Did I mention these have POCKETS? I love me a dress with pockets.Finally, the spaghetti straps are adjustable. If you’re less-than-endowed up top as I am, this dress still accentuates what it should without leaving you exposed. That’s a big win!
